2856 
2866  public function setShippingMethod($shipping_method_id, $notrigger = false, $userused = null)
2867  {
2868  global $user;
2869 
2870  if (empty($userused)) {
2871  $userused = $user;
2872  }
2873 
2874  $error = 0;
2875 
2876  if (!$this->table_element) {
2877  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setShippingMethod was called on objet with property table_element not defined", LOG_ERR);
2878  return -1;
2879  }
2880 
2881  $this->db->begin();
2882 
2883  if ($shipping_method_id < 0) {
2884  $shipping_method_id = 'NULL';
2885  }
2886  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::setShippingMethod('.$shipping_method_id.')');
2887 
2888  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element;
2889  $sql .= " SET fk_shipping_method = ".((int) $shipping_method_id);
2890  $sql .= " WHERE rowid=".((int) $this->id);
2891  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
2892  if (!$resql) {
2893  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::setShippingMethod Error ', LOG_DEBUG);
2894  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
2895  $error++;
2896  } else {
2897  if (!$notrigger) {
2898  // Call trigger
2899  $this->context = array('shippingmethodupdate'=>1);
2900  $result = $this->call_trigger(strtoupper(get_class($this)).'_MODIFY', $userused);
2901  if ($result < 0) {
2902  $error++;
2903  }
2904  // End call trigger
2905  }
2906  }
2907  if ($error) {
2908  $this->db->rollback();
2909  return -1;
2910  } else {
2911  $this->shipping_method_id = ($shipping_method_id == 'NULL') ?null:$shipping_method_id;
2912  $this->db->commit();
2913  return 1;
2914  }
2915  }
2916 
2917 
2924  public function setWarehouse($warehouse_id)
2925  {
2926  if (!$this->table_element) {
2927  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setWarehouse was called on objet with property table_element not defined", LOG_ERR);
2928  return -1;
2929  }
2930  if ($warehouse_id < 0) {
2931  $warehouse_id = 'NULL';
2932  }
2933  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::setWarehouse('.$warehouse_id.')');
2934 
2935  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element;
2936  $sql .= " SET fk_warehouse = ".((int) $warehouse_id);
2937  $sql .= " WHERE rowid=".((int) $this->id);
2938 
2939  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
2940  $this->warehouse_id = ($warehouse_id == 'NULL') ?null:$warehouse_id;
2941  return 1;
2942  } else {
2943  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::setWarehouse Error ', LOG_DEBUG);
2944  $this->error = $this->db->error();
2945  return 0;
2946  }
2947  }
2948 
2949 
2957  public function setDocModel($user, $modelpdf)
2958  {
2959  if (!$this->table_element) {
2960  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setDocModel was called on objet with property table_element not defined", LOG_ERR);
2961  return -1;
2962  }
2963 
2964  $newmodelpdf = dol_trunc($modelpdf, 255);
2965 
2966  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element;
2967  $sql .= " SET model_pdf = '".$this->db->escape($newmodelpdf)."'";
2968  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
2969 
2970  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setDocModel", LOG_DEBUG);
2971  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
2972  if ($resql) {
2973  $this->model_pdf = $modelpdf;
2974  $this->modelpdf = $modelpdf; // For bakward compatibility
2975  return 1;
2976  } else {
2977  dol_print_error($this->db);
2978  return 0;
2979  }
2980  }
2981 
2982 
2991  public function setBankAccount($fk_account, $notrigger = false, $userused = null)
2992  {
2993  global $user;
2994 
2995  if (empty($userused)) {
2996  $userused = $user;
2997  }
2998 
2999  $error = 0;
3000 
3001  if (!$this->table_element) {
3002  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setBankAccount was called on objet with property table_element not defined", LOG_ERR);
3003  return -1;
3004  }
3005  $this->db->begin();
3006 
3007  if ($fk_account < 0) {
3008  $fk_account = 'NULL';
3009  }
3010  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::setBankAccount('.$fk_account.')');
3011 
3012  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element;
3013  $sql .= " SET fk_account = ".((int) $fk_account);
3014  $sql .= " WHERE rowid=".((int) $this->id);
3015 
3016  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3017  if (!$resql) {
3018  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::setBankAccount Error '.$sql.' - '.$this->db->error());
3019  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
3020  $error++;
3021  } else {
3022  if (!$notrigger) {
3023  // Call trigger
3024  $this->context = array('bankaccountupdate'=>1);
3025  $result = $this->call_trigger(strtoupper(get_class($this)).'_MODIFY', $userused);
3026  if ($result < 0) {
3027  $error++;
3028  }
3029  // End call trigger
3030  }
3031  }
3032  if ($error) {
3033  $this->db->rollback();
3034  return -1;
3035  } else {
3036  $this->fk_account = ($fk_account == 'NULL') ?null:$fk_account;
3037  $this->db->commit();
3038  return 1;
3039  }
3040  }
3041 
3042 
3043  // TODO: Move line related operations to CommonObjectLine?
3044 
3045  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3055  public function line_order($renum = false, $rowidorder = 'ASC', $fk_parent_line = true)
3056  {
3057  // phpcs:enable
3058  if (!$this->table_element_line) {
3059  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_order was called on objet with property table_element_line not defined", LOG_ERR);
3060  return -1;
3061  }
3062  if (!$this->fk_element) {
3063  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_order was called on objet with property fk_element not defined", LOG_ERR);
3064  return -1;
3065  }
3066 
3067  $fieldposition = 'rang'; // @todo Rename 'rang' into 'position'
3068  if (in_array($this->table_element_line, array('bom_bomline', 'ecm_files', 'emailcollector_emailcollectoraction', 'product_attribute_value'))) {
3069  $fieldposition = 'position';
3070  }
3071 
3072  // Count number of lines to reorder (according to choice $renum)
3073  $nl = 0;
3074  $sql = "SELECT count(rowid) FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line;
3075  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3076  if (!$renum) {
3077  $sql .= " AND " . $fieldposition . " = 0";
3078  }
3079  if ($renum) {
3080  $sql .= " AND " . $fieldposition . " <> 0";
3081  }
3082 
3083  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_order", LOG_DEBUG);
3084  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3085  if ($resql) {
3086  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
3087  $nl = $row[0];
3088  } else {
3089  dol_print_error($this->db);
3090  }
3091  if ($nl > 0) {
3092  // The goal of this part is to reorder all lines, with all children lines sharing the same counter that parents.
3093  $rows = array();
3094 
3095  // We first search all lines that are parent lines (for multilevel details lines)
3096  $sql = "SELECT rowid FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line;
3097  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3098  if ($fk_parent_line) {
3099  $sql .= ' AND fk_parent_line IS NULL';
3100  }
3101  $sql .= " ORDER BY " . $fieldposition . " ASC, rowid " . $rowidorder;
3102 
3103  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_order search all parent lines", LOG_DEBUG);
3104  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3105  if ($resql) {
3106  $i = 0;
3107  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3108  while ($i < $num) {
3109  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
3110  $rows[] = $row[0]; // Add parent line into array rows
3111  $childrens = $this->getChildrenOfLine($row[0]);
3112  if (!empty($childrens)) {
3113  foreach ($childrens as $child) {
3114  array_push($rows, $child);
3115  }
3116  }
3117  $i++;
3118  }
3119 
3120  // Now we set a new number for each lines (parent and children with children included into parent tree)
3121  if (!empty($rows)) {
3122  foreach ($rows as $key => $row) {
3123  $this->updateRangOfLine($row, ($key + 1));
3124  }
3125  }
3126  } else {
3127  dol_print_error($this->db);
3128  }
3129  }
3130  return 1;
3131  }
3132 
3140  public function getChildrenOfLine($id, $includealltree = 0)
3141  {
3142  $fieldposition = 'rang'; // @todo Rename 'rang' into 'position'
3143  if (in_array($this->table_element_line, array('bom_bomline', 'ecm_files', 'emailcollector_emailcollectoraction', 'product_attribute_value'))) {
3144  $fieldposition = 'position';
3145  }
3146 
3147  $rows = array();
3148 
3149  $sql = "SELECT rowid FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line;
3150  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3151  $sql .= ' AND fk_parent_line = '.((int) $id);
3152  $sql .= " ORDER BY " . $fieldposition . " ASC";
3153 
3154  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::getChildrenOfLine search children lines for line ".$id, LOG_DEBUG);
3155  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3156  if ($resql) {
3157  if ($this->db->num_rows($resql) > 0) {
3158  while ($row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql)) {
3159  $rows[] = $row[0];
3160  if (!empty($includealltree)) {
3161  $rows = array_merge($rows, $this->getChildrenOfLine($row[0]), $includealltree);
3162  }
3163  }
3164  }
3165  }
3166  return $rows;
3167  }
3168 
3169  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3177  public function line_up($rowid, $fk_parent_line = true)
3178  {
3179  // phpcs:enable
3180  $this->line_order(false, 'ASC', $fk_parent_line);
3181 
3182  // Get rang of line
3183  $rang = $this->getRangOfLine($rowid);
3184 
3185  // Update position of line
3186  $this->updateLineUp($rowid, $rang);
3187  }
3188 
3189  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3197  public function line_down($rowid, $fk_parent_line = true)
3198  {
3199  // phpcs:enable
3200  $this->line_order(false, 'ASC', $fk_parent_line);
3201 
3202  // Get rang of line
3203  $rang = $this->getRangOfLine($rowid);
3204 
3205  // Get max value for rang
3206  $max = $this->line_max();
3207 
3208  // Update position of line
3209  $this->updateLineDown($rowid, $rang, $max);
3210  }
3211 
3219  public function updateRangOfLine($rowid, $rang)
3220  {
3221  global $hookmanager;
3222  $fieldposition = 'rang'; // @todo Rename 'rang' into 'position'
3223  if (in_array($this->table_element_line, array('bom_bomline', 'ecm_files', 'emailcollector_emailcollectoraction', 'product_attribute_value'))) {
3224  $fieldposition = 'position';
3225  }
3226 
3227  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldposition." = ".((int) $rang);
3228  $sql .= ' WHERE rowid = '.((int) $rowid);
3229 
3230  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::updateRangOfLine", LOG_DEBUG);
3231  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
3232  dol_print_error($this->db);
3233  return -1;
3234  } else {
3235  $parameters=array('rowid'=>$rowid, 'rang'=>$rang, 'fieldposition' => $fieldposition);
3236  $action='';
3237  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('afterRankOfLineUpdate', $parameters, $this, $action);
3238  return 1;
3239  }
3240  }
3241 
3242  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3249  public function line_ajaxorder($rows)
3250  {
3251  // phpcs:enable
3252  $num = count($rows);
3253  for ($i = 0; $i < $num; $i++) {
3254  $this->updateRangOfLine($rows[$i], ($i + 1));
3255  }
3256  }
3257 
3265  public function updateLineUp($rowid, $rang)
3266  {
3267  if ($rang > 1) {
3268  $fieldposition = 'rang';
3269  if (in_array($this->table_element_line, array('ecm_files', 'emailcollector_emailcollectoraction', 'product_attribute_value'))) {
3270  $fieldposition = 'position';
3271  }
3272 
3273  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldposition." = ".((int) $rang);
3274  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3275  $sql .= " AND " . $fieldposition . " = " . ((int) ($rang - 1));
3276  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
3277  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldposition." = ".((int) ($rang - 1));
3278  $sql .= ' WHERE rowid = '.((int) $rowid);
3279  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
3280  dol_print_error($this->db);
3281  }
3282  } else {
3283  dol_print_error($this->db);
3284  }
3285  }
3286  }
3287 
3296  public function updateLineDown($rowid, $rang, $max)
3297  {
3298  if ($rang < $max) {
3299  $fieldposition = 'rang';
3300  if (in_array($this->table_element_line, array('ecm_files', 'emailcollector_emailcollectoraction', 'product_attribute_value'))) {
3301  $fieldposition = 'position';
3302  }
3303 
3304  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldposition." = ".((int) $rang);
3305  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3306  $sql .= " AND " . $fieldposition . " = " . ((int) ($rang + 1));
3307  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
3308  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldposition." = ".((int) ($rang + 1));
3309  $sql .= ' WHERE rowid = '.((int) $rowid);
3310  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
3311  dol_print_error($this->db);
3312  }
3313  } else {
3314  dol_print_error($this->db);
3315  }
3316  }
3317  }
3318

3326  {
3327  $fieldposition = 'rang';
3328  if (in_array($this->table_element_line, array('ecm_files', 'emailcollector_emailcollectoraction', 'product_attribute_value'))) {
3329  $fieldposition = 'position';
3330  }

3332  $sql = "SELECT " . $fieldposition . " FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line;
3333  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $rowid);

3336  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3337  if ($resql) {
3338  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
3339  return $row[0];
3340  }

3349  public function getIdOfLine($rang)
3350  {

3352  if (in_array($this->table_element_line, array('ecm_files', 'emailcollector_emailcollectoraction', 'product_attribute_value'))) {
3353  $fieldposition = 'position';
3354  }

3366  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3373  public function line_max($fk_parent_line = 0)
3374  {
3375  // phpcs:enable
3376  $positionfield = 'rang';
3377  if (in_array($this->table_element, array('bom_bom', 'product_attribute'))) {
3378  $positionfield = 'position';
3379  }
3380 
3381  // Search the last rang with fk_parent_line
3382  if ($fk_parent_line) {
3383  $sql = "SELECT max(".$positionfield.") FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line;
3384  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3385  $sql .= " AND fk_parent_line = ".((int) $fk_parent_line);
3386 
3387  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_max", LOG_DEBUG);
3388  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3389  if ($resql) {
3390  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
3391  if (!empty($row[0])) {
3392  return $row[0];
3393  } else {
3394  return $this->getRangOfLine($fk_parent_line);
3395  }
3396  }
3397  } else {
3398  // If not, search the last rang of element
3399  $sql = "SELECT max(".$positionfield.") FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line;
3400  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3401 
3402  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::line_max", LOG_DEBUG);
3403  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3404  if ($resql) {
3405  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
3406  return $row[0];
3407  }
3408  }
3409  }
3410 
3411  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3418  public function update_ref_ext($ref_ext)
3419  {
3420  // phpcs:enable
3421  if (!$this->table_element) {
3422  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_ref_ext was called on objet with property table_element not defined", LOG_ERR);
3423  return -1;
3424  }
3425 
3426  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element;
3427  $sql .= " SET ref_ext = '".$this->db->escape($ref_ext)."'";
3428  $sql .= " WHERE ".(isset($this->table_rowid) ? $this->table_rowid : 'rowid')." = ".((int) $this->id);
3429 
3430  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_ref_ext", LOG_DEBUG);
3431  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
3432  $this->ref_ext = $ref_ext;
3433  return 1;
3434  } else {
3435  $this->error = $this->db->error();
3436  return -1;

3439 
3440  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3448  public function update_note($note, $suffix = '')
3449  {
3450  // phpcs:enable
3451  global $user;
3452 
3453  if (!$this->table_element) {
3454  $this->error = 'update_note was called on objet with property table_element not defined';
3455  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_note was called on objet with property table_element not defined", LOG_ERR);
3456  return -1;
3457  }
3458  if (!in_array($suffix, array('', '_public', '_private'))) {
3459  $this->error = 'update_note Parameter suffix must be empty, \'_private\' or \'_public\'';
3460  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_note Parameter suffix must be empty, '_private' or '_public'", LOG_ERR);
3461  return -2;
3462  }
3463 
3464  $newsuffix = $suffix;
3465 
3466  // Special cas
3467  if ($this->table_element == 'product' && $newsuffix == '_private') {
3468  $newsuffix = '';
3469  }
3470  if (in_array($this->table_element, array('actioncomm', 'adherent', 'advtargetemailing', 'cronjob', 'establishment'))) {
3471  $fieldusermod = "fk_user_mod";
3472  } elseif ($this->table_element == 'ecm_files') {
3473  $fieldusermod = "fk_user_m";
3474  } else {
3475  $fieldusermod = "fk_user_modif";
3476  }
3477  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element;
3478  $sql .= " SET note".$newsuffix." = ".(!empty($note) ? ("'".$this->db->escape($note)."'") : "NULL");
3479  $sql .= ", ".$fieldusermod." = ".((int) $user->id);
3480  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
3481 
3482  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_note", LOG_DEBUG);
3483  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
3484  if ($suffix == '_public') {
3485  $this->note_public = $note;
3486  } elseif ($suffix == '_private') {
3487  $this->note_private = $note;
3488  } else {
3489  $this->note = $note; // deprecated
3490  $this->note_private = $note;
3491  }
3492  return 1;
3493  } else {
3494  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
3495  return -1;
3496  }
3497  }
3498 
3499  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3508  public function update_note_public($note)
3509  {
3510  // phpcs:enable
3511  return $this->update_note($note, '_public');
3512  }
3513 
3514  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3525  public function update_price($exclspec = 0, $roundingadjust = 'none', $nodatabaseupdate = 0, $seller = null)
3526  {
3527  // phpcs:enable
3528  global $conf, $hookmanager, $action;
3529 
3530  $parameters = array('exclspec' => $exclspec, 'roundingadjust' => $roundingadjust, 'nodatabaseupdate' => $nodatabaseupdate, 'seller' => $seller);
3531  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('updateTotalPrice', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
3532  if ($reshook > 0) {
3533  return 1; // replacement code
3534  } elseif ($reshook < 0) {
3535  return -1; // failure
3536  } // reshook = 0 => execute normal code
3537 
3538  // Some external module want no update price after a trigger because they have another method to calculate the total (ex: with an extrafield)
3539  $MODULE = "";
3540  if ($this->element == 'propal') {
3541  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_PROPOSAL";
3542  } elseif ($this->element == 'commande' || $this->element == 'order') {
3543  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_ORDER";
3544  } elseif ($this->element == 'facture' || $this->element == 'invoice') {
3545  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_INVOICE";
3546  } elseif ($this->element == 'facture_fourn' || $this->element == 'supplier_invoice' || $this->element == 'invoice_supplier' || $this->element == 'invoice_supplier_rec') {
3547  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_SUPPLIER_INVOICE";
3548  } elseif ($this->element == 'order_supplier' || $this->element == 'supplier_order') {
3549  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_SUPPLIER_ORDER";
3550  } elseif ($this->element == 'supplier_proposal') {
3551  $MODULE = "MODULE_DISALLOW_UPDATE_PRICE_SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL";
3552  }
3553 
3554  if (!empty($MODULE)) {
3555  if (!empty($conf->global->$MODULE)) {
3556  $modsactivated = explode(',', $conf->global->$MODULE);
3557  foreach ($modsactivated as $mod) {
3558  if (isModEnabled($mod)) {
3559  return 1; // update was disabled by specific setup
3560  }
3561  }
3562  }
3563  }
3564 
3565  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/price.lib.php';
3566 
3567  $forcedroundingmode = $roundingadjust;
3568  if ($forcedroundingmode == 'auto' && isset($conf->global->MAIN_ROUNDOFTOTAL_NOT_TOTALOFROUND)) {
3569  $forcedroundingmode = getDolGlobalString('MAIN_ROUNDOFTOTAL_NOT_TOTALOFROUND');
3570  } elseif ($forcedroundingmode == 'auto') {
3571  $forcedroundingmode = '0';
3572  }
3573 
3574  $error = 0;
3575 
3576  $multicurrency_tx = !empty($this->multicurrency_tx) ? $this->multicurrency_tx : 1;
3577 
3578  // Define constants to find lines to sum (field name int the table_element_line not into table_element)
3579  $fieldtva = 'total_tva';
3580  $fieldlocaltax1 = 'total_localtax1';
3581  $fieldlocaltax2 = 'total_localtax2';
3582  $fieldup = 'subprice';
3583  if ($this->element == 'facture_fourn' || $this->element == 'invoice_supplier') {
3584  $fieldtva = 'tva';
3585  $fieldup = 'pu_ht';
3586  }
3587  if ($this->element == 'invoice_supplier_rec') {
3588  $fieldup = 'pu_ht';
3589  }
3590  if ($this->element == 'expensereport') {
3591  $fieldup = 'value_unit';
3592  }
3593 
3594  $sql = "SELECT rowid, qty, ".$fieldup." as up, remise_percent, total_ht, ".$fieldtva." as total_tva, total_ttc, ".$fieldlocaltax1." as total_localtax1, ".$fieldlocaltax2." as total_localtax2,";
3595  $sql .= ' tva_tx as vatrate, localtax1_tx, localtax2_tx, localtax1_type, localtax2_type, info_bits, product_type';
3596  if ($this->table_element_line == 'facturedet') {
3597  $sql .= ', situation_percent';
3598  }
3599  $sql .= ', multicurrency_total_ht, multicurrency_total_tva, multicurrency_total_ttc';
3600  $sql .= " FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line;
3601  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
3602  if ($exclspec) {
3603  $product_field = 'product_type';
3604  if ($this->table_element_line == 'contratdet') {
3605  $product_field = ''; // contratdet table has no product_type field
3606  }
3607  if ($product_field) {
3608  $sql .= " AND ".$product_field." <> 9";
3609  }
3610  }
3611  $sql .= ' ORDER by rowid'; // We want to be sure to always use same order of line to not change lines differently when option MAIN_ROUNDOFTOTAL_NOT_TOTALOFROUND is used
3612 
3613  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_price", LOG_DEBUG);
3614 
3615  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3616  if ($resql) {
3617  $this->total_ht = 0;
3618  $this->total_tva = 0;
3619  $this->total_localtax1 = 0;
3620  $this->total_localtax2 = 0;
3621  $this->total_ttc = 0;
3622  $total_ht_by_vats = array();
3623  $total_tva_by_vats = array();
3624  $total_ttc_by_vats = array();
3625  $this->multicurrency_total_ht = 0;
3626  $this->multicurrency_total_tva = 0;
3627  $this->multicurrency_total_ttc = 0;
3628 
3629  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3630  $i = 0;
3631  while ($i < $num) {
3632  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3633 
3634  // Note: There is no check on detail line and no check on total, if $forcedroundingmode = 'none'
3635  $parameters = array('fk_element' => $obj->rowid);
3636  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('changeRoundingMode', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
3637 
3638  if (empty($reshook) && $forcedroundingmode == '0') { // Check if data on line are consistent. This may solve lines that were not consistent because set with $forcedroundingmode='auto'
3639  // This part of code is to fix data. We should not call it too often.
3640  $localtax_array = array($obj->localtax1_type, $obj->localtax1_tx, $obj->localtax2_type, $obj->localtax2_tx);
3641  $tmpcal = calcul_price_total($obj->qty, $obj->up, $obj->remise_percent, $obj->vatrate, $obj->localtax1_tx, $obj->localtax2_tx, 0, 'HT', $obj->info_bits, $obj->product_type, $seller, $localtax_array, (isset($obj->situation_percent) ? $obj->situation_percent : 100), $multicurrency_tx);
3642 
3643  $diff_when_using_price_ht = price2num($tmpcal[1] - $obj->total_tva, 'MT', 1); // If price was set with tax price and unit price HT has a low number of digits, then we may have a diff on recalculation from unit price HT.
3644  $diff_on_current_total = price2num($obj->total_ttc - $obj->total_ht - $obj->total_tva - $obj->total_localtax1 - $obj->total_localtax2, 'MT', 1);
3645  //var_dump($obj->total_ht.' '.$obj->total_tva.' '.$obj->total_localtax1.' '.$obj->total_localtax2.' => '.$obj->total_ttc);
3646  //var_dump($diff_when_using_price_ht.' '.$diff_on_current_total);
3647 
3648  if ($diff_on_current_total) {
3649  // This should not happen, we should always have in table: total_ttc = total_ht + total_vat + total_localtax1 + total_localtax2
3650  $sqlfix = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldtva." = ".price2num((float) $tmpcal[1]).", total_ttc = ".price2num((float) $tmpcal[2])." WHERE rowid = ".((int) $obj->rowid);
3651  dol_syslog('We found unconsistent data into detailed line (diff_on_current_total = '.$diff_on_current_total.') for line rowid = '.$obj->rowid." (ht=".$obj->total_ht." vat=".$obj->total_tva." tax1=".$obj->total_localtax1." tax2=".$obj->total_localtax2." ttc=".$obj->total_ttc."). We fix the total_vat and total_ttc of line by running sqlfix = ".$sqlfix, LOG_WARNING);
3652  $resqlfix = $this->db->query($sqlfix);
3653  if (!$resqlfix) {
3654  dol_print_error($this->db, 'Failed to update line');
3655  }
3656  $obj->total_tva = $tmpcal[1];
3657  $obj->total_ttc = $tmpcal[2];
3658  } elseif ($diff_when_using_price_ht && $roundingadjust == '0') {
3659  // After calculation from HT, total is consistent but we have found a difference between VAT part in calculation and into database and
3660  // we ask to force the use of rounding on line (like done on calculation) so we force update of line
3661  $sqlfix = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldtva." = ".price2num((float) $tmpcal[1]).", total_ttc = ".price2num((float) $tmpcal[2])." WHERE rowid = ".((int) $obj->rowid);
3662  dol_syslog('We found a line with different rounding data into detailed line (diff_when_using_price_ht = '.$diff_when_using_price_ht.' and diff_on_current_total = '.$diff_on_current_total.') for line rowid = '.$obj->rowid." (total vat of line calculated=".$tmpcal[1].", database=".$obj->total_tva."). We fix the total_vat and total_ttc of line by running sqlfix = ".$sqlfix);
3663  $resqlfix = $this->db->query($sqlfix);
3664  if (!$resqlfix) {
3665  dol_print_error($this->db, 'Failed to update line');
3666  }
3667  $obj->total_tva = $tmpcal[1];
3668  $obj->total_ttc = $tmpcal[2];
3669  }
3670  }
3671 
3672  $this->total_ht += $obj->total_ht; // The field visible at end of line detail
3673  $this->total_tva += $obj->total_tva;
3674  $this->total_localtax1 += $obj->total_localtax1;
3675  $this->total_localtax2 += $obj->total_localtax2;
3676  $this->total_ttc += $obj->total_ttc;
3677  $this->multicurrency_total_ht += $obj->multicurrency_total_ht; // The field visible at end of line detail
3678  $this->multicurrency_total_tva += $obj->multicurrency_total_tva;
3679  $this->multicurrency_total_ttc += $obj->multicurrency_total_ttc;
3680 
3681  if (!isset($total_ht_by_vats[$obj->vatrate])) {
3682  $total_ht_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] = 0;
3683  }
3684  if (!isset($total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate])) {
3685  $total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] = 0;
3686  }
3687  if (!isset($total_ttc_by_vats[$obj->vatrate])) {
3688  $total_ttc_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] = 0;
3689  }
3690  $total_ht_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] += $obj->total_ht;
3691  $total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] += $obj->total_tva;
3692  $total_ttc_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] += $obj->total_ttc;
3693 
3694  if ($forcedroundingmode == '1') { // Check if we need adjustement onto line for vat. TODO This works on the company currency but not on multicurrency
3695  $tmpvat = price2num($total_ht_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] * $obj->vatrate / 100, 'MT', 1);
3696  $diff = price2num($total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] - $tmpvat, 'MT', 1);
3697  //print 'Line '.$i.' rowid='.$obj->rowid.' vat_rate='.$obj->vatrate.' total_ht='.$obj->total_ht.' total_tva='.$obj->total_tva.' total_ttc='.$obj->total_ttc.' total_ht_by_vats='.$total_ht_by_vats[$obj->vatrate].' total_tva_by_vats='.$total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate].' (new calculation = '.$tmpvat.') total_ttc_by_vats='.$total_ttc_by_vats[$obj->vatrate].($diff?" => DIFF":"")."<br>\n";
3698  if ($diff) {
3699  if (abs($diff) > 0.1) {
3700  $errmsg = 'A rounding difference was detected into TOTAL but is too high to be corrected. Some data in your line may be corrupted. Try to edit each line manually.';
3701  dol_syslog($errmsg, LOG_WARNING);
3702  dol_print_error('', $errmsg);
3703  exit;
3704  }
3705  $sqlfix = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line." SET ".$fieldtva." = ".price2num($obj->total_tva - $diff).", total_ttc = ".price2num($obj->total_ttc - $diff)." WHERE rowid = ".((int) $obj->rowid);
3706  dol_syslog('We found a difference of '.$diff.' for line rowid = '.$obj->rowid.". We fix the total_vat and total_ttc of line by running sqlfix = ".$sqlfix);
3707 
3708  $resqlfix = $this->db->query($sqlfix);
3709 
3710  if (!$resqlfix) {
3711  dol_print_error($this->db, 'Failed to update line');
3712  }
3713 
3714  $this->total_tva = (float) price2num($this->total_tva - $diff, '', 1);
3715  $this->total_ttc = (float) price2num($this->total_ttc - $diff, '', 1);
3716  $total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] = (float) price2num($total_tva_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] - $diff, '', 1);
3717  $total_ttc_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] = (float) price2num($total_ttc_by_vats[$obj->vatrate] - $diff, '', 1);
3718  }
3719  }
3720 
3721  $i++;
3722  }
3723 
3724  // Add revenue stamp to total
3725  $this->total_ttc += isset($this->revenuestamp) ? $this->revenuestamp : 0;
3726  $this->multicurrency_total_ttc += isset($this->revenuestamp) ? ($this->revenuestamp * $multicurrency_tx) : 0;
3727 
3728  // Situations totals
3729  if (!empty($this->situation_cycle_ref) && $this->situation_counter > 1 && method_exists($this, 'get_prev_sits') && $this->type != $this::TYPE_CREDIT_NOTE) {
3730  $prev_sits = $this->get_prev_sits();
3731 
3732  foreach ($prev_sits as $sit) { // $sit is an object Facture loaded with a fetch.
3733  $this->total_ht -= $sit->total_ht;
3734  $this->total_tva -= $sit->total_tva;
3735  $this->total_localtax1 -= $sit->total_localtax1;
3736  $this->total_localtax2 -= $sit->total_localtax2;
3737  $this->total_ttc -= $sit->total_ttc;
3738  $this->multicurrency_total_ht -= $sit->multicurrency_total_ht;
3739  $this->multicurrency_total_tva -= $sit->multicurrency_total_tva;
3740  $this->multicurrency_total_ttc -= $sit->multicurrency_total_ttc;
3741  }
3742  }
3743 
3744  // Clean total
3745  $this->total_ht = (float) price2num($this->total_ht);
3746  $this->total_tva = (float) price2num($this->total_tva);
3747  $this->total_localtax1 = (float) price2num($this->total_localtax1);
3748  $this->total_localtax2 = (float) price2num($this->total_localtax2);
3749  $this->total_ttc = (float) price2num($this->total_ttc);
3750 
3751  $this->db->free($resql);
3752 
3753  // Now update global fields total_ht, total_ttc, total_tva, total_localtax1, total_localtax2, multicurrency_total_* of main object
3754  $fieldht = 'total_ht';
3755  $fieldtva = 'tva';
3756  $fieldlocaltax1 = 'localtax1';
3757  $fieldlocaltax2 = 'localtax2';
3758  $fieldttc = 'total_ttc';
3759  // Specific code for backward compatibility with old field names
3760  if (in_array($this->element, array('propal', 'commande', 'facture', 'facturerec', 'supplier_proposal', 'order_supplier', 'facture_fourn', 'invoice_supplier', 'invoice_supplier_rec', 'expensereport'))) {
3761  $fieldtva = 'total_tva';
3762  }
3763 
3764  if (empty($nodatabaseupdate)) {
3765  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element.' SET';
3766  $sql .= " ".$fieldht." = ".((float) price2num($this->total_ht, 'MT', 1)).",";
3767  $sql .= " ".$fieldtva." = ".((float) price2num($this->total_tva, 'MT', 1)).",";
3768  $sql .= " ".$fieldlocaltax1." = ".((float) price2num($this->total_localtax1, 'MT', 1)).",";
3769  $sql .= " ".$fieldlocaltax2." = ".((float) price2num($this->total_localtax2, 'MT', 1)).",";
3770  $sql .= " ".$fieldttc." = ".((float) price2num($this->total_ttc, 'MT', 1));
3771  $sql .= ", multicurrency_total_ht = ".((float) price2num($this->multicurrency_total_ht, 'MT', 1));
3772  $sql .= ", multicurrency_total_tva = ".((float) price2num($this->multicurrency_total_tva, 'MT', 1));
3773  $sql .= ", multicurrency_total_ttc = ".((float) price2num($this->multicurrency_total_ttc, 'MT', 1));
3774  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
3775 
3776  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::update_price", LOG_DEBUG);
3777  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3778 
3779  if (!$resql) {
3780  $error++;
3781  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
3782  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
3783  }
3784  }
3785 
3786  if (!$error) {
3787  return 1;
3788  } else {
3789  return -1;
3790  }
3791  } else {
3792  dol_print_error($this->db, 'Bad request in update_price');
3793  return -1;
3794  }
3795  }
3796 
3797  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
3808  public function add_object_linked($origin = null, $origin_id = null, $f_user = null, $notrigger = 0)
3809  {
3810  // phpcs:enable
3811  global $user, $hookmanager, $action;
3812  $origin = (!empty($origin) ? $origin : $this->origin);
3813  $origin_id = (!empty($origin_id) ? $origin_id : $this->origin_id);
3814  $f_user = isset($f_user) ? $f_user : $user;
3815 
3816  // Special case
3817  if ($origin == 'order') {
3818  $origin = 'commande';
3819  }
3820  if ($origin == 'invoice') {
3821  $origin = 'facture';
3822  }
3823  if ($origin == 'invoice_template') {
3824  $origin = 'facturerec';
3825  }
3826  if ($origin == 'supplierorder') {
3827  $origin = 'order_supplier';
3828  }
3829 
3830  // Elements of the core modules which have `$module` property but may to which we don't want to prefix module part to the element name for finding the linked object in llx_element_element.
3831  // It's because an entry for this element may be exist in llx_element_element before this modification (version <=14.2) and ave named only with their element name in fk_source or fk_target.
3832  $coremodule = array('knowledgemanagement', 'partnership', 'workstation', 'ticket', 'recruitment', 'eventorganization', 'asset');
3833  // Add module part to target type if object has $module property and isn't in core modules.
3834  $targettype = ((!empty($this->module) && ! in_array($this->module, $coremodule)) ? $this->module.'_' : '').$this->element;
3835 
3836  $parameters = array('targettype'=>$targettype);
3837  // Hook for explicitly set the targettype if it must be differtent than $this->element
3838  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('setLinkedObjectSourceTargetType', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
3839  if ($reshook > 0) {
3840  if (!empty($hookmanager->resArray['targettype'])) $targettype = $hookmanager->resArray['targettype'];
3841  }
3842 
3843  $this->db->begin();
3844  $error = 0;
3845 
3846  $sql = "INSERT INTO " . $this->db->prefix() . "element_element (";
3847  $sql .= "fk_source";
3848  $sql .= ", sourcetype";
3849  $sql .= ", fk_target";
3850  $sql .= ", targettype";
3851  $sql .= ") VALUES (";
3852  $sql .= ((int) $origin_id);
3853  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($origin) . "'";
3854  $sql .= ", " . ((int) $this->id);
3855  $sql .= ", '" . $this->db->escape($targettype) . "'";
3856  $sql .= ")";
3857 
3858  dol_syslog(get_class($this) . "::add_object_linked", LOG_DEBUG);
3859  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
3860  if (!$notrigger) {
3861  // Call trigger
3862  $this->context['link_origin'] = $origin;
3863  $this->context['link_origin_id'] = $origin_id;
3864  $result = $this->call_trigger('OBJECT_LINK_INSERT', $f_user);
3865  if ($result < 0) {
3866  $error++;
3867  }
3868  // End call triggers
3869  }
3870  } else {
3871  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
3872  $error++;
3873  }
3874 
3875  if (!$error) {
3876  $this->db->commit();
3877  return 1;
3878  } else {
3879  $this->db->rollback();
3880  return 0;
3881  }
3882  }
3883 
3906  public function fetchObjectLinked($sourceid = null, $sourcetype = '', $targetid = null, $targettype = '', $clause = 'OR', $alsosametype = 1, $orderby = 'sourcetype', $loadalsoobjects = 1)
3907  {
3908  global $conf, $hookmanager, $action;
3909 
3910  // Important for pdf generation time reduction
3911  // This boolean is true if $this->linkedObjects has already been loaded with all objects linked without filter
3912  if ($this->id > 0 && !empty($this->linkedObjectsFullLoaded[$this->id])) {
3913  return 1;
3914  }
3915 
3916  $this->linkedObjectsIds = array();
3917  $this->linkedObjects = array();
3918 
3919  $justsource = false;
3920  $justtarget = false;
3921  $withtargettype = false;
3922  $withsourcetype = false;
3923 
3924  $parameters = array('sourcetype'=>$sourcetype, 'sourceid'=>$sourceid, 'targettype'=>$targettype, 'targetid'=>$targetid);
3925  // Hook for explicitly set the targettype if it must be differtent than $this->element
3926  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('setLinkedObjectSourceTargetType', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
3927  if ($reshook > 0) {
3928  if (!empty($hookmanager->resArray['sourcetype'])) $sourcetype = $hookmanager->resArray['sourcetype'];
3929  if (!empty($hookmanager->resArray['sourceid'])) $sourceid = $hookmanager->resArray['sourceid'];
3930  if (!empty($hookmanager->resArray['targettype'])) $targettype = $hookmanager->resArray['targettype'];
3931  if (!empty($hookmanager->resArray['targetid'])) $targetid = $hookmanager->resArray['targetid'];
3932  }
3933 
3934  if (!empty($sourceid) && !empty($sourcetype) && empty($targetid)) {
3935  $justsource = true; // the source (id and type) is a search criteria
3936  if (!empty($targettype)) {
3937  $withtargettype = true;
3938  }
3939  }
3940  if (!empty($targetid) && !empty($targettype) && empty($sourceid)) {
3941  $justtarget = true; // the target (id and type) is a search criteria
3942  if (!empty($sourcetype)) {
3943  $withsourcetype = true;
3944  }
3945  }
3946 
3947  $sourceid = (!empty($sourceid) ? $sourceid : $this->id);
3948  $targetid = (!empty($targetid) ? $targetid : $this->id);
3949  $sourcetype = (!empty($sourcetype) ? $sourcetype : $this->element);
3950  $targettype = (!empty($targettype) ? $targettype : $this->element);
3951 
3952  /*if (empty($sourceid) && empty($targetid))
3953  {
3954  dol_syslog('Bad usage of function. No source nor target id defined (nor as parameter nor as object id)', LOG_ERR);
3955  return -1;
3956  }*/
3957 
3958  // Links between objects are stored in table element_element
3959  $sql = "SELECT rowid, fk_source, sourcetype, fk_target, targettype";
3960  $sql .= " FROM ".$this->db->prefix()."element_element";
3961  $sql .= " WHERE ";
3962  if ($justsource || $justtarget) {
3963  if ($justsource) {
3964  $sql .= "fk_source = ".((int) $sourceid)." AND sourcetype = '".$this->db->escape($sourcetype)."'";
3965  if ($withtargettype) {
3966  $sql .= " AND targettype = '".$this->db->escape($targettype)."'";
3967  }
3968  } elseif ($justtarget) {
3969  $sql .= "fk_target = ".((int) $targetid)." AND targettype = '".$this->db->escape($targettype)."'";
3970  if ($withsourcetype) {
3971  $sql .= " AND sourcetype = '".$this->db->escape($sourcetype)."'";
3972  }
3973  }
3974  } else {
3975  $sql .= "(fk_source = ".((int) $sourceid)." AND sourcetype = '".$this->db->escape($sourcetype)."')";
3976  $sql .= " ".$clause." (fk_target = ".((int) $targetid)." AND targettype = '".$this->db->escape($targettype)."')";
3977  if ($loadalsoobjects && $this->id > 0 && $sourceid == $this->id && $sourcetype == $this->element && $targetid == $this->id && $targettype == $this->element && $clause == 'OR') {
3978  $this->linkedObjectsFullLoaded[$this->id] = true;
3979  }
3980  }
3981  $sql .= " ORDER BY ".$orderby;
3982 
3983  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::fetchObjectLink", LOG_DEBUG);
3984  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
3985  if ($resql) {
3986  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
3987  $i = 0;
3988  while ($i < $num) {
3989  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
3990  if ($justsource || $justtarget) {
3991  if ($justsource) {
3992  $this->linkedObjectsIds[$obj->targettype][$obj->rowid] = $obj->fk_target;
3993  } elseif ($justtarget) {
3994  $this->linkedObjectsIds[$obj->sourcetype][$obj->rowid] = $obj->fk_source;
3995  }
3996  } else {
3997  if ($obj->fk_source == $sourceid && $obj->sourcetype == $sourcetype) {
3998  $this->linkedObjectsIds[$obj->targettype][$obj->rowid] = $obj->fk_target;
3999  }
4000  if ($obj->fk_target == $targetid && $obj->targettype == $targettype) {
4001  $this->linkedObjectsIds[$obj->sourcetype][$obj->rowid] = $obj->fk_source;
4002  }
4003  }
4004  $i++;
4005  }
4006 
4007  if (!empty($this->linkedObjectsIds)) {
4008  $tmparray = $this->linkedObjectsIds;
4009  foreach ($tmparray as $objecttype => $objectids) { // $objecttype is a module name ('facture', 'mymodule', ...) or a module name with a suffix ('project_task', 'mymodule_myobj', ...)
4010  // Parse element/subelement (ex: project_task, cabinetmed_consultation, ...)
4011  $module = $element = $subelement = $objecttype;
4012  $regs = array();
4013  if ($objecttype != 'supplier_proposal' && $objecttype != 'order_supplier' && $objecttype != 'invoice_supplier'
4014  && preg_match('/^([^_]+)_([^_]+)/i', $objecttype, $regs)) {
4015  $module = $element = $regs[1];
4016  $subelement = $regs[2];
4017  }
4018 
4019  $classpath = $element.'/class';
4020  // To work with non standard classpath or module name
4021  if ($objecttype == 'facture') {
4022  $classpath = 'compta/facture/class';
4023  } elseif ($objecttype == 'facturerec') {
4024  $classpath = 'compta/facture/class';
4025  $module = 'facture';
4026  } elseif ($objecttype == 'propal') {
4027  $classpath = 'comm/propal/class';
4028  } elseif ($objecttype == 'supplier_proposal') {
4029  $classpath = 'supplier_proposal/class';
4030  } elseif ($objecttype == 'shipping') {
4031  $classpath = 'expedition/class';
4032  $subelement = 'expedition';
4033  $module = 'expedition_bon';
4034  } elseif ($objecttype == 'delivery') {
4035  $classpath = 'delivery/class';
4036  $subelement = 'delivery';
4037  $module = 'delivery_note';
4038  } elseif ($objecttype == 'invoice_supplier' || $objecttype == 'order_supplier') {
4039  $classpath = 'fourn/class';
4040  $module = 'fournisseur';
4041  } elseif ($objecttype == 'fichinter') {
4042  $classpath = 'fichinter/class';
4043  $subelement = 'fichinter';
4044  $module = 'ficheinter';
4045  } elseif ($objecttype == 'subscription') {
4046  $classpath = 'adherents/class';
4047  $module = 'adherent';
4048  } elseif ($objecttype == 'contact') {
4049  $module = 'societe';
4050  }
4051  // Set classfile
4052  $classfile = strtolower($subelement);
4053  $classname = ucfirst($subelement);
4054 
4055  if ($objecttype == 'order') {
4056  $classfile = 'commande';
4057  $classname = 'Commande';
4058  } elseif ($objecttype == 'invoice_supplier') {
4059  $classfile = 'fournisseur.facture';
4060  $classname = 'FactureFournisseur';
4061  } elseif ($objecttype == 'order_supplier') {
4062  $classfile = 'fournisseur.commande';
4063  $classname = 'CommandeFournisseur';
4064  } elseif ($objecttype == 'supplier_proposal') {
4065  $classfile = 'supplier_proposal';
4066  $classname = 'SupplierProposal';
4067  } elseif ($objecttype == 'facturerec') {
4068  $classfile = 'facture-rec';
4069  $classname = 'FactureRec';
4070  } elseif ($objecttype == 'subscription') {
4071  $classfile = 'subscription';
4072  $classname = 'Subscription';
4073  } elseif ($objecttype == 'project' || $objecttype == 'projet') {
4074  $classpath = 'projet/class';
4075  $classfile = 'project';
4076  $classname = 'Project';
4077  } elseif ($objecttype == 'conferenceorboothattendee') {
4078  $classpath = 'eventorganization/class';
4079  $classfile = 'conferenceorboothattendee';
4080  $classname = 'ConferenceOrBoothAttendee';
4081  $module = 'eventorganization';
4082  } elseif ($objecttype == 'conferenceorbooth') {
4083  $classpath = 'eventorganization/class';
4084  $classfile = 'conferenceorbooth';
4085  $classname = 'ConferenceOrBooth';
4086  $module = 'eventorganization';
4087  } elseif ($objecttype == 'mo') {
4088  $classpath = 'mrp/class';
4089  $classfile = 'mo';
4090  $classname = 'Mo';
4091  $module = 'mrp';
4092  }
4093 
4094  // Here $module, $classfile and $classname are set, we can use them.
4095  if (isModEnabled($module) && (($element != $this->element) || $alsosametype)) {
4096  if ($loadalsoobjects && (is_numeric($loadalsoobjects) || ($loadalsoobjects === $objecttype))) {
4097  dol_include_once('/'.$classpath.'/'.$classfile.'.class.php');
4098  //print '/'.$classpath.'/'.$classfile.'.class.php '.class_exists($classname);
4099  if (class_exists($classname)) {
4100  foreach ($objectids as $i => $objectid) { // $i is rowid into llx_element_element
4101  $object = new $classname($this->db);
4102  $ret = $object->fetch($objectid);
4103  if ($ret >= 0) {
4104  $this->linkedObjects[$objecttype][$i] = $object;
4105  }
4106  }
4107  }
4108  }
4109  } else {
4110  unset($this->linkedObjectsIds[$objecttype]);
4111  }
4112  }
4113  }
4114  return 1;
4115  } else {
4116  dol_print_error($this->db);
4117  return -1;
4118  }
4119  }
4120 
4127  public function clearObjectLinkedCache()
4128  {
4129  if ($this->id > 0 && !empty($this->linkedObjectsFullLoaded[$this->id])) {
4130  unset($this->linkedObjectsFullLoaded[$this->id]);
4131  }
4132 
4133  return 1;
4134  }
4135 
4148  public function updateObjectLinked($sourceid = null, $sourcetype = '', $targetid = null, $targettype = '', $f_user = null, $notrigger = 0)
4149  {
4150  global $user;
4151  $updatesource = false;
4152  $updatetarget = false;
4153  $f_user = isset($f_user) ? $f_user : $user;
4154 
4155  if (!empty($sourceid) && !empty($sourcetype) && empty($targetid) && empty($targettype)) {
4156  $updatesource = true;
4157  } elseif (empty($sourceid) && empty($sourcetype) && !empty($targetid) && !empty($targettype)) {
4158  $updatetarget = true;
4159  }
4160 
4161  $this->db->begin();
4162  $error = 0;
4163 
4164  $sql = "UPDATE " . $this->db->prefix() . "element_element SET ";
4165  if ($updatesource) {
4166  $sql .= "fk_source = " . ((int) $sourceid);
4167  $sql .= ", sourcetype = '" . $this->db->escape($sourcetype) . "'";
4168  $sql .= " WHERE fk_target = " . ((int) $this->id);
4169  $sql .= " AND targettype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "'";
4170  } elseif ($updatetarget) {
4171  $sql .= "fk_target = " . ((int) $targetid);
4172  $sql .= ", targettype = '" . $this->db->escape($targettype) . "'";
4173  $sql .= " WHERE fk_source = " . ((int) $this->id);
4174  $sql .= " AND sourcetype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "'";
4175  }
4176 
4177  dol_syslog(get_class($this) . "::updateObjectLinked", LOG_DEBUG);
4178  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
4179  if (!$notrigger) {
4180  // Call trigger
4181  $this->context['link_source_id'] = $sourceid;
4182  $this->context['link_source_type'] = $sourcetype;
4183  $this->context['link_target_id'] = $targetid;
4184  $this->context['link_target_type'] = $targettype;
4185  $result = $this->call_trigger('OBJECT_LINK_MODIFY', $f_user);
4186  if ($result < 0) {
4187  $error++;
4188  }
4189  // End call triggers
4190  }
4191  } else {
4192  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
4193  $error++;
4194  }
4195 
4196  if (!$error) {
4197  $this->db->commit();
4198  return 1;
4199  } else {
4200  $this->db->rollback();
4201  return -1;
4202  }
4203  }
4204 
4218  public function deleteObjectLinked($sourceid = null, $sourcetype = '', $targetid = null, $targettype = '', $rowid = '', $f_user = null, $notrigger = 0)
4219  {
4220  global $user;
4221  $deletesource = false;
4222  $deletetarget = false;
4223  $f_user = isset($f_user) ? $f_user : $user;
4224 
4225  if (!empty($sourceid) && !empty($sourcetype) && empty($targetid) && empty($targettype)) {
4226  $deletesource = true;
4227  } elseif (empty($sourceid) && empty($sourcetype) && !empty($targetid) && !empty($targettype)) {
4228  $deletetarget = true;
4229  }
4230 
4231  $sourceid = (!empty($sourceid) ? $sourceid : $this->id);
4232  $sourcetype = (!empty($sourcetype) ? $sourcetype : $this->element);
4233  $targetid = (!empty($targetid) ? $targetid : $this->id);
4234  $targettype = (!empty($targettype) ? $targettype : $this->element);
4235  $this->db->begin();
4236  $error = 0;
4237 
4238  if (!$notrigger) {
4239  // Call trigger
4240  $this->context['link_id'] = $rowid;
4241  $this->context['link_source_id'] = $sourceid;
4242  $this->context['link_source_type'] = $sourcetype;
4243  $this->context['link_target_id'] = $targetid;
4244  $this->context['link_target_type'] = $targettype;
4245  $result = $this->call_trigger('OBJECT_LINK_DELETE', $f_user);
4246  if ($result < 0) {
4247  $error++;
4248  }
4249  // End call triggers
4250  }
4251 
4252  if (!$error) {
4253  $sql = "DELETE FROM " . $this->db->prefix() . "element_element";
4254  $sql .= " WHERE";
4255  if ($rowid > 0) {
4256  $sql .= " rowid = " . ((int) $rowid);
4257  } else {
4258  if ($deletesource) {
4259  $sql .= " fk_source = " . ((int) $sourceid) . " AND sourcetype = '" . $this->db->escape($sourcetype) . "'";
4260  $sql .= " AND fk_target = " . ((int) $this->id) . " AND targettype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "'";
4261  } elseif ($deletetarget) {
4262  $sql .= " fk_target = " . ((int) $targetid) . " AND targettype = '" . $this->db->escape($targettype) . "'";
4263  $sql .= " AND fk_source = " . ((int) $this->id) . " AND sourcetype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "'";
4264  } else {
4265  $sql .= " (fk_source = " . ((int) $this->id) . " AND sourcetype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "')";
4266  $sql .= " OR";
4267  $sql .= " (fk_target = " . ((int) $this->id) . " AND targettype = '" . $this->db->escape($this->element) . "')";
4268  }
4269  }
4270 
4271  dol_syslog(get_class($this) . "::deleteObjectLinked", LOG_DEBUG);
4272  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
4273  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
4274  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
4275  $error++;
4276  }
4277  }
4278 
4279  if (!$error) {
4280  $this->db->commit();
4281  return 1;
4282  } else {
4283  $this->db->rollback();
4284  return 0;
4285  }
4286  }
4287 
4297  public static function getAllItemsLinkedByObjectID($fk_object_where, $field_select, $field_where, $table_element)
4298  {
4299  if (empty($fk_object_where) || empty($field_where) || empty($table_element)) {
4300  return -1;
4301  }
4302 
4303  global $db;
4304 
4305  $sql = "SELECT ".$field_select." FROM ".$db->prefix().$table_element." WHERE ".$field_where." = ".((int) $fk_object_where);
4306  $resql = $db->query($sql);
4307 
4308  $TRes = array();
4309  if (!empty($resql)) {
4310  while ($res = $db->fetch_object($resql)) {
4311  $TRes[] = $res->{$field_select};
4312  }
4313  }
4314 
4315  return $TRes;
4316  }
4317 
4326  public static function deleteAllItemsLinkedByObjectID($fk_object_where, $field_where, $table_element)
4327  {
4328  if (empty($fk_object_where) || empty($field_where) || empty($table_element)) {
4329  return -1;
4330  }
4331 
4332  global $db;
4333 
4334  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".$db->prefix().$table_element." WHERE ".$field_where." = ".((int) $fk_object_where);
4335  $resql = $db->query($sql);
4336 
4337  if (empty($resql)) {
4338  return 0;
4339  }
4340 
4341  return 1;
4342  }
4343 
4354  public function setStatut($status, $elementId = null, $elementType = '', $trigkey = '', $fieldstatus = 'fk_statut')
4355  {
4356  global $user, $langs, $conf;
4357 
4358  $savElementId = $elementId; // To be used later to know if we were using the method using the id of this or not.
4359 
4360  $elementId = (!empty($elementId) ? $elementId : $this->id);
4361  $elementTable = (!empty($elementType) ? $elementType : $this->table_element);
4362 
4363  $this->db->begin();
4364 
4365  if ($elementTable == 'facture_rec') {
4366  $fieldstatus = "suspended";
4367  }
4368  if ($elementTable == 'mailing') {
4369  $fieldstatus = "statut";
4370  }
4371  if ($elementTable == 'cronjob') {
4372  $fieldstatus = "status";
4373  }
4374  if ($elementTable == 'user') {
4375  $fieldstatus = "statut";
4376  }
4377  if ($elementTable == 'expensereport') {
4378  $fieldstatus = "fk_statut";
4379  }
4380  if ($elementTable == 'commande_fournisseur_dispatch') {
4381  $fieldstatus = "status";
4382  }
4383  if (isset($this->fields) && is_array($this->fields) && array_key_exists('status', $this->fields)) {
4384  $fieldstatus = 'status';
4385  }
4386 
4387  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$elementTable;
4388  $sql .= " SET ".$fieldstatus." = ".((int) $status);
4389  // If status = 1 = validated, update also fk_user_valid
4390  // TODO Replace the test on $elementTable by doing a test on existence of the field in $this->fields
4391  if ($status == 1 && in_array($elementTable, array('expensereport', 'inventory'))) {
4392  $sql .= ", fk_user_valid = ".((int) $user->id);
4393  }
4394  if ($status == 1 && in_array($elementTable, array('expensereport'))) {
4395  $sql .= ", date_valid = '".$this->db->idate(dol_now())."'";
4396  }
4397  if ($status == 1 && in_array($elementTable, array('inventory'))) {
4398  $sql .= ", date_validation = '".$this->db->idate(dol_now())."'";
4399  }
4400  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $elementId);
4401  $sql .= " AND ".$fieldstatus." <> ".((int) $status); // We avoid update if status already correct
4402 
4403  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setStatut", LOG_DEBUG);
4404  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4405  if ($resql) {
4406  $error = 0;
4407 
4408  $nb_rows_affected = $this->db->affected_rows($resql); // should be 1 or 0 if status was already correct
4409 
4410  if ($nb_rows_affected > 0) {
4411  if (empty($trigkey)) {
4412  // Try to guess trigkey (for backward compatibility, now we should have trigkey defined into the call of setStatus)
4413  if ($this->element == 'supplier_proposal' && $status == 2) {
4414  $trigkey = 'SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL_SIGN'; // 2 = SupplierProposal::STATUS_SIGNED. Can't use constant into this generic class
4415  }
4416  if ($this->element == 'supplier_proposal' && $status == 3) {
4417  $trigkey = 'SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL_REFUSE'; // 3 = SupplierProposal::STATUS_REFUSED. Can't use constant into this generic class
4418  }
4419  if ($this->element == 'supplier_proposal' && $status == 4) {
4420  $trigkey = 'SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL_CLOSE'; // 4 = SupplierProposal::STATUS_CLOSED. Can't use constant into this generic class
4421  }
4422  if ($this->element == 'fichinter' && $status == 3) {
4423  $trigkey = 'FICHINTER_CLASSIFY_DONE';
4424  }
4425  if ($this->element == 'fichinter' && $status == 2) {
4426  $trigkey = 'FICHINTER_CLASSIFY_BILLED';
4427  }
4428  if ($this->element == 'fichinter' && $status == 1) {
4429  $trigkey = 'FICHINTER_CLASSIFY_UNBILLED';
4430  }
4431  }
4432 
4433  if ($trigkey) {
4434  // Call trigger
4435  $result = $this->call_trigger($trigkey, $user);
4436  if ($result < 0) {
4437  $error++;
4438  }
4439  // End call triggers
4440  }
4441  } else {
4442  // The status was probably already good. We do nothing more, no triggers.
4443  }
4444 
4445  if (!$error) {
4446  $this->db->commit();
4447 
4448  if (empty($savElementId)) {
4449  // If the element we update is $this (so $elementId was provided as null)
4450  if ($fieldstatus == 'tosell') {
4451  $this->status = $status;
4452  } elseif ($fieldstatus == 'tobuy') {
4453  $this->status_buy = $status;
4454  } else {
4455  $this->statut = $status;
4456  $this->status = $status;
4457  }
4458  }
4459 
4460  return 1;
4461  } else {
4462  $this->db->rollback();
4463  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setStatut ".$this->error, LOG_ERR);
4464  return -1;
4465  }
4466  } else {
4467  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
4468  $this->db->rollback();
4469  return -1;
4470  }
4471  }
4472 
4473 
4481  public function getCanvas($id = 0, $ref = '')
4482  {
4483  global $conf;
4484 
4485  if (empty($id) && empty($ref)) {
4486  return 0;
4487  }
4488  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_DISABLE_CANVAS)) {
4489  return 0; // To increase speed. Not enabled by default.
4490  }
4491 
4492  // Clean parameters
4493  $ref = trim($ref);
4494 
4495  $sql = "SELECT rowid, canvas";
4496  $sql .= " FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element;
4497  $sql .= " WHERE entity IN (".getEntity($this->element).")";
4498  if (!empty($id)) {
4499  $sql .= " AND rowid = ".((int) $id);
4500  }
4501  if (!empty($ref)) {
4502  $sql .= " AND ref = '".$this->db->escape($ref)."'";
4503  }
4504 
4505  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4506  if ($resql) {
4507  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
4508  if ($obj) {
4509  $this->canvas = $obj->canvas;
4510  return 1;
4511  } else {
4512  return 0;
4513  }
4514  } else {
4515  dol_print_error($this->db);
4516  return -1;
4517  }
4518  }
4519 
4520 
4527  public function getSpecialCode($lineid)
4528  {
4529  $sql = "SELECT special_code FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line;
4530  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $lineid);
4531  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4532  if ($resql) {
4533  $row = $this->db->fetch_row($resql);
4534  return $row[0];
4535  }
4536  }
4537 
4546  public function isObjectUsed($id = 0, $entity = 0)
4547  {
4548  global $langs;
4549 
4550  if (empty($id)) {
4551  $id = $this->id;
4552  }
4553 
4554  // Check parameters
4555  if (!isset($this->childtables) || !is_array($this->childtables) || count($this->childtables) == 0) {
4556  dol_print_error('Called isObjectUsed on a class with property this->childtables not defined');
4557  return -1;
4558  }
4559 
4560  $arraytoscan = $this->childtables;
4561  // For backward compatibility, we check if array is old format array('table1', 'table2', ...)
4562  $tmparray = array_keys($this->childtables);
4563  if (is_numeric($tmparray[0])) {
4564  $arraytoscan = array_flip($this->childtables);
4565  }
4566 
4567  // Test if child exists
4568  $haschild = 0;
4569  foreach ($arraytoscan as $table => $element) {
4570  //print $id.'-'.$table.'-'.$elementname.'<br>';
4571  // Check if element can be deleted
4572  $sql = "SELECT COUNT(*) as nb";
4573  $sql.= " FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$table." as c";
4574  if (!empty($element['parent']) && !empty($element['parentkey'])) {
4575  $sql.= ", ".$this->db->prefix().$element['parent']." as p";
4576  }
4577  $sql.= " WHERE c.".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $id);
4578  if (!empty($element['parent']) && !empty($element['parentkey'])) {
4579  $sql.= " AND c.".$element['parentkey']." = p.rowid";
4580  }
4581  if (!empty($entity)) {
4582  if (!empty($element['parent']) && !empty($element['parentkey'])) {
4583  $sql.= " AND p.entity = ".((int) $entity);
4584  } else {
4585  $sql.= " AND c.entity = ".((int) $entity);
4586  }
4587  }
4588  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4589  if ($resql) {
4590  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
4591  if ($obj->nb > 0) {
4592  $langs->load("errors");
4593  //print 'Found into table '.$table.', type '.$langs->transnoentitiesnoconv($elementname).', haschild='.$haschild;
4594  $haschild += $obj->nb;
4595  if (is_numeric($element)) { // very old usage array('table1', 'table2', ...)
4596  $this->errors[] = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("ErrorRecordHasAtLeastOneChildOfType", method_exists($this, 'getNomUrl') ? $this->getNomUrl() : $this->ref, $table);
4597  } elseif (is_string($element)) { // old usage array('table1' => 'TranslateKey1', 'table2' => 'TranslateKey2', ...)
4598  $this->errors[] = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("ErrorRecordHasAtLeastOneChildOfType", method_exists($this, 'getNomUrl') ? $this->getNomUrl() : $this->ref, $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv($element));
4599  } else { // new usage: $element['name']=Translation key
4600  $this->errors[] = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv("ErrorRecordHasAtLeastOneChildOfType", method_exists($this, 'getNomUrl') ? $this->getNomUrl() : $this->ref, $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv($element['name']));
4601  }
4602  break; // We found at least one, we stop here
4603  }
4604  } else {
4605  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
4606  return -1;
4607  }
4608  }
4609  if ($haschild > 0) {
4610  $this->errors[] = "ErrorRecordHasChildren";
4611  return $haschild;
4612  } else {
4613  return 0;
4614  }
4615  }
4616 
4623  public function hasProductsOrServices($predefined = -1)
4624  {
4625  $nb = 0;
4626 
4627  foreach ($this->lines as $key => $val) {
4628  $qualified = 0;
4629  if ($predefined == -1) {
4630  $qualified = 1;
4631  }
4632  if ($predefined == 1 && $val->fk_product > 0) {
4633  $qualified = 1;
4634  }
4635  if ($predefined == 0 && $val->fk_product <= 0) {
4636  $qualified = 1;
4637  }
4638  if ($predefined == 2 && $val->fk_product > 0 && $val->product_type == 0) {
4639  $qualified = 1;
4640  }
4641  if ($predefined == 3 && $val->fk_product > 0 && $val->product_type == 1) {
4642  $qualified = 1;
4643  }
4644  if ($qualified) {
4645  $nb++;
4646  }
4647  }
4648  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::hasProductsOrServices we found '.$nb.' qualified lines of products/servcies');
4649  return $nb;
4650  }
4651 
4657  public function getTotalDiscount()
4658  {
4659  if (!empty($this->table_element_line) ) {
4660  $total_discount = 0.00;
4661 
4662  $sql = "SELECT subprice as pu_ht, qty, remise_percent, total_ht";
4663  $sql .= " FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line;
4664  $sql .= " WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
4665 
4666  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::getTotalDiscount', LOG_DEBUG);
4667  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4668  if ($resql) {
4669  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
4670  $i = 0;
4671  while ($i < $num) {
4672  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
4673 
4674  $pu_ht = $obj->pu_ht;
4675  $qty = $obj->qty;
4676  $total_ht = $obj->total_ht;
4677 
4678  $total_discount_line = floatval(price2num(($pu_ht * $qty) - $total_ht, 'MT'));
4679  $total_discount += $total_discount_line;
4680 
4681  $i++;
4682  }
4683  }
4684 
4685  //print $total_discount; exit;
4686  return price2num($total_discount);
4687  }
4688 
4689  return null;
4690  }
4691 
4692 
4699  public function getTotalWeightVolume()
4700  {
4701  $totalWeight = 0;
4702  $totalVolume = 0;
4703  // defined for shipment only
4704  $totalOrdered = '';
4705  // defined for shipment only
4706  $totalToShip = '';
4707 
4708  foreach ($this->lines as $line) {
4709  if (isset($line->qty_asked)) {
4710  if (empty($totalOrdered)) {
4711  $totalOrdered = 0; // Avoid warning because $totalOrdered is ''
4712  }
4713  $totalOrdered += $line->qty_asked; // defined for shipment only
4714  }
4715  if (isset($line->qty_shipped)) {
4716  if (empty($totalToShip)) {
4717  $totalToShip = 0; // Avoid warning because $totalToShip is ''
4718  }
4719  $totalToShip += $line->qty_shipped; // defined for shipment only
4720  } elseif ($line->element == 'commandefournisseurdispatch' && isset($line->qty)) {
4721  if (empty($totalToShip)) {
4722  $totalToShip = 0;
4723  }
4724  $totalToShip += $line->qty; // defined for reception only
4725  }
4726 
4727  // Define qty, weight, volume, weight_units, volume_units
4728  if ($this->element == 'shipping') {
4729  // for shipments
4730  $qty = $line->qty_shipped ? $line->qty_shipped : 0;
4731  } else {
4732  $qty = $line->qty ? $line->qty : 0;
4733  }
4734 
4735  $weight = !empty($line->weight) ? $line->weight : 0;
4736  ($weight == 0 && !empty($line->product->weight)) ? $weight = $line->product->weight : 0;
4737  $volume = !empty($line->volume) ? $line->volume : 0;
4738  ($volume == 0 && !empty($line->product->volume)) ? $volume = $line->product->volume : 0;
4739 
4740  $weight_units = !empty($line->weight_units) ? $line->weight_units : 0;
4741  ($weight_units == 0 && !empty($line->product->weight_units)) ? $weight_units = $line->product->weight_units : 0;
4742  $volume_units = !empty($line->volume_units) ? $line->volume_units : 0;
4743  ($volume_units == 0 && !empty($line->product->volume_units)) ? $volume_units = $line->product->volume_units : 0;
4744 
4745  $weightUnit = 0;
4746  $volumeUnit = 0;
4747  if (!empty($weight_units)) {
4748  $weightUnit = $weight_units;
4749  }
4750  if (!empty($volume_units)) {
4751  $volumeUnit = $volume_units;
4752  }
4753 
4754  if (empty($totalWeight)) {
4755  $totalWeight = 0; // Avoid warning because $totalWeight is ''
4756  }
4757  if (empty($totalVolume)) {
4758  $totalVolume = 0; // Avoid warning because $totalVolume is ''
4759  }
4760 
4761  //var_dump($line->volume_units);
4762  if ($weight_units < 50) { // < 50 means a standard unit (power of 10 of official unit), > 50 means an exotic unit (like inch)
4763  $trueWeightUnit = pow(10, $weightUnit);
4764  $totalWeight += $weight * $qty * $trueWeightUnit;
4765  } else {
4766  if ($weight_units == 99) {
4767  // conversion 1 Pound = 0.45359237 KG
4768  $trueWeightUnit = 0.45359237;
4769  $totalWeight += $weight * $qty * $trueWeightUnit;
4770  } elseif ($weight_units == 98) {
4771  // conversion 1 Ounce = 0.0283495 KG
4772  $trueWeightUnit = 0.0283495;
4773  $totalWeight += $weight * $qty * $trueWeightUnit;
4774  } else {
4775  $totalWeight += $weight * $qty; // This may be wrong if we mix different units
4776  }
4777  }
4778  if ($volume_units < 50) { // >50 means a standard unit (power of 10 of official unit), > 50 means an exotic unit (like inch)
4779  //print $line->volume."x".$line->volume_units."x".($line->volume_units < 50)."x".$volumeUnit;
4780  $trueVolumeUnit = pow(10, $volumeUnit);
4781  //print $line->volume;
4782  $totalVolume += $volume * $qty * $trueVolumeUnit;
4783  } else {
4784  $totalVolume += $volume * $qty; // This may be wrong if we mix different units
4785  }
4786  }
4787 
4788  return array('weight'=>$totalWeight, 'volume'=>$totalVolume, 'ordered'=>$totalOrdered, 'toship'=>$totalToShip);
4789  }
4790 
4791 
4797  public function setExtraParameters()
4798  {
4799  $this->db->begin();
4800 
4801  $extraparams = (!empty($this->extraparams) ? json_encode($this->extraparams) : null);
4802 
4803  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element;
4804  $sql .= " SET extraparams = ".(!empty($extraparams) ? "'".$this->db->escape($extraparams)."'" : "null");
4805  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
4806 
4807  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setExtraParameters", LOG_DEBUG);
4808  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
4809  if (!$resql) {
4810  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
4811  $this->db->rollback();
4812  return -1;
4813  } else {
4814  $this->db->commit();
4815  return 1;
4816  }
4817  }
4818 
4819 
4820  // --------------------
4821  // TODO: All functions here must be redesigned and moved as they are not business functions but output functions
4822  // --------------------
4823 
4824  /* This is to show add lines */
4825 
4835  public function formAddObjectLine($dateSelector, $seller, $buyer, $defaulttpldir = '/core/tpl')
4836  {
4837  global $conf, $user, $langs, $object, $hookmanager, $extrafields;
4838  global $form;
4839 
4840  // Line extrafield
4841  if (!is_object($extrafields)) {
4842  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extrafields.class.php';
4843  $extrafields = new ExtraFields($this->db);
4844  }
4845  $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($this->table_element_line);
4846 
4847  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
4848  // Use global variables + $dateSelector + $seller and $buyer
4849  // Note: This is deprecated. If you need to overwrite the tpl file, use instead the hook 'formAddObjectLine'.
4850  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array($defaulttpldir));
4851  foreach ($dirtpls as $module => $reldir) {
4852  if (!empty($module)) {
4853  $tpl = dol_buildpath($reldir.'/objectline_create.tpl.php');
4854  } else {
4855  $tpl = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.$reldir.'/objectline_create.tpl.php';
4856  }
4857 
4858  if (empty($conf->file->strict_mode)) {
4859  $res = @include $tpl;
4860  } else {
4861  $res = include $tpl; // for debug
4862  }
4863  if ($res) {
4864  break;
4865  }
4866  }
4867  }
4868

4873 
4888  public function printObjectLines($action, $seller, $buyer, $selected = 0, $dateSelector = 0, $defaulttpldir = '/core/tpl')
4889  {
4890  global $conf, $hookmanager, $langs, $user, $form, $extrafields, $object;
4891  // TODO We should not use global var for this
4892  global $inputalsopricewithtax, $usemargins, $disableedit, $disablemove, $disableremove, $outputalsopricetotalwithtax;
4893 
4894  // Define usemargins
4895  $usemargins = 0;
4896  if (isModEnabled('margin') && !empty($this->element) && in_array($this->element, array('facture', 'facturerec', 'propal', 'commande'))) {
4897  $usemargins = 1;
4898  }
4899 
4900  $num = count($this->lines);
4901 
4902  // Line extrafield
4903  if (!is_object($extrafields)) {
4904  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extrafields.class.php';
4905  $extrafields = new ExtraFields($this->db);
4906  }
4907  $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($this->table_element_line);
4908 
4909  $parameters = array('num'=>$num, 'dateSelector'=>$dateSelector, 'seller'=>$seller, 'buyer'=>$buyer, 'selected'=>$selected, 'table_element_line'=>$this->table_element_line);
4910  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printObjectLineTitle', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
4911  if (empty($reshook)) {
4912  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
4913  // Use global variables + $dateSelector + $seller and $buyer
4914  // Note: This is deprecated. If you need to overwrite the tpl file, use instead the hook.
4915  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array($defaulttpldir));
4916  foreach ($dirtpls as $module => $reldir) {
4917  $res = 0;
4918  if (!empty($module)) {
4919  $tpl = dol_buildpath($reldir.'/objectline_title.tpl.php');
4920  } else {
4921  $tpl = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.$reldir.'/objectline_title.tpl.php';
4922  }
4923  if (file_exists($tpl)) {
4924  if (empty($conf->file->strict_mode)) {
4925  $res = @include $tpl;
4926  } else {
4927  $res = include $tpl; // for debug
4928  }
4929  }
4930  if ($res) {
4931  break;
4932  }
4933  }
4934  }
4935 
4936  $i = 0;
4937 
4938  print "<!-- begin printObjectLines() --><tbody>\n";
4939  foreach ($this->lines as $line) {
4940  //Line extrafield
4941  $line->fetch_optionals();
4942 
4943  //if (is_object($hookmanager) && (($line->product_type == 9 && !empty($line->special_code)) || !empty($line->fk_parent_line)))
4944  if (is_object($hookmanager)) { // Old code is commented on preceding line.
4945  if (empty($line->fk_parent_line)) {
4946  $parameters = array('line'=>$line, 'num'=>$num, 'i'=>$i, 'dateSelector'=>$dateSelector, 'seller'=>$seller, 'buyer'=>$buyer, 'selected'=>$selected, 'table_element_line'=>$line->table_element);
4947  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printObjectLine', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
4948  } else {
4949  $parameters = array('line'=>$line, 'num'=>$num, 'i'=>$i, 'dateSelector'=>$dateSelector, 'seller'=>$seller, 'buyer'=>$buyer, 'selected'=>$selected, 'table_element_line'=>$line->table_element, 'fk_parent_line'=>$line->fk_parent_line);
4950  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printObjectSubLine', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
4951  }
4952  }
4953  if (empty($reshook)) {
4954  $this->printObjectLine($action, $line, '', $num, $i, $dateSelector, $seller, $buyer, $selected, $extrafields, $defaulttpldir);
4955  }
4956 
4957  $i++;
4958  }
4959  print "</tbody><!-- end printObjectLines() -->\n";
4960  }
4961 
4979  public function printObjectLine($action, $line, $var, $num, $i, $dateSelector, $seller, $buyer, $selected = 0, $extrafields = null, $defaulttpldir = '/core/tpl')
4980  {
4981  global $conf, $langs, $user, $object, $hookmanager;
4982  global $form;
4983  global $object_rights, $disableedit, $disablemove, $disableremove; // TODO We should not use global var for this !
4984 
4985  $object_rights = $this->getRights();
4986 
4987  $element = $this->element;
4988 
4989  $text = '';
4990  $description = '';
4991 
4992  // Line in view mode
4993  if ($action != 'editline' || $selected != $line->id) {
4994  // Product
4995  if (!empty($line->fk_product) && $line->fk_product > 0) {
4996  $product_static = new Product($this->db);
4997  $product_static->fetch($line->fk_product);
4998 
4999  $product_static->ref = $line->ref; //can change ref in hook
5000  $product_static->label = !empty($line->label) ? $line->label : ""; //can change label in hook
5001 
5002  $text = $product_static->getNomUrl(1);
5003 
5004  // Define output language and label
5005  if (getDolGlobalInt('MAIN_MULTILANGS')) {
5006  if (property_exists($this, 'socid') && !is_object($this->thirdparty)) {
5007  dol_print_error('', 'Error: Method printObjectLine was called on an object and object->fetch_thirdparty was not done before');
5008  return;
5009  }
5010 
5011  $prod = new Product($this->db);
5012  $prod->fetch($line->fk_product);
5013 
5014  $outputlangs = $langs;
5015  $newlang = '';
5016  if (empty($newlang) && GETPOST('lang_id', 'aZ09')) {
5017  $newlang = GETPOST('lang_id', 'aZ09');
5018  }
5019  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUIT_TEXTS_IN_THIRDPARTY_LANGUAGE) && empty($newlang) && is_object($this->thirdparty)) {
5020  $newlang = $this->thirdparty->default_lang; // To use language of customer
5021  }
5022  if (!empty($newlang)) {
5023  $outputlangs = new Translate("", $conf);
5024  $outputlangs->setDefaultLang($newlang);
5025  }
5026 
5027  $label = (!empty($prod->multilangs[$outputlangs->defaultlang]["label"])) ? $prod->multilangs[$outputlangs->defaultlang]["label"] : $line->product_label;
5028  } else {
5029  $label = $line->product_label;
5030  }
5031 
5032  $text .= ' - '.(!empty($line->label) ? $line->label : $label);
5033  $description .= (getDolGlobalInt('PRODUIT_DESC_IN_FORM_ACCORDING_TO_DEVICE') ? '' : (!empty($line->description) ? dol_htmlentitiesbr($line->description) : '')); // Description is what to show on popup. We shown nothing if already into desc.
5034  }
5035 
5036  $line->pu_ttc = price2num((!empty($line->subprice) ? $line->subprice : 0) * (1 + ((!empty($line->tva_tx) ? $line->tva_tx : 0) / 100)), 'MU');
5037 
5038  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
5039  // Use global variables + $dateSelector + $seller and $buyer
5040  // Note: This is deprecated. If you need to overwrite the tpl file, use instead the hook printObjectLine and printObjectSubLine.
5041  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array($defaulttpldir));
5042  foreach ($dirtpls as $module => $reldir) {
5043  $res = 0;
5044  if (!empty($module)) {
5045  $tpl = dol_buildpath($reldir.'/objectline_view.tpl.php');
5046  } else {
5047  $tpl = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.$reldir.'/objectline_view.tpl.php';
5048  }
5049  if (file_exists($tpl)) {
5050  if (empty($conf->file->strict_mode)) {
5051  $res = @include $tpl;
5052  } else {
5053  $res = include $tpl; // for debug
5054  }
5055  }
5056  if ($res) {
5057  break;
5058  }
5059  }
5060  }
5061 
5062  // Line in update mode
5063  if ($this->statut == 0 && $action == 'editline' && $selected == $line->id) {
5064  $label = (!empty($line->label) ? $line->label : (($line->fk_product > 0) ? $line->product_label : ''));
5065 
5066  $line->pu_ttc = price2num($line->subprice * (1 + ($line->tva_tx / 100)), 'MU');
5067 
5068  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
5069  // Use global variables + $dateSelector + $seller and $buyer
5070  // Note: This is deprecated. If you need to overwrite the tpl file, use instead the hook printObjectLine and printObjectSubLine.
5071  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array($defaulttpldir));
5072  foreach ($dirtpls as $module => $reldir) {
5073  if (!empty($module)) {
5074  $tpl = dol_buildpath($reldir.'/objectline_edit.tpl.php');
5075  } else {
5076  $tpl = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.$reldir.'/objectline_edit.tpl.php';
5077  }
5078 
5079  if (empty($conf->file->strict_mode)) {
5080  $res = @include $tpl;
5081  } else {
5082  $res = include $tpl; // for debug
5083  }
5084  if ($res) {
5085  break;
5086  }
5087  }
5088  }
5089  }
5090

5092  /* This is to show array of line of details of source object */
5093 
5094 
5105  public function printOriginLinesList($restrictlist = '', $selectedLines = array())
5106  {
5107  global $langs, $hookmanager, $conf, $form, $action;
5108 
5109  print '<tr class="liste_titre">';
5110  print '<td class="linecolref">'.$langs->trans('Ref').'</td>';
5111  print '<td class="linecoldescription">'.$langs->trans('Description').'</td>';
5112  print '<td class="linecolvat right">'.$langs->trans('VATRate').'</td>';
5113  print '<td class="linecoluht right">'.$langs->trans('PriceUHT').'</td>';
5114  if (isModEnabled("multicurrency")) {
5115  print '<td class="linecoluht_currency right">'.$langs->trans('PriceUHTCurrency').'</td>';
5116  }
5117  print '<td class="linecolqty right">'.$langs->trans('Qty').'</td>';
5118  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
5119  print '<td class="linecoluseunit left">'.$langs->trans('Unit').'</td>';
5120  }
5121  print '<td class="linecoldiscount right">'.$langs->trans('ReductionShort').'</td>';
5122  print '<td class="linecolht right">'.$langs->trans('TotalHT').'</td>';
5123  print '<td class="center">'.$form->showCheckAddButtons('checkforselect', 1).'</td>';
5124  print '</tr>';
5125  $i = 0;
5126 
5127  if (!empty($this->lines)) {
5128  foreach ($this->lines as $line) {
5129  $reshook = 0;
5130  //if (is_object($hookmanager) && (($line->product_type == 9 && !empty($line->special_code)) || !empty($line->fk_parent_line))) {
5131  if (is_object($hookmanager)) { // Old code is commented on preceding line.
5132  $parameters = array('line'=>$line, 'i'=>$i, 'restrictlist'=>$restrictlist, 'selectedLines'=> $selectedLines);
5133  if (!empty($line->fk_parent_line)) { $parameters['fk_parent_line'] = $line->fk_parent_line; }
5134  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('printOriginObjectLine', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
5135  }
5136  if (empty($reshook)) {
5137  $this->printOriginLine($line, '', $restrictlist, '/core/tpl', $selectedLines);
5138  }
5139 
5140  $i++;
5141  }
5142  }
5143  }
5144 
5158  public function printOriginLine($line, $var, $restrictlist = '', $defaulttpldir = '/core/tpl', $selectedLines = array())
5159  {
5160  global $langs, $conf;
5161 
5162  //var_dump($line);
5163  if (!empty($line->date_start)) {
5164  $date_start = $line->date_start;
5165  } else {
5166  $date_start = $line->date_debut_prevue;
5167  if ($line->date_debut_reel) {
5168  $date_start = $line->date_debut_reel;
5169  }
5170  }
5171  if (!empty($line->date_end)) {
5172  $date_end = $line->date_end;
5173  } else {
5174  $date_end = $line->date_fin_prevue;
5175  if ($line->date_fin_reel) {
5176  $date_end = $line->date_fin_reel;
5177  }
5178  }
5179 
5180  $this->tpl['id'] = $line->id;
5181 
5182  $this->tpl['label'] = '';
5183  if (!empty($line->fk_parent_line)) {
5184  $this->tpl['label'] .= img_picto('', 'rightarrow');
5185  }
5186 
5187  if (($line->info_bits & 2) == 2) { // TODO Not sure this is used for source object
5188  $discount = new DiscountAbsolute($this->db);
5189  $discount->fk_soc = $this->socid;
5190  $this->tpl['label'] .= $discount->getNomUrl(0, 'discount');
5191  } elseif (!empty($line->fk_product)) {
5192  $productstatic = new Product($this->db);
5193  $productstatic->id = $line->fk_product;
5194  $productstatic->ref = $line->ref;
