5195  $productstatic->type = $line->fk_product_type;
5196  if (empty($productstatic->ref)) {
5197  $line->fetch_product();
5198  $productstatic = $line->product;
5199  }
5200 
5201  $this->tpl['label'] .= $productstatic->getNomUrl(1);
5202  $this->tpl['label'] .= ' - '.(!empty($line->label) ? $line->label : $line->product_label);
5203  // Dates
5204  if ($line->product_type == 1 && ($date_start || $date_end)) {
5205  $this->tpl['label'] .= get_date_range($date_start, $date_end);
5206  }
5207  } else {
5208  $this->tpl['label'] .= ($line->product_type == -1 ? '&nbsp;' : ($line->product_type == 1 ? img_object($langs->trans(''), 'service') : img_object($langs->trans(''), 'product')));
5209  if (!empty($line->desc)) {
5210  $this->tpl['label'] .= $line->desc;
5211  } else {
5212  $this->tpl['label'] .= ($line->label ? '&nbsp;'.$line->label : '');
5213  }
5214 
5215  // Dates
5216  if ($line->product_type == 1 && ($date_start || $date_end)) {
5217  $this->tpl['label'] .= get_date_range($date_start, $date_end);
5218  }
5219  }
5220 
5221  if (!empty($line->desc)) {
5222  if ($line->desc == '(CREDIT_NOTE)') { // TODO Not sure this is used for source object
5223  $discount = new DiscountAbsolute($this->db);
5224  $discount->fetch($line->fk_remise_except);
5225  $this->tpl['description'] = $langs->transnoentities("DiscountFromCreditNote", $discount->getNomUrl(0));
5226  } elseif ($line->desc == '(DEPOSIT)') { // TODO Not sure this is used for source object
5227  $discount = new DiscountAbsolute($this->db);
5228  $discount->fetch($line->fk_remise_except);
5229  $this->tpl['description'] = $langs->transnoentities("DiscountFromDeposit", $discount->getNomUrl(0));
5230  } elseif ($line->desc == '(EXCESS RECEIVED)') {
5231  $discount = new DiscountAbsolute($this->db);
5232  $discount->fetch($line->fk_remise_except);
5233  $this->tpl['description'] = $langs->transnoentities("DiscountFromExcessReceived", $discount->getNomUrl(0));
5234  } elseif ($line->desc == '(EXCESS PAID)') {
5235  $discount = new DiscountAbsolute($this->db);
5236  $discount->fetch($line->fk_remise_except);
5237  $this->tpl['description'] = $langs->transnoentities("DiscountFromExcessPaid", $discount->getNomUrl(0));
5238  } else {
5239  $this->tpl['description'] = dol_trunc($line->desc, 60);
5240  }
5241  } else {
5242  $this->tpl['description'] = '&nbsp;';
5243  }
5244 
5245  // VAT Rate
5246  $this->tpl['vat_rate'] = vatrate($line->tva_tx, true);
5247  $this->tpl['vat_rate'] .= (($line->info_bits & 1) == 1) ? '*' : '';
5248  if (!empty($line->vat_src_code) && !preg_match('/\‍(/', $this->tpl['vat_rate'])) {
5249  $this->tpl['vat_rate'] .= ' ('.$line->vat_src_code.')';
5250  }
5251 
5252  $this->tpl['price'] = price($line->subprice);
5253  $this->tpl['total_ht'] = price($line->total_ht);
5254  $this->tpl['multicurrency_price'] = price($line->multicurrency_subprice);
5255  $this->tpl['qty'] = (($line->info_bits & 2) != 2) ? $line->qty : '&nbsp;';
5256  if (!empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_USE_UNITS)) {
5257  $this->tpl['unit'] = $langs->transnoentities($line->getLabelOfUnit('long'));
5258  }
5259  $this->tpl['remise_percent'] = (($line->info_bits & 2) != 2) ? vatrate($line->remise_percent, true) : '&nbsp;';
5260 
5261  // Is the line strike or not
5262  $this->tpl['strike'] = 0;
5263  if ($restrictlist == 'services' && $line->product_type != Product::TYPE_SERVICE) {
5264  $this->tpl['strike'] = 1;
5265  }
5266 
5267  // Output template part (modules that overwrite templates must declare this into descriptor)
5268  // Use global variables + $dateSelector + $seller and $buyer
5269  $dirtpls = array_merge($conf->modules_parts['tpl'], array($defaulttpldir));
5270  foreach ($dirtpls as $module => $reldir) {
5271  if (!empty($module)) {
5272  $tpl = dol_buildpath($reldir.'/originproductline.tpl.php');
5273  } else {
5274  $tpl = DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.$reldir.'/originproductline.tpl.php';
5275  }
5276 
5277  if (empty($conf->file->strict_mode)) {
5278  $res = @include $tpl;
5279  } else {
5280  $res = include $tpl; // for debug
5281  }
5282  if ($res) {
5283  break;
5284  }
5285  }
5286  }
5287 
5288 
5289  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5300  public function add_element_resource($resource_id, $resource_type, $busy = 0, $mandatory = 0)
5301  {
5302  // phpcs:enable
5303  $this->db->begin();
5304 
5305  $sql = "INSERT INTO ".$this->db->prefix()."element_resources (";
5306  $sql .= "resource_id";
5307  $sql .= ", resource_type";
5308  $sql .= ", element_id";
5309  $sql .= ", element_type";
5310  $sql .= ", busy";
5311  $sql .= ", mandatory";
5312  $sql .= ") VALUES (";
5313  $sql .= $resource_id;
5314  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($resource_type)."'";
5315  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->id)."'";
5316  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($this->element)."'";
5317  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($busy)."'";
5318  $sql .= ", '".$this->db->escape($mandatory)."'";
5319  $sql .= ")";
5320 
5321  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::add_element_resource", LOG_DEBUG);
5322  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
5323  $this->db->commit();
5324  return 1;
5325  } else {
5326  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
5327  $this->db->rollback();
5328  return 0;
5329  }
5330  }
5331 
5332  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5341  public function delete_resource($rowid, $element, $notrigger = 0)
5342  {
5343  // phpcs:enable
5344  global $user;
5345 
5346  $this->db->begin();
5347 
5348  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".$this->db->prefix()."element_resources";
5349  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $rowid);
5350 
5351  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::delete_resource", LOG_DEBUG);
5352 
5353  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5354  if (!$resql) {
5355  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
5356  $this->db->rollback();
5357  return -1;
5358  } else {
5359  if (!$notrigger) {
5360  $result = $this->call_trigger(strtoupper($element).'_DELETE_RESOURCE', $user);
5361  if ($result < 0) {
5362  $this->db->rollback();
5363  return -1;
5364  }
5365  }
5366  $this->db->commit();
5367  return 1;
5368  }
5369  }
5370 
5371 
5377  public function __clone()
5378  {
5379  // Force a copy of this->lines, otherwise it will point to same object.
5380  if (isset($this->lines) && is_array($this->lines)) {
5381  $nboflines = count($this->lines);
5382  for ($i = 0; $i < $nboflines; $i++) {
5383  $this->lines[$i] = clone $this->lines[$i];
5384  }
5385  }
5386  }
5387 
5401  protected function commonGenerateDocument($modelspath, $modele, $outputlangs, $hidedetails, $hidedesc, $hideref, $moreparams = null)
5402  {
5403  global $conf, $langs, $user, $hookmanager, $action;
5404 
5405  $srctemplatepath = '';
5406 
5407  $parameters = array('modelspath'=>$modelspath, 'modele'=>$modele, 'outputlangs'=>$outputlangs, 'hidedetails'=>$hidedetails, 'hidedesc'=>$hidedesc, 'hideref'=>$hideref, 'moreparams'=>$moreparams);
5408  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('commonGenerateDocument', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by some hooks
5409 
5410  if (empty($reshook)) {
5411  dol_syslog("commonGenerateDocument modele=".$modele." outputlangs->defaultlang=".(is_object($outputlangs) ? $outputlangs->defaultlang : 'null'));
5412 
5413  if (empty($modele)) {
5414  $this->error = 'BadValueForParameterModele';
5415  return -1;
5416  }
5417 
5418  // Increase limit for PDF build
5419  $err = error_reporting();
5420  error_reporting(0);
5421  @set_time_limit(120);
5422  error_reporting($err);
5423 
5424  // If selected model is a filename template (then $modele="modelname" or "modelname:filename")
5425  $tmp = explode(':', $modele, 2);
5426  if (!empty($tmp[1])) {
5427  $modele = $tmp[0];
5428  $srctemplatepath = $tmp[1];
5429  }
5430 
5431  // Search template files
5432  $file = '';
5433  $classname = '';
5434  $filefound = '';
5435  $dirmodels = array('/');
5436  if (is_array($conf->modules_parts['models'])) {
5437  $dirmodels = array_merge($dirmodels, $conf->modules_parts['models']);
5438  }
5439  foreach ($dirmodels as $reldir) {
5440  foreach (array('doc', 'pdf') as $prefix) {
5441  if (in_array(get_class($this), array('Adherent'))) {
5442  // Member module use prefix_modele.class.php
5443  $file = $prefix."_".$modele.".class.php";
5444  } else {
5445  // Other module use prefix_modele.modules.php
5446  $file = $prefix."_".$modele.".modules.php";
5447  }
5448 
5449  // On verifie l'emplacement du modele
5450  $file = dol_buildpath($reldir.$modelspath.$file, 0);
5451  if (file_exists($file)) {
5452  $filefound = $file;
5453  $classname = $prefix.'_'.$modele;
5454  break;
5455  }
5456  }
5457  if ($filefound) {
5458  break;
5459  }
5460  }
5461 
5462  // If generator was found
5463  if ($filefound) {
5464  global $db; // Required to solve a conception default making an include of code using $db instead of $this->db just after.
5465 
5466  require_once $file;
5467 
5468  $obj = new $classname($this->db);
5469 
5470  // If generator is ODT, we must have srctemplatepath defined, if not we set it.
5471  if ($obj->type == 'odt' && empty($srctemplatepath)) {
5472  $varfortemplatedir = $obj->scandir;
5473  if ($varfortemplatedir && !empty($conf->global->$varfortemplatedir)) {
5474  $dirtoscan = $conf->global->$varfortemplatedir;
5475 
5476  $listoffiles = array();
5477 
5478  // Now we add first model found in directories scanned
5479  $listofdir = explode(',', $dirtoscan);
5480  foreach ($listofdir as $key => $tmpdir) {
5481  $tmpdir = trim($tmpdir);
5482  $tmpdir = preg_replace('/DOL_DATA_ROOT/', DOL_DATA_ROOT, $tmpdir);
5483  if (!$tmpdir) {
5484  unset($listofdir[$key]);
5485  continue;
5486  }
5487  if (is_dir($tmpdir)) {
5488  $tmpfiles = dol_dir_list($tmpdir, 'files', 0, '\.od(s|t)$', '', 'name', SORT_ASC, 0);
5489  if (count($tmpfiles)) {
5490  $listoffiles = array_merge($listoffiles, $tmpfiles);
5491  }
5492  }
5493  }
5494 
5495  if (count($listoffiles)) {
5496  foreach ($listoffiles as $record) {
5497  $srctemplatepath = $record['fullname'];
5498  break;
5499  }
5500  }
5501  }
5502 
5503  if (empty($srctemplatepath)) {
5504  $this->error = 'ErrorGenerationAskedForOdtTemplateWithSrcFileNotDefined';
5505  return -1;
5506  }
5507  }
5508 
5509  if ($obj->type == 'odt' && !empty($srctemplatepath)) {
5510  if (!dol_is_file($srctemplatepath)) {
5511  dol_syslog("Failed to locate template file ".$srctemplatepath, LOG_WARNING);
5512  $this->error = 'ErrorGenerationAskedForOdtTemplateWithSrcFileNotFound';
5513  return -1;
5514  }
5515  }
5516 
5517  // We save charset_output to restore it because write_file can change it if needed for
5518  // output format that does not support UTF8.
5519  $sav_charset_output = empty($outputlangs->charset_output) ? '' : $outputlangs->charset_output;
5520 
5521  if (in_array(get_class($this), array('Adherent'))) {
5522  $resultwritefile = $obj->write_file($this, $outputlangs, $srctemplatepath, 'member', 1, 'tmp_cards', $moreparams);
5523  } else {
5524  $resultwritefile = $obj->write_file($this, $outputlangs, $srctemplatepath, $hidedetails, $hidedesc, $hideref, $moreparams);
5525  }
5526  // After call of write_file $obj->result['fullpath'] is set with generated file. It will be used to update the ECM database index.
5527 
5528  if ($resultwritefile > 0) {
5529  $outputlangs->charset_output = $sav_charset_output;
5530 
5531  // We delete old preview
5532  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
5533  dol_delete_preview($this);
5534 
5535  // Index file in database
5536  if (!empty($obj->result['fullpath'])) {
5537  $destfull = $obj->result['fullpath'];
5538 
5539  // Update the last_main_doc field into main object (if document generator has property ->update_main_doc_field set)
5540  $update_main_doc_field = 0;
5541  if (!empty($obj->update_main_doc_field)) {
5542  $update_main_doc_field = 1;
5543  }
5544 
5545  $this->indexFile($destfull, $update_main_doc_field);
5546  } else {
5547  dol_syslog('Method ->write_file was called on object '.get_class($obj).' and return a success but the return array ->result["fullpath"] was not set.', LOG_WARNING);
5548  }
5549 
5550  // Success in building document. We build meta file.
5551  dol_meta_create($this);
5552 
5553  return 1;
5554  } else {
5555  $outputlangs->charset_output = $sav_charset_output;
5556  $this->error = $obj->error;
5557  $this->errors = $obj->errors;
5558  dol_syslog("Error generating document for ".__CLASS__.". Error: ".$obj->error, LOG_ERR);
5559  return -1;
5560  }
5561  } else {
5562  if (!$filefound) {
5563  $this->error = $langs->trans("Error").' Failed to load doc generator with modelpaths='.$modelspath.' - modele='.$modele;
5564  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
5565  dol_syslog($this->error, LOG_ERR);
5566  } else {
5567  $this->error = $langs->trans("Error")." ".$langs->trans("ErrorFileDoesNotExists", $filefound);
5568  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
5569  dol_syslog($this->error, LOG_ERR);
5570  }
5571  return -1;
5572  }
5573  } else {
5574  return $reshook;
5575  }
5576  }
5577 
5587  public function indexFile($destfull, $update_main_doc_field)
5588  {
5589  global $conf, $user;
5590 
5591  $upload_dir = dirname($destfull);
5592  $destfile = basename($destfull);
5593  $rel_dir = preg_replace('/^'.preg_quote(DOL_DATA_ROOT, '/').'/', '', $upload_dir);
5594 
5595  if (!preg_match('/[\\/]temp[\\/]|[\\/]thumbs|\.meta$/', $rel_dir)) { // If not a tmp dir
5596  $filename = basename($destfile);
5597  $rel_dir = preg_replace('/[\\/]$/', '', $rel_dir);
5598  $rel_dir = preg_replace('/^[\\/]/', '', $rel_dir);
5599 
5600  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/ecm/class/ecmfiles.class.php';
5601  $ecmfile = new EcmFiles($this->db);
5602  $result = $ecmfile->fetch(0, '', ($rel_dir ? $rel_dir.'/' : '').$filename);
5603 
5604  // Set the public "share" key
5605  $setsharekey = false;
5606  if ($this->element == 'propal' || $this->element == 'proposal') {
5607  if (!isset($conf->global->PROPOSAL_ALLOW_ONLINESIGN) || !empty($conf->global->PROPOSAL_ALLOW_ONLINESIGN)) {
5608  $setsharekey = true; // feature to make online signature is not set or set to on (default)
5609  }
5610  if (!empty($conf->global->PROPOSAL_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5611  $setsharekey = true;
5612  }
5613  }
5614  if ($this->element == 'commande' && !empty($conf->global->ORDER_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5615  $setsharekey = true;
5616  }
5617  if ($this->element == 'facture' && !empty($conf->global->INVOICE_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5618  $setsharekey = true;
5619  }
5620  if ($this->element == 'bank_account' && !empty($conf->global->BANK_ACCOUNT_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5621  $setsharekey = true;
5622  }
5623  if ($this->element == 'product' && !empty($conf->global->PRODUCT_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5624  $setsharekey = true;
5625  }
5626  if ($this->element == 'contrat' && !empty($conf->global->CONTRACT_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5627  $setsharekey = true;
5628  }
5629  if ($this->element == 'fichinter' && !empty($conf->global->FICHINTER_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5630  $setsharekey = true;
5631  }
5632  if ($this->element == 'supplier_proposal' && !empty($conf->global->SUPPLIER_PROPOSAL_ALLOW_EXTERNAL_DOWNLOAD)) {
5633  $setsharekey = true;
5634  }
5635 
5636  if ($setsharekey) {
5637  if (empty($ecmfile->share)) { // Because object not found or share not set yet
5638  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/security2.lib.php';
5639  $ecmfile->share = getRandomPassword(true);
5640  }
5641  }
5642 
5643  if ($result > 0) {
5644  $ecmfile->label = md5_file(dol_osencode($destfull)); // hash of file content
5645  $ecmfile->fullpath_orig = '';
5646  $ecmfile->gen_or_uploaded = 'generated';
5647  $ecmfile->description = ''; // indexed content
5648  $ecmfile->keywords = ''; // keyword content
5649  $result = $ecmfile->update($user);
5650  if ($result < 0) {
5651  setEventMessages($ecmfile->error, $ecmfile->errors, 'warnings');
5652  return -1;
5653  }
5654  } else {
5655  $ecmfile->entity = $conf->entity;
5656  $ecmfile->filepath = $rel_dir;
5657  $ecmfile->filename = $filename;
5658  $ecmfile->label = md5_file(dol_osencode($destfull)); // hash of file content
5659  $ecmfile->fullpath_orig = '';
5660  $ecmfile->gen_or_uploaded = 'generated';
5661  $ecmfile->description = ''; // indexed content
5662  $ecmfile->keywords = ''; // keyword content
5663  $ecmfile->src_object_type = $this->table_element; // $this->table_name is 'myobject' or 'mymodule_myobject'.
5664  $ecmfile->src_object_id = $this->id;
5665 
5666  $result = $ecmfile->create($user);
5667  if ($result < 0) {
5668  setEventMessages($ecmfile->error, $ecmfile->errors, 'warnings');
5669  return -1;
5670  }
5671  }
5672 
5673  /*$this->result['fullname']=$destfull;
5674  $this->result['filepath']=$ecmfile->filepath;
5675  $this->result['filename']=$ecmfile->filename;*/
5676  //var_dump($obj->update_main_doc_field);exit;
5677 
5678  if ($update_main_doc_field && !empty($this->table_element)) {
5679  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element." SET last_main_doc = '".$this->db->escape($ecmfile->filepath."/".$ecmfile->filename)."'";
5680  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
5681 
5682  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5683  if (!$resql) {
5684  dol_print_error($this->db);
5685  return -1;
5686  } else {
5687  $this->last_main_doc = $ecmfile->filepath.'/'.$ecmfile->filename;
5688  }
5689  }
5690  }
5691 
5692  return 1;
5693  }
5694 
5702  public function addThumbs($file)
5703  {
5704  global $maxwidthsmall, $maxheightsmall, $maxwidthmini, $maxheightmini, $quality;
5705 
5706  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/images.lib.php'; // This define also $maxwidthsmall, $quality, ...
5707 
5708  $file_osencoded = dol_osencode($file);
5709  if (file_exists($file_osencoded)) {
5710  // Create small thumbs for company (Ratio is near 16/9)
5711  // Used on logon for example
5712  vignette($file_osencoded, $maxwidthsmall, $maxheightsmall, '_small', $quality);
5713 
5714  // Create mini thumbs for company (Ratio is near 16/9)
5715  // Used on menu or for setup page for example
5716  vignette($file_osencoded, $maxwidthmini, $maxheightmini, '_mini', $quality);
5717  }
5718  }
5719 
5720 
5721  /* Functions common to commonobject and commonobjectline */
5722 
5723  /* For default values */
5724 
5737  public function getDefaultCreateValueFor($fieldname, $alternatevalue = null)
5738  {
5739  global $conf, $_POST;
5740 
5741  // If param here has been posted, we use this value first.
5742  if (GETPOSTISSET($fieldname)) {
5743  return GETPOST($fieldname, 'alphanohtml', 3);
5744  }
5745 
5746  if (isset($alternatevalue)) {
5747  return $alternatevalue;
5748  }
5749 
5750  $newelement = $this->element;
5751  if ($newelement == 'facture') {
5752  $newelement = 'invoice';
5753  }
5754  if ($newelement == 'commande') {
5755  $newelement = 'order';
5756  }
5757  if (empty($newelement)) {
5758  dol_syslog("Ask a default value using common method getDefaultCreateValueForField on an object with no property ->element defined. Return empty string.", LOG_WARNING);
5759  return '';
5760  }
5761 
5762  $keyforfieldname = strtoupper($newelement.'_DEFAULT_'.$fieldname);
5763  //var_dump($keyforfieldname);
5764  if (isset($conf->global->$keyforfieldname)) {
5765  return $conf->global->$keyforfieldname;
5766  }
5767 
5768  // TODO Ad here a scan into table llx_overwrite_default with a filter on $this->element and $fieldname
5769  }
5770 
5771 
5772  /* For triggers */
5773 
5774 
5775  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
5786  public function call_trigger($triggerName, $user)
5787  {
5788  // phpcs:enable
5789  global $langs, $conf;
5790  if (!empty(self::TRIGGER_PREFIX) && strpos($triggerName, self::TRIGGER_PREFIX . '_') !== 0) {
5791  dol_print_error('', 'The trigger "' . $triggerName . '" does not start with "' . self::TRIGGER_PREFIX . '_" as required.');
5792  exit;
5793  }
5794  if (!is_object($langs)) { // If lang was not defined, we set it. It is required by run_triggers.
5795  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/translate.class.php';
5796  $langs = new Translate('', $conf);
5797  }
5798 
5799  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/interfaces.class.php';
5800  $interface = new Interfaces($this->db);
5801  $result = $interface->run_triggers($triggerName, $this, $user, $langs, $conf);
5802 
5803  if ($result < 0) {
5804  if (!empty($this->errors)) {
5805  $this->errors = array_unique(array_merge($this->errors, $interface->errors)); // We use array_unique because when a trigger call another trigger on same object, this->errors is added twice.
5806  } else {
5807  $this->errors = $interface->errors;
5808  }
5809  }
5810  return $result;
5811  }
5812 
5813 
5814  /* Functions for data in other language */
5815 
5816 
5824  public function fetchValuesForExtraLanguages()
5825  {
5826  // To avoid SQL errors. Probably not the better solution though
5827  if (!$this->element) {
5828  return 0;
5829  }
5830  if (!($this->id > 0)) {
5831  return 0;
5832  }
5833  if (is_array($this->array_languages)) {
5834  return 1;
5835  }
5836 
5837  $this->array_languages = array();
5838 
5839  $element = $this->element;
5840  if ($element == 'categorie') {
5841  $element = 'categories'; // For compatibility
5842  }
5843 
5844  // Request to get translation values for object
5845  $sql = "SELECT rowid, property, lang , value";
5846  $sql .= " FROM ".$this->db->prefix()."object_lang";
5847  $sql .= " WHERE type_object = '".$this->db->escape($element)."'";
5848  $sql .= " AND fk_object = ".((int) $this->id);
5849 
5850  //dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::fetch_optionals get extrafields data for ".$this->table_element, LOG_DEBUG); // Too verbose
5851  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
5852  if ($resql) {
5853  $numrows = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
5854  if ($numrows) {
5855  $i = 0;
5856  while ($i < $numrows) {
5857  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
5858  $key = $obj->property;
5859  $value = $obj->value;
5860  $codelang = $obj->lang;
5861  $type = $this->fields[$key]['type'];
5862 
5863  // we can add this attribute to object
5864  if (preg_match('/date/', $type)) {
5865  $this->array_languages[$key][$codelang] = $this->db->jdate($value);
5866  } else {
5867  $this->array_languages[$key][$codelang] = $value;
5868  }
5869 
5870  $i++;
5871  }
5872  }
5873 
5874  $this->db->free($resql);
5875 
5876  if ($numrows) {
5877  return $numrows;
5878  } else {
5879  return 0;
5880  }
5881  } else {
5882  dol_print_error($this->db);
5883  return -1;
5884  }
5885  }
5886 
5893  public function setValuesForExtraLanguages($onlykey = '')
5894  {
5895  global $_POST, $langs;
5896 
5897  // Get extra fields
5898  foreach ($_POST as $postfieldkey => $postfieldvalue) {
5899  $tmparray = explode('-', $postfieldkey);
5900  if ($tmparray[0] != 'field') {
5901  continue;
5902  }
5903 
5904  $element = $tmparray[1];
5905  $key = $tmparray[2];
5906  $codelang = $tmparray[3];
5907  //var_dump("postfieldkey=".$postfieldkey." element=".$element." key=".$key." codelang=".$codelang);
5908 
5909  if (!empty($onlykey) && $key != $onlykey) {
5910  continue;
5911  }
5912  if ($element != $this->element) {
5913  continue;
5914  }
5915 
5916  $key_type = $this->fields[$key]['type'];
5917 
5918  $enabled = 1;
5919  if (isset($this->fields[$key]['enabled'])) {
5920  $enabled = dol_eval($this->fields[$key]['enabled'], 1, 1, '1');
5921  }
5922  /*$perms = 1;
5923  if (isset($this->fields[$key]['perms']))
5924  {
5925  $perms = dol_eval($this->fields[$key]['perms'], 1, 1, '1');
5926  }*/
5927  if (empty($enabled)) {
5928  continue;
5929  }
5930  //if (empty($perms)) continue;
5931 
5932  if (in_array($key_type, array('date'))) {
5933  // Clean parameters
5934  // TODO GMT date in memory must be GMT so we should add gm=true in parameters
5935  $value_key = dol_mktime(0, 0, 0, GETPOST($postfieldkey."month", 'int'), GETPOST($postfieldkey."day", 'int'), GETPOST($postfieldkey."year", 'int'));
5936  } elseif (in_array($key_type, array('datetime'))) {
5937  // Clean parameters
5938  // TODO GMT date in memory must be GMT so we should add gm=true in parameters
5939  $value_key = dol_mktime(GETPOST($postfieldkey."hour", 'int'), GETPOST($postfieldkey."min", 'int'), 0, GETPOST($postfieldkey."month", 'int'), GETPOST($postfieldkey."day", 'int'), GETPOST($postfieldkey."year", 'int'));
5940  } elseif (in_array($key_type, array('checkbox', 'chkbxlst'))) {
5941  $value_arr = GETPOST($postfieldkey, 'array'); // check if an array
5942  if (!empty($value_arr)) {
5943  $value_key = implode(',', $value_arr);
5944  } else {
5945  $value_key = '';
5946  }
5947  } elseif (in_array($key_type, array('price', 'double'))) {
5948  $value_arr = GETPOST($postfieldkey, 'alpha');
5949  $value_key = price2num($value_arr);
5950  } else {
5951  $value_key = GETPOST($postfieldkey);
5952  if (in_array($key_type, array('link')) && $value_key == '-1') {
5953  $value_key = '';
5954  }
5955  }
5956 
5957  $this->array_languages[$key][$codelang] = $value_key;
5958 
5959  /*if ($nofillrequired) {
5960  $langs->load('errors');
5961  setEventMessages($langs->trans('ErrorFieldsRequired').' : '.implode(', ', $error_field_required), null, 'errors');
5962  return -1;
5963  }*/
5964  }
5965 
5966  return 1;
5967  }
5968 
5969 
5970  /* Functions for extrafields */
5971 
5978  public function fetchNoCompute($id)
5979  {
5980  global $conf;
5981 
5982  $savDisableCompute = $conf->disable_compute;
5983  $conf->disable_compute = 1;
5984 
5985  $ret = $this->fetch($id);
5986 
5987  $conf->disable_compute = $savDisableCompute;
5988 
5989  return $ret;
5990  }
5991 
5992  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
6002  public function fetch_optionals($rowid = null, $optionsArray = null)
6003  {
6004  // phpcs:enable
6005  global $conf, $extrafields;
6006 
6007  if (empty($rowid)) {
6008  $rowid = $this->id;
6009  }
6010  if (empty($rowid) && isset($this->rowid)) {
6011  $rowid = $this->rowid; // deprecated
6012  }
6013 
6014  // To avoid SQL errors. Probably not the better solution though
6015  if (!$this->table_element) {
6016  return 0;
6017  }
6018 
6019  $this->array_options = array();
6020 
6021  if (!is_array($optionsArray)) {
6022  // If $extrafields is not a known object, we initialize it. Best practice is to have $extrafields defined into card.php or list.php page.
6023  if (!isset($extrafields) || !is_object($extrafields)) {
6024  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extrafields.class.php';
6025  $extrafields = new ExtraFields($this->db);
6026  }
6027 
6028  // Load array of extrafields for elementype = $this->table_element
6029  if (empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['loaded'])) {
6030  $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($this->table_element);
6031  }
6032  $optionsArray = (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label']) ? $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label'] : null);
6033  } else {
6034  global $extrafields;
6035  dol_syslog("Warning: fetch_optionals was called with param optionsArray defined when you should pass null now", LOG_WARNING);
6036  }
6037 
6038  $table_element = $this->table_element;
6039  if ($table_element == 'categorie') {
6040  $table_element = 'categories'; // For compatibility
6041  }
6042 
6043  // Request to get complementary values
6044  if (is_array($optionsArray) && count($optionsArray) > 0) {
6045  $sql = "SELECT rowid";
6046  foreach ($optionsArray as $name => $label) {
6047  if (empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$name]) || $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$name] != 'separate') {
6048  $sql .= ", ".$name;
6049  }
6050  }
6051  $sql .= " FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$table_element."_extrafields";
6052  $sql .= " WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $rowid);
6053 
6054  //dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::fetch_optionals get extrafields data for ".$this->table_element, LOG_DEBUG); // Too verbose
6055  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6056  if ($resql) {
6057  $numrows = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
6058  if ($numrows) {
6059  $tab = $this->db->fetch_array($resql);
6060 
6061  foreach ($tab as $key => $value) {
6062  // Test fetch_array ! is_int($key) because fetch_array result is a mix table with Key as alpha and Key as int (depend db engine)
6063  if ($key != 'rowid' && $key != 'tms' && $key != 'fk_member' && !is_int($key)) {
6064  // we can add this attribute to object
6065  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]) && in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('date', 'datetime'))) {
6066  //var_dump($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key]);
6067  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = $this->db->jdate($value);
6068  } else {
6069  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = $value;
6070  }
6071 
6072  //var_dump('key '.$key.' '.$value.' type='.$extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key].' '.$this->array_options["options_".$key]);
6073  }
6074  }
6075  }
6076 
6077  // If field is a computed field, value must become result of compute (regardless of whether a row exists
6078  // in the element's extrafields table)
6079  foreach ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label'] as $key => $val) {
6080  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]) && !empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['computed'][$key])) {
6081  //var_dump($conf->disable_compute);
6082  if (empty($conf->disable_compute)) {
6083  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = dol_eval($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['computed'][$key], 1, 0, '');
6084  }
6085  }
6086  }
6087 
6088  $this->db->free($resql);
6089 
6090  if ($numrows) {
6091  return $numrows;
6092  } else {
6093  return 0;
6094  }
6095  } else {
6096  $this->errors[]=$this->db->lasterror;
6097  return -1;
6098  }
6099  }
6100  return 0;
6101  }
6102 
6109  public function deleteExtraFields()
6110  {
6111  global $conf;
6112 
6113  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_DISABLED)) {
6114  return 0;
6115  }
6116 
6117  $this->db->begin();
6118 
6119  $table_element = $this->table_element;
6120  if ($table_element == 'categorie') {
6121  $table_element = 'categories'; // For compatibility
6122  }
6123 
6124  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::deleteExtraFields delete", LOG_DEBUG);
6125 
6126  $sql_del = "DELETE FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$table_element."_extrafields WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $this->id);
6127 
6128  $resql = $this->db->query($sql_del);
6129  if (!$resql) {
6130  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
6131  $this->db->rollback();
6132  return -1;
6133  } else {
6134  $this->db->commit();
6135  return 1;
6136  }
6137  }
6138 
6149  public function insertExtraFields($trigger = '', $userused = null)
6150  {
6151  global $conf, $langs, $user;
6152 
6153  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_DISABLED)) {
6154  return 0;
6155  }
6156 
6157  if (empty($userused)) {
6158  $userused = $user;
6159  }
6160 
6161  $error = 0;
6162 
6163  if (!empty($this->array_options)) {
6164  // Check parameters
6165  $langs->load('admin');
6166  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extrafields.class.php';
6167  $extrafields = new ExtraFields($this->db);
6168  $target_extrafields = $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($this->table_element);
6169 
6170  // Eliminate copied source object extra fields that do not exist in target object
6171  $new_array_options = array();
6172  foreach ($this->array_options as $key => $value) {
6173  if (in_array(substr($key, 8), array_keys($target_extrafields))) { // We remove the 'options_' from $key for test
6174  $new_array_options[$key] = $value;
6175  } elseif (in_array($key, array_keys($target_extrafields))) { // We test on $key that does not contains the 'options_' prefix
6176  $new_array_options['options_'.$key] = $value;
6177  }
6178  }
6179 
6180  foreach ($new_array_options as $key => $value) {
6181  $attributeKey = substr($key, 8); // Remove 'options_' prefix
6182  $attributeType = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$attributeKey];
6183  $attributeLabel = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label'][$attributeKey];
6184  $attributeParam = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['param'][$attributeKey];
6185  $attributeRequired = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['required'][$attributeKey];
6186  $attributeUnique = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['unique'][$attributeKey];
6187  $attrfieldcomputed = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['computed'][$attributeKey];
6188 
6189  // If we clone, we have to clean unique extrafields to prevent duplicates.
6190  // This behaviour can be prevented by external code by changing $this->context['createfromclone'] value in createFrom hook
6191  if (!empty($this->context['createfromclone']) && $this->context['createfromclone'] == 'createfromclone' && !empty($attributeUnique)) {
6192  $new_array_options[$key] = null;
6193  }
6194 
6195  // Similar code than into insertExtraFields
6196  if ($attributeRequired) {
6197  $mandatorypb = false;
6198  if ($attributeType == 'link' && $this->array_options[$key] == '-1') {
6199  $mandatorypb = true;
6200  }
6201  if ($this->array_options[$key] === '') {
6202  $mandatorypb = true;
6203  }
6204  if ($attributeType == 'sellist' && $this->array_options[$key] == '0') {
6205  $mandatorypb = true;
6206  }
6207  if ($mandatorypb) {
6208  $langs->load("errors");
6209  dol_syslog("Mandatory field '".$key."' is empty during create and set to required into definition of extrafields");
6210  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans('ErrorFieldRequired', $attributeLabel);
6211  return -1;
6212  }
6213  }
6214 
6215  //dol_syslog("attributeLabel=".$attributeLabel, LOG_DEBUG);
6216  //dol_syslog("attributeType=".$attributeType, LOG_DEBUG);
6217 
6218  if (!empty($attrfieldcomputed)) {
6219  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_STORE_COMPUTED_EXTRAFIELDS)) {
6220  $value = dol_eval($attrfieldcomputed, 1, 0, '');
6221  dol_syslog($langs->trans("Extrafieldcomputed")." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value.")", LOG_DEBUG);
6222  $new_array_options[$key] = $value;
6223  } else {
6224  $new_array_options[$key] = null;
6225  }
6226  }
6227 
6228  switch ($attributeType) {
6229  case 'int':
6230  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
6231  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
6232  return -1;
6233  } elseif ($value == '') {
6234  $new_array_options[$key] = null;
6235  }
6236  break;
6237  case 'price':
6238  case 'double':
6239  $value = price2num($value);
6240  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
6241  dol_syslog($langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue")." for ".$attributeLabel."(".$value."is not '".$attributeType."')", LOG_DEBUG);
6242  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
6243  return -1;
6244  } elseif ($value == '') {
6245  $value = null;
6246  }
6247  //dol_syslog("double value"." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value." is '".$attributeType."')", LOG_DEBUG);
6248  $new_array_options[$key] = $value;
6249  break;
6250  /*case 'select': // Not required, we chosed value='0' for undefined values
6251  if ($value=='-1')
6252  {
6253  $this->array_options[$key] = null;
6254  }
6255  break;*/
6256  case 'password':
6257  $algo = '';
6258  if ($this->array_options[$key] != '' && is_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['param'][$attributeKey]['options'])) {
6259  // If there is an encryption choice, we use it to crypt data before insert
6260  $tmparrays = array_keys($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['param'][$attributeKey]['options']);
6261  $algo = reset($tmparrays);
6262  if ($algo != '') {
6263  //global $action; // $action may be 'create', 'update', 'update_extras'...
6264  //var_dump($action);
6265  //var_dump($this->oldcopy);exit;
6266  if (is_object($this->oldcopy)) { // If this->oldcopy is not defined, we can't know if we change attribute or not, so we must keep value
6267  //var_dump($this->oldcopy->array_options[$key]); var_dump($this->array_options[$key]);
6268  if (isset($this->oldcopy->array_options[$key]) && $this->array_options[$key] == $this->oldcopy->array_options[$key]) { // If old value crypted in database is same than submited new value, it means we don't change it, so we don't update.
6269  $new_array_options[$key] = $this->array_options[$key]; // Value is kept
6270  } else {
6271  // var_dump($algo);
6272  $newvalue = dol_hash($this->array_options[$key], $algo);
6273  $new_array_options[$key] = $newvalue;
6274  }
6275  } else {
6276  $new_array_options[$key] = $this->array_options[$key]; // Value is kept
6277  }
6278  }
6279  } else // Common usage
6280  {
6281  $new_array_options[$key] = $this->array_options[$key];
6282  }
6283  break;
6284  case 'date':
6285  case 'datetime':
6286  // If data is a string instead of a timestamp, we convert it
6287  if (!is_numeric($this->array_options[$key]) || $this->array_options[$key] != intval($this->array_options[$key])) {
6288  $this->array_options[$key] = strtotime($this->array_options[$key]);
6289  }
6290  $new_array_options[$key] = $this->db->idate($this->array_options[$key]);
6291  break;
6292  case 'link':
6293  $param_list = array_keys($attributeParam['options']);
6294  // 0 : ObjectName
6295  // 1 : classPath
6296  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
6297  dol_include_once($InfoFieldList[1]);
6298  if ($InfoFieldList[0] && class_exists($InfoFieldList[0])) {
6299  if ($value == '-1') { // -1 is key for no defined in combo list of objects
6300  $new_array_options[$key] = '';
6301  } elseif ($value) {
6302  $object = new $InfoFieldList[0]($this->db);
6303  if (is_numeric($value)) {
6304  $res = $object->fetch($value); // Common case
6305  } else {
6306  $res = $object->fetch('', $value); // For compatibility
6307  }
6308 
6309  if ($res > 0) {
6310  $new_array_options[$key] = $object->id;
6311  } else {
6312  $this->error = "Id/Ref '".$value."' for object '".$object->element."' not found";
6313  $this->db->rollback();
6314  return -1;
6315  }
6316  }
6317  } else {
6318  dol_syslog('Error bad setup of extrafield', LOG_WARNING);
6319  }
6320  break;
6321  }
6322  }
6323 
6324  $this->db->begin();
6325 
6326  $table_element = $this->table_element;
6327  if ($table_element == 'categorie') {
6328  $table_element = 'categories'; // For compatibility
6329  }
6330 
6331  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::insertExtraFields delete then insert", LOG_DEBUG);
6332 
6333  $sql_del = "DELETE FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$table_element."_extrafields WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $this->id);
6334  $this->db->query($sql_del);
6335 
6336  $sql = "INSERT INTO ".$this->db->prefix().$table_element."_extrafields (fk_object";
6337  foreach ($new_array_options as $key => $value) {
6338  $attributeKey = substr($key, 8); // Remove 'options_' prefix
6339  // Add field of attribut
6340  if ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$attributeKey] != 'separate') { // Only for other type than separator
6341  $sql .= ",".$attributeKey;
6342  }
6343  }
6344  // We must insert a default value for fields for other entities that are mandatory to avoid not null error
6345  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities']) && is_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities'])) {
6346  foreach ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities'] as $tmpkey => $tmpval) {
6347  if (!isset($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$tmpkey])) { // If field not already added previously
6348  $sql .= ",".$tmpkey;
6349  }
6350  }
6351  }
6352  $sql .= ") VALUES (".$this->id;
6353 
6354  foreach ($new_array_options as $key => $value) {
6355  $attributeKey = substr($key, 8); // Remove 'options_' prefix
6356  // Add field of attribute
6357  if ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$attributeKey] != 'separate') { // Only for other type than separator)
6358  if ($new_array_options[$key] != '' || $new_array_options[$key] == '0') {
6359  $sql .= ",'".$this->db->escape($new_array_options[$key])."'";
6360  } else {
6361  $sql .= ",null";
6362  }
6363  }
6364  }
6365  // We must insert a default value for fields for other entities that are mandatory to avoid not null error
6366  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities']) && is_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities'])) {
6367  foreach ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['mandatoryfieldsofotherentities'] as $tmpkey => $tmpval) {
6368  if (!isset($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$tmpkey])) { // If field not already added previously
6369  if (in_array($tmpval, array('int', 'double', 'price'))) {
6370  $sql .= ", 0";
6371  } else {
6372  $sql .= ", ''";
6373  }
6374  }
6375  }
6376  }
6377 
6378  $sql .= ")";
6379 
6380  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6381  if (!$resql) {
6382  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
6383  $error++;
6384  }
6385 
6386  if (!$error && $trigger) {
6387  // Call trigger
6388  $this->context = array('extrafieldaddupdate'=>1);
6389  $result = $this->call_trigger($trigger, $userused);
6390  if ($result < 0) {
6391  $error++;
6392  }
6393  // End call trigger
6394  }
6395 
6396  if ($error) {
6397  $this->db->rollback();
6398  return -1;
6399  } else {
6400  $this->db->commit();
6401  return 1;
6402  }
6403  } else {
6404  return 0;
6405  }
6406  }
6407 
6418  public function insertExtraLanguages($trigger = '', $userused = null)
6419  {
6420  global $conf, $langs, $user;
6421 
6422  if (empty($userused)) {
6423  $userused = $user;
6424  }
6425 
6426  $error = 0;
6427 
6428  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRALANGUAGES_DISABLED)) {
6429  return 0; // For avoid conflicts if trigger used
6430  }
6431 
6432  if (is_array($this->array_languages)) {
6433  $new_array_languages = $this->array_languages;
6434 
6435  foreach ($new_array_languages as $key => $value) {
6436  $attributeKey = $key;
6437  $attributeType = $this->fields[$attributeKey]['type'];
6438  $attributeLabel = $this->fields[$attributeKey]['label'];
6439 
6440  //dol_syslog("attributeLabel=".$attributeLabel, LOG_DEBUG);
6441  //dol_syslog("attributeType=".$attributeType, LOG_DEBUG);
6442 
6443  switch ($attributeType) {
6444  case 'int':
6445  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
6446  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraLanguageHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
6447  return -1;
6448  } elseif ($value == '') {
6449  $new_array_languages[$key] = null;
6450  }
6451  break;
6452  case 'double':
6453  $value = price2num($value);
6454  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
6455  dol_syslog($langs->trans("ExtraLanguageHasWrongValue")." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value."is not '".$attributeType."')", LOG_DEBUG);
6456  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraLanguageHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
6457  return -1;
6458  } elseif ($value == '') {
6459  $new_array_languages[$key] = null;
6460  } else {
6461  $new_array_languages[$key] = $value;
6462  }
6463  break;
6464  /*case 'select': // Not required, we chosed value='0' for undefined values
6465  if ($value=='-1')
6466  {
6467  $this->array_options[$key] = null;
6468  }
6469  break;*/
6470  }
6471  }
6472 
6473  $this->db->begin();
6474 
6475  $table_element = $this->table_element;
6476  if ($table_element == 'categorie') {
6477  $table_element = 'categories'; // For compatibility
6478  }
6479 
6480  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::insertExtraLanguages delete then insert", LOG_DEBUG);
6481 
6482  foreach ($new_array_languages as $key => $langcodearray) { // $key = 'name', 'town', ...
6483  foreach ($langcodearray as $langcode => $value) {
6484  $sql_del = "DELETE FROM ".$this->db->prefix()."object_lang";
6485  $sql_del .= " WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $this->id)." AND property = '".$this->db->escape($key)."' AND type_object = '".$this->db->escape($table_element)."'";
6486  $sql_del .= " AND lang = '".$this->db->escape($langcode)."'";
6487  $this->db->query($sql_del);
6488 
6489  if ($value !== '') {
6490  $sql = "INSERT INTO ".$this->db->prefix()."object_lang (fk_object, property, type_object, lang, value";
6491  $sql .= ") VALUES (".$this->id.", '".$this->db->escape($key)."', '".$this->db->escape($table_element)."', '".$this->db->escape($langcode)."', '".$this->db->escape($value)."'";
6492  $sql .= ")";
6493 
6494  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6495  if (!$resql) {
6496  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
6497  $error++;
6498  break;
6499  }
6500  }
6501  }
6502  }
6503 
6504  if (!$error && $trigger) {
6505  // Call trigger
6506  $this->context = array('extralanguagesaddupdate'=>1);
6507  $result = $this->call_trigger($trigger, $userused);
6508  if ($result < 0) {
6509  $error++;
6510  }
6511  // End call trigger
6512  }
6513 
6514  if ($error) {
6515  $this->db->rollback();
6516  return -1;
6517  } else {
6518  $this->db->commit();
6519  return 1;
6520  }
6521  } else {
6522  return 0;
6523  }
6524  }
6525 
6536  public function updateExtraField($key, $trigger = null, $userused = null)
6537  {
6538  global $conf, $langs, $user;
6539 
6540  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_DISABLED)) {
6541  return 0;
6542  }
6543 
6544  if (empty($userused)) {
6545  $userused = $user;
6546  }
6547 
6548  $error = 0;
6549 
6550  if (!empty($this->array_options) && isset($this->array_options["options_".$key])) {
6551  // Check parameters
6552  $langs->load('admin');
6553  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/extrafields.class.php';
6554  $extrafields = new ExtraFields($this->db);
6555  $extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label($this->table_element);
6556 
6557  $value = $this->array_options["options_".$key];
6558 
6559  $attributeType = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key];
6560  $attributeLabel = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label'][$key];
6561  $attributeParam = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['param'][$key];
6562  $attributeRequired = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['required'][$key];
6563  $attrfieldcomputed = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['computed'][$key];
6564 
6565  // Similar code than into insertExtraFields
6566  if ($attributeRequired) {
6567  $mandatorypb = false;
6568  if ($attributeType == 'link' && $this->array_options["options_".$key] == '-1') {
6569  $mandatorypb = true;
6570  }
6571  if ($this->array_options["options_".$key] === '') {
6572  $mandatorypb = true;
6573  }
6574  if ($mandatorypb) {
6575  $langs->load("errors");
6576  dol_syslog("Mandatory field 'options_".$key."' is empty during update and set to required into definition of extrafields");
6577  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans('ErrorFieldRequired', $attributeLabel);
6578  return -1;
6579  }
6580  }
6581 
6582  //dol_syslog("attributeLabel=".$attributeLabel, LOG_DEBUG);
6583  //dol_syslog("attributeType=".$attributeType, LOG_DEBUG);
6584 
6585  if (!empty($attrfieldcomputed)) {
6586  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_STORE_COMPUTED_EXTRAFIELDS)) {
6587  $value = dol_eval($attrfieldcomputed, 1, 0, '');
6588  dol_syslog($langs->trans("Extrafieldcomputed")." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value.")", LOG_DEBUG);
6589  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = $value;
6590  } else {
6591  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = null;
6592  }
6593  }
6594 
6595  switch ($attributeType) {
6596  case 'int':
6597  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
6598  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
6599  return -1;
6600  } elseif ($value === '') {
6601  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = null;
6602  }
6603  break;
6604  case 'double':
6605  $value = price2num($value);
6606  if (!is_numeric($value) && $value != '') {
6607  dol_syslog($langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue")." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value."is not '".$attributeType."')", LOG_DEBUG);
6608  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ExtraFieldHasWrongValue", $attributeLabel);
6609  return -1;
6610  } elseif ($value === '') {
6611  $value = null;
6612  }
6613  //dol_syslog("double value"." sur ".$attributeLabel."(".$value." is '".$attributeType."')", LOG_DEBUG);
6614  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = $value;
6615  break;
6616  /*case 'select': // Not required, we chosed value='0' for undefined values
6617  if ($value=='-1')
6618  {
6619  $this->array_options[$key] = null;
6620  }
6621  break;*/
6622  case 'price':
6623  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = price2num($this->array_options["options_".$key]);
6624  break;
6625  case 'date':
6626  case 'datetime':
6627  if (empty($this->array_options["options_".$key])) {
6628  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = null;
6629  } else {
6630  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = $this->db->idate($this->array_options["options_".$key]);
6631  }
6632  break;
6633  case 'boolean':
6634  if (empty($this->array_options["options_".$key])) {
6635  $this->array_options["options_".$key] = null;
6636  }
6637  break;
6638  /*
6639  case 'link':
6640  $param_list = array_keys($attributeParam['options']);
6641  // 0 : ObjectName
6642  // 1 : classPath
6643  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
6644  dol_include_once($InfoFieldList[1]);
6645  if ($InfoFieldList[0] && class_exists($InfoFieldList[0]))
6646  {
6647  if ($value == '-1') // -1 is key for no defined in combo list of objects
6648  {
6649  $new_array_options[$key] = '';
6650  } elseif ($value) {
6651  $object = new $InfoFieldList[0]($this->db);
6652  if (is_numeric($value)) $res = $object->fetch($value); // Common case
6653  else $res = $object->fetch('', $value); // For compatibility
6654 
6655  if ($res > 0) $new_array_options[$key] = $object->id;
6656  else {
6657  $this->error = "Id/Ref '".$value."' for object '".$object->element."' not found";
6658  $this->db->rollback();
6659  return -1;
6660  }
6661  }
6662  } else {
6663  dol_syslog('Error bad setup of extrafield', LOG_WARNING);
6664  }
6665  break;
6666  */
6667  }
6668 
6669  $this->db->begin();
6670 
6671  $linealreadyfound = 0;
6672 
6673  // Check if there is already a line for this object (in most cases, it is, but sometimes it is not, for example when extra field has been created after), so we must keep this overload)
6674  $sql = "SELECT COUNT(rowid) as nb FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element."_extrafields WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $this->id);
6675  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6676  if ($resql) {
6677  $tmpobj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
6678  if ($tmpobj) {
6679  $linealreadyfound = $tmpobj->nb;
6680  }
6681  }
6682 
6683  if ($linealreadyfound) {
6684  if ($this->array_options["options_".$key] === null) {
6685  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element."_extrafields SET ".$key." = null";
6686  } else {
6687  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element."_extrafields SET ".$key." = '".$this->db->escape($this->array_options["options_".$key])."'";
6688  }
6689  $sql .= " WHERE fk_object = ".((int) $this->id);
6690  } else {
6691  $result = $this->insertExtraFields('', $user);
6692  if ($result < 0) {
6693  $error++;
6694  }
6695  }
6696 
6697  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
6698  if (!$resql) {
6699  $error++;
6700  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
6701  }
6702  if (!$error && $trigger) {
6703  // Call trigger
6704  $this->context = array('extrafieldupdate'=>1);
6705  $result = $this->call_trigger($trigger, $userused);
6706  if ($result < 0) {
6707  $error++;
6708  }
6709  // End call trigger
6710  }
6711 
6712  if ($error) {
6713  dol_syslog(__METHOD__.$this->error, LOG_ERR);
6714  $this->db->rollback();
6715  return -1;
6716  } else {
6717  $this->db->commit();
6718  return 1;
6719  }
6720  } else {
6721  return 0;
6722  }
6723  }
6724 
6735  public function updateExtraLanguages($key, $trigger = null, $userused = null)
6736  {
6737  global $conf, $langs, $user;
6738 
6739  if (empty($userused)) {
6740  $userused = $user;
6741  }
6742 
6743  $error = 0;
6744 
6745  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRALANGUAGES_DISABLED)) {
6746  return 0; // For avoid conflicts if trigger used
6747  }
6748 
6749  return 0;
6750  }
6751 
6752 
6767  public function showInputField($val, $key, $value, $moreparam = '', $keysuffix = '', $keyprefix = '', $morecss = 0, $nonewbutton = 0)
6768  {
6769  global $conf, $langs, $form;
6770 
6771  if (!is_object($form)) {
6772  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/html.form.class.php';
6773  $form = new Form($this->db);
6774  }
6775 
6776  if (!empty($this->fields)) {
6777  $val = $this->fields[$key];
6778  }
6779 
6780  // Validation tests and output
6781  $fieldValidationErrorMsg = '';
6782  $validationClass = '';
6783  $fieldValidationErrorMsg = $this->getFieldError($key);
6784  if (!empty($fieldValidationErrorMsg)) {
6785  $validationClass = ' --error'; // the -- is use as class state in css : .--error can't be be defined alone it must be define with another class like .my-class.--error or input.--error
6786  } else {
6787  $validationClass = ' --success'; // the -- is use as class state in css : .--success can't be be defined alone it must be define with another class like .my-class.--success or input.--success
6788  }
6789 
6790  $out = '';
6791  $type = '';
6792  $isDependList = 0;
6793  $param = array();
6794  $param['options'] = array();
6795  $reg = array();
6796  $size = !empty($this->fields[$key]['size']) ? $this->fields[$key]['size'] : 0;
6797  // Because we work on extrafields
6798  if (preg_match('/^(integer|link):(.*):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6799  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4].':'.$reg[5] => 'N');
6800  $type = 'link';
6801  } elseif (preg_match('/^(integer|link):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6802  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4] => 'N');
6803  $type = 'link';
6804  } elseif (preg_match('/^(integer|link):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6805  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3] => 'N');
6806  $type = 'link';
6807  } elseif (preg_match('/^(sellist):(.*):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6808  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4].':'.$reg[5] => 'N');
6809  $type = 'sellist';
6810  } elseif (preg_match('/^(sellist):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6811  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4] => 'N');
6812  $type = 'sellist';
6813  } elseif (preg_match('/^(sellist):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6814  $param['options'] = array($reg[2].':'.$reg[3] => 'N');
6815  $type = 'sellist';
6816  } elseif (preg_match('/^chkbxlst:(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6817  $param['options'] = array($reg[1] => 'N');
6818  $type = 'chkbxlst';
6819  } elseif (preg_match('/varchar\‍((\d+)\‍)/', $val['type'], $reg)) {
6820  $param['options'] = array();
6821  $type = 'varchar';
6822  $size = $reg[1];
6823  } elseif (preg_match('/varchar/', $val['type'])) {
6824  $param['options'] = array();
6825  $type = 'varchar';
6826  } else {
6827  $param['options'] = array();
6828  $type = $this->fields[$key]['type'];
6829  }
6830 
6831  // Special case that force options and type ($type can be integer, varchar, ...)
6832  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['arrayofkeyval']) && is_array($this->fields[$key]['arrayofkeyval'])) {
6833  $param['options'] = $this->fields[$key]['arrayofkeyval'];
6834  $type = 'select';
6835  }
6836 
6837  $label = $this->fields[$key]['label'];
6838  //$elementtype=$this->fields[$key]['elementtype']; // Seems not used
6839  $default = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['default']) ? $this->fields[$key]['default'] : '');
6840  $computed = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['computed']) ? $this->fields[$key]['computed'] : '');
6841  $unique = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['unique']) ? $this->fields[$key]['unique'] : 0);
6842  $required = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['required']) ? $this->fields[$key]['required'] : 0);
6843  $autofocusoncreate = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['autofocusoncreate']) ? $this->fields[$key]['autofocusoncreate'] : 0);
6844 
6845  $langfile = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['langfile']) ? $this->fields[$key]['langfile'] : '');
6846  $list = (!empty($this->fields[$key]['list']) ? $this->fields[$key]['list'] : 0);
6847  $hidden = (in_array(abs($this->fields[$key]['visible']), array(0, 2)) ? 1 : 0);
6848 
6849  $objectid = $this->id;
6850 
6851  if ($computed) {
6852  if (!preg_match('/^search_/', $keyprefix)) {
6853  return '<span class="opacitymedium">'.$langs->trans("AutomaticallyCalculated").'</span>';
6854  } else {
6855  return '';
6856  }
6857  }
6858 
6859  // Set value of $morecss. For this, we use in priority showsize from parameters, then $val['css'] then autodefine
6860  if (empty($morecss) && !empty($val['css'])) {
6861  $morecss = $val['css'];
6862  } elseif (empty($morecss)) {
6863  if ($type == 'date') {
6864  $morecss = 'minwidth100imp';
6865  } elseif ($type == 'datetime' || $type == 'link') { // link means an foreign key to another primary id
6866  $morecss = 'minwidth200imp';
6867  } elseif (in_array($type, array('int', 'integer', 'price')) || preg_match('/^double(\‍([0-9],[0-9]\‍)){0,1}/', $type)) {
6868  $morecss = 'maxwidth75';
6869  } elseif ($type == 'url') {
6870  $morecss = 'minwidth400';
6871  } elseif ($type == 'boolean') {
6872  $morecss = '';
6873  } else {
6874  if (round($size) < 12) {
6875  $morecss = 'minwidth100';
6876  } elseif (round($size) <= 48) {
6877  $morecss = 'minwidth200';
6878  } else {
6879  $morecss = 'minwidth400';
6880  }
6881  }
6882  }
6883 
6884  // Add validation state class
6885  if (!empty($validationClass)) {
6886  $morecss.= $validationClass;
6887  }
6888 
6889  if (in_array($type, array('date'))) {
6890  $tmp = explode(',', $size);
6891  $newsize = $tmp[0];
6892  $showtime = 0;
6893 
6894  // Do not show current date when field not required (see selectDate() method)
6895  if (!$required && $value == '') {
6896  $value = '-1';
6897  }
6898 
6899  // TODO Must also support $moreparam
6900  $out = $form->selectDate($value, $keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $showtime, $showtime, $required, '', 1, (($keyprefix != 'search_' && $keyprefix != 'search_options_') ? 1 : 0), 0, 1);
6901  } elseif (in_array($type, array('datetime'))) {
6902  $tmp = explode(',', $size);
6903  $newsize = $tmp[0];
6904  $showtime = 1;
6905 
6906  // Do not show current date when field not required (see selectDate() method)
6907  if (!$required && $value == '') $value = '-1';
6908 
6909  // TODO Must also support $moreparam
6910  $out = $form->selectDate($value, $keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $showtime, $showtime, $required, '', 1, (($keyprefix != 'search_' && $keyprefix != 'search_options_') ? 1 : 0), 0, 1, '', '', '', 1, '', '', 'tzuserrel');
6911  } elseif (in_array($type, array('duration'))) {
6912  $out = $form->select_duration($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $value, 0, 'text', 0, 1);
6913  } elseif (in_array($type, array('int', 'integer'))) {
6914  $tmp = explode(',', $size);
6915  $newsize = $tmp[0];
6916  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'"'.($newsize > 0 ? ' maxlength="'.$newsize.'"' : '').' value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'"'.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').($autofocusoncreate ? ' autofocus' : '').'>';
6917  } elseif (in_array($type, array('real'))) {
6918  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'"'.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').($autofocusoncreate ? ' autofocus' : '').'>';
6919  } elseif (preg_match('/varchar/', $type)) {
6920  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'"'.($size > 0 ? ' maxlength="'.$size.'"' : '').' value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'"'.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').($autofocusoncreate ? ' autofocus' : '').'>';
6921  } elseif (in_array($type, array('email', 'mail', 'phone', 'url', 'ip'))) {
6922  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').($autofocusoncreate ? ' autofocus' : '').'>';
6923  } elseif (preg_match('/^text/', $type)) {
6924  if (!preg_match('/search_/', $keyprefix)) { // If keyprefix is search_ or search_options_, we must just use a simple text field
6925  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/doleditor.class.php';
6926  $doleditor = new DolEditor($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $value, '', 200, 'dolibarr_notes', 'In', false, false, false, ROWS_5, '90%');
6927  $out = $doleditor->Create(1);
6928  } else {
6929  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
6930  }
6931  } elseif (preg_match('/^html/', $type)) {
6932  if (!preg_match('/search_/', $keyprefix)) { // If keyprefix is search_ or search_options_, we must just use a simple text field
6933  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/doleditor.class.php';
6934  $doleditor = new DolEditor($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $value, '', 200, 'dolibarr_notes', 'In', false, false, isModEnabled('fckeditor') && $conf->global->FCKEDITOR_ENABLE_SOCIETE, ROWS_5, '90%');
6935  $out = $doleditor->Create(1, '', true, '', '', $moreparam, $morecss);
6936  } else {
6937  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.dol_escape_htmltag($value).'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
6938  }
6939  } elseif ($type == 'boolean') {
6940  $checked = '';
6941  if (!empty($value)) {
6942  $checked = ' checked value="1" ';
6943  } else {
6944  $checked = ' value="1" ';
6945  }
6946  $out = '<input type="checkbox" class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" '.$checked.' '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
6947  } elseif ($type == 'price') {
6948  if (!empty($value)) { // $value in memory is a php numeric, we format it into user number format.
6949  $value = price($value);
6950  }
6951  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.$value.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'> '.$langs->getCurrencySymbol($conf->currency);
6952  } elseif (preg_match('/^double(\‍([0-9],[0-9]\‍)){0,1}/', $type)) {
6953  if (!empty($value)) { // $value in memory is a php numeric, we format it into user number format.
6954  $value = price($value);
6955  }
6956  $out = '<input type="text" class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.$value.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'> ';
6957  } elseif ($type == 'select') {
6958  $out = '';
6959  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_DISABLE_SELECT2)) {
6960  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
6961  $out .= ajax_combobox($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, array(), 0);
6962  }
6963 
6964  $out .= '<select class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
6965  if ((!isset($this->fields[$key]['default'])) || ($this->fields[$key]['notnull'] != 1)) {
6966  $out .= '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
6967  }
6968  foreach ($param['options'] as $keyb => $valb) {
6969  if ((string) $keyb == '') {
6970  continue;
6971  }
6972  if (strpos($valb, "|") !== false) {
6973  list($valb, $parent) = explode('|', $valb);
6974  }
6975  $out .= '<option value="'.$keyb.'"';
6976  $out .= (((string) $value == (string) $keyb) ? ' selected' : '');
6977  $out .= (!empty($parent) ? ' parent="'.$parent.'"' : '');
6978  $out .= '>'.$valb.'</option>';
6979  }
6980  $out .= '</select>';
6981  } elseif ($type == 'sellist') {
6982  $out = '';
6983  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax) && empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_DISABLE_SELECT2)) {
6984  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/ajax.lib.php';
6985  $out .= ajax_combobox($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, array(), 0);
6986  }
6987 
6988  $out .= '<select class="flat '.$morecss.' maxwidthonsmartphone" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
6989  if (is_array($param['options'])) {
6990  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']);
6991  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
6992  $parentName = '';
6993  $parentField = '';
6994  // 0 : tableName
6995  // 1 : label field name
6996  // 2 : key fields name (if differ of rowid)
6997  // 3 : key field parent (for dependent lists)
6998  // 4 : where clause filter on column or table extrafield, syntax field='value' or extra.field=value
6999  // 5 : id category type
7000  // 6 : ids categories list separated by comma for category root
7001  $keyList = (empty($InfoFieldList[2]) ? 'rowid' : $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid');
7002 
7003  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 4 && !empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
7004  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra.') !== false) {
7005  $keyList = 'main.'.$InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
7006  } else {
7007  $keyList = $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
7008  }
7009  }
7010  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 3 && !empty($InfoFieldList[3])) {
7011  list($parentName, $parentField) = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[3]);
7012  $keyList .= ', '.$parentField;
7013  }
7014 
7015  $filter_categorie = false;
7016  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 5) {
7017  if ($InfoFieldList[0] == 'categorie') {
7018  $filter_categorie = true;
7019  }
7020  }
7021 
7022  if ($filter_categorie === false) {
7023  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7024  if (is_array($fields_label)) {
7025  $keyList .= ', ';
7026  $keyList .= implode(', ', $fields_label);
7027  }
7028 
7029  $sqlwhere = '';
7030  $sql = "SELECT " . $keyList;
7031  $sql .= " FROM " . $this->db->prefix() . $InfoFieldList[0];
7032  if (!empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
7033  // can use SELECT request
7034  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], '$SEL$') !== false) {
7035  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$SEL$', 'SELECT', $InfoFieldList[4]);
7036  }
7037 
7038  // current object id can be use into filter
7039  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], '$ID$') !== false && !empty($objectid)) {
7040  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$ID$', $objectid, $InfoFieldList[4]);
7041  } else {
7042  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$ID$', '0', $InfoFieldList[4]);
7043  }
7044 
7045  //We have to join on extrafield table
7046  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra') !== false) {
7047  $sql .= " as main, " . $this->db->prefix() . $InfoFieldList[0] . "_extrafields as extra";
7048  $sqlwhere .= " WHERE extra.fk_object=main." . $InfoFieldList[2] . " AND " . $InfoFieldList[4];
7049  } else {
7050  $sqlwhere .= " WHERE " . $InfoFieldList[4];
7051  }
7052  } else {
7053  $sqlwhere .= ' WHERE 1=1';
7054  }
7055  // Some tables may have field, some other not. For the moment we disable it.
7056  if (in_array($InfoFieldList[0], array('tablewithentity'))) {
7057  $sqlwhere .= " AND entity = " . ((int) $conf->entity);
7058  }
7059  $sql .= $sqlwhere;
7060  //print $sql;
7061 
7062  $sql .= ' ORDER BY ' . implode(', ', $fields_label);
7063 
7064  dol_syslog(get_class($this) . '::showInputField type=sellist', LOG_DEBUG);
7065  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
7066  if ($resql) {
7067  $out .= '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
7068  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
7069  $i = 0;
7070  while ($i < $num) {
7071  $labeltoshow = '';
7072  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
7073 
7074  // Several field into label (eq table:code|libelle:rowid)
7075  $notrans = false;
7076  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7077  if (count($fields_label) > 1) {
7078  $notrans = true;
7079  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
7080  $labeltoshow .= $obj->$field_toshow . ' ';
7081  }
7082  } else {
7083  $labeltoshow = $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]};
7084  }
7085  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($labeltoshow, 45);
7086 
7087  if ($value == $obj->rowid) {
7088  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
7089  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->$field_toshow);
7090  if ($translabel != $obj->$field_toshow) {
7091  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($translabel) . ' ';
7092  } else {
7093  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($obj->$field_toshow) . ' ';
7094  }
7095  }
7096  $out .= '<option value="' . $obj->rowid . '" selected>' . $labeltoshow . '</option>';
7097  } else {
7098  if (!$notrans) {
7099  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]});
7100  if ($translabel != $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]}) {
7101  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($translabel, 18);
7102  } else {
7103  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]});
7104  }
7105  }
7106  if (empty($labeltoshow)) {
7107  $labeltoshow = '(not defined)';
7108  }
7109  if ($value == $obj->rowid) {
7110  $out .= '<option value="' . $obj->rowid . '" selected>' . $labeltoshow . '</option>';
7111  }
7112 
7113  if (!empty($InfoFieldList[3]) && $parentField) {
7114  $parent = $parentName . ':' . $obj->{$parentField};
7115  $isDependList = 1;
7116  }
7117 
7118  $out .= '<option value="' . $obj->rowid . '"';
7119  $out .= ($value == $obj->rowid ? ' selected' : '');
7120  $out .= (!empty($parent) ? ' parent="' . $parent . '"' : '');
7121  $out .= '>' . $labeltoshow . '</option>';
7122  }
7123 
7124  $i++;
7125  }
7126  $this->db->free($resql);
7127  } else {
7128  print 'Error in request ' . $sql . ' ' . $this->db->lasterror() . '. Check setup of extra parameters.<br>';
7129  }
7130  } else {
7131  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
7132  $data = $form->select_all_categories(Categorie::$MAP_ID_TO_CODE[$InfoFieldList[5]], '', 'parent', 64, $InfoFieldList[6], 1, 1);
7133  $out .= '<option value="0">&nbsp;</option>';
7134  foreach ($data as $data_key => $data_value) {
7135  $out .= '<option value="' . $data_key . '"';
7136  $out .= ($value == $data_key ? ' selected' : '');
7137  $out .= '>' . $data_value . '</option>';
7138  }
7139  }
7140  }
7141  $out .= '</select>';
7142  } elseif ($type == 'checkbox') {
7143  $value_arr = explode(',', $value);
7144  $out = $form->multiselectarray($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, (empty($param['options']) ?null:$param['options']), $value_arr, '', 0, $morecss, 0, '100%');
7145  } elseif ($type == 'radio') {
7146  $out = '';
7147  foreach ($param['options'] as $keyopt => $valopt) {
7148  $out .= '<input class="flat '.$morecss.'" type="radio" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '');
7149  $out .= ' value="'.$keyopt.'"';
7150  $out .= ' id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'_'.$keyopt.'"';
7151  $out .= ($value == $keyopt ? 'checked' : '');
7152  $out .= '/><label for="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'_'.$keyopt.'">'.$valopt.'</label><br>';
7153  }
7154  } elseif ($type == 'chkbxlst') {
7155  if (is_array($value)) {
7156  $value_arr = $value;
7157  } else {
7158  $value_arr = explode(',', $value);
7159  }
7160 
7161  if (is_array($param['options'])) {
7162  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']);
7163  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
7164  $parentName = '';
7165  $parentField = '';
7166  // 0 : tableName
7167  // 1 : label field name
7168  // 2 : key fields name (if differ of rowid)
7169  // 3 : key field parent (for dependent lists)
7170  // 4 : where clause filter on column or table extrafield, syntax field='value' or extra.field=value
7171  // 5 : id category type
7172  // 6 : ids categories list separated by comma for category root
7173  $keyList = (empty($InfoFieldList[2]) ? 'rowid' : $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid');
7174 
7175  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 3 && !empty($InfoFieldList[3])) {
7176  list ($parentName, $parentField) = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[3]);
7177  $keyList .= ', '.$parentField;
7178  }
7179  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 4 && !empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
7180  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra.') !== false) {
7181  $keyList = 'main.'.$InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
7182  } else {
7183  $keyList = $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
7184  }
7185  }
7186 
7187  $filter_categorie = false;
7188  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 5) {
7189  if ($InfoFieldList[0] == 'categorie') {
7190  $filter_categorie = true;
7191  }
7192  }
7193 
7194  if ($filter_categorie === false) {
7195  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7196  if (is_array($fields_label)) {
7197  $keyList .= ', ';
7198  $keyList .= implode(', ', $fields_label);
7199  }
7200 
7201  $sqlwhere = '';
7202  $sql = "SELECT " . $keyList;
7203  $sql .= ' FROM ' . $this->db->prefix() . $InfoFieldList[0];
7204  if (!empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
7205  // can use SELECT request
7206  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], '$SEL$') !== false) {
7207  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$SEL$', 'SELECT', $InfoFieldList[4]);
7208  }
7209 
7210  // current object id can be use into filter
7211  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], '$ID$') !== false && !empty($objectid)) {
7212  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$ID$', $objectid, $InfoFieldList[4]);
7213  } else {
7214  $InfoFieldList[4] = str_replace('$ID$', '0', $InfoFieldList[4]);
7215  }
7216 
7217  // We have to join on extrafield table
7218  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra') !== false) {
7219  $sql .= ' as main, ' . $this->db->prefix() . $InfoFieldList[0] . '_extrafields as extra';
7220  $sqlwhere .= " WHERE extra.fk_object=main." . $InfoFieldList[2] . " AND " . $InfoFieldList[4];
7221  } else {
7222  $sqlwhere .= " WHERE " . $InfoFieldList[4];
7223  }
7224  } else {
7225  $sqlwhere .= ' WHERE 1=1';
7226  }
7227  // Some tables may have field, some other not. For the moment we disable it.
7228  if (in_array($InfoFieldList[0], array('tablewithentity'))) {
7229  $sqlwhere .= " AND entity = " . ((int) $conf->entity);
7230  }
7231  // $sql.=preg_replace('/^ AND /','',$sqlwhere);
7232  // print $sql;
7233 
7234  $sql .= $sqlwhere;
7235  dol_syslog(get_class($this) . '::showInputField type=chkbxlst', LOG_DEBUG);
7236  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
7237  if ($resql) {
7238  $num = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
7239  $i = 0;
7240 
7241  $data = array();
7242 
7243  while ($i < $num) {
7244  $labeltoshow = '';
7245  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
7246 
7247  $notrans = false;
7248  // Several field into label (eq table:code|libelle:rowid)
7249  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7250  if (count($fields_label) > 1) {
7251  $notrans = true;
7252  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
7253  $labeltoshow .= $obj->$field_toshow . ' ';
7254  }
7255  } else {
7256  $labeltoshow = $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]};
7257  }
7258  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($labeltoshow, 45);
7259 
7260  if (is_array($value_arr) && in_array($obj->rowid, $value_arr)) {
7261  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
7262  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->$field_toshow);
7263  if ($translabel != $obj->$field_toshow) {
7264  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($translabel, 18) . ' ';
7265  } else {
7266  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($obj->$field_toshow, 18) . ' ';
7267  }
7268  }
7269 
7270  $data[$obj->rowid] = $labeltoshow;
7271  } else {
7272  if (!$notrans) {
7273  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]});
7274  if ($translabel != $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]}) {
7275  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($translabel, 18);
7276  } else {
7277  $labeltoshow = dol_trunc($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]}, 18);
7278  }
7279  }
7280  if (empty($labeltoshow)) {
7281  $labeltoshow = '(not defined)';
7282  }
7283 
7284  if (is_array($value_arr) && in_array($obj->rowid, $value_arr)) {
7285  $data[$obj->rowid] = $labeltoshow;
7286  }
7287 
7288  if (!empty($InfoFieldList[3]) && $parentField) {
7289  $parent = $parentName . ':' . $obj->{$parentField};
7290  $isDependList = 1;
7291  }
7292 
7293  $data[$obj->rowid] = $labeltoshow;
7294  }
7295 
7296  $i++;
7297  }
7298  $this->db->free($resql);
7299 
7300  $out = $form->multiselectarray($keyprefix . $key . $keysuffix, $data, $value_arr, '', 0, $morecss, 0, '100%');
7301  } else {
7302  print 'Error in request ' . $sql . ' ' . $this->db->lasterror() . '. Check setup of extra parameters.<br>';
7303  }
7304  } else {
7305  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
7306  $data = $form->select_all_categories(Categorie::$MAP_ID_TO_CODE[$InfoFieldList[5]], '', 'parent', 64, $InfoFieldList[6], 1, 1);
7307  $out = $form->multiselectarray($keyprefix . $key . $keysuffix, $data, $value_arr, '', 0, $morecss, 0, '100%');
7308  }
7309  }
7310  } elseif ($type == 'link') {
7311  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']); // $param_list='ObjectName:classPath[:AddCreateButtonOrNot[:Filter[:Sortfield]]]'
7312  $param_list_array = explode(':', $param_list[0]);
7313  $showempty = (($required && $default != '') ? 0 : 1);
7314 
7315  if (!preg_match('/search_/', $keyprefix)) {
7316  if (!empty($param_list_array[2])) { // If the entry into $fields is set to add a create button
7317  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['picto'])) {
7318  $morecss .= ' widthcentpercentminusxx';
7319  } else {
7320  $morecss .= ' widthcentpercentminusx';
7321  }
7322  } else {
7323  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['picto'])) {
7324  $morecss .= ' widthcentpercentminusx';
7325  }
7326  }
7327  }
7328 
7329  $out = $form->selectForForms($param_list[0], $keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix, $value, $showempty, '', '', $morecss, $moreparam, 0, empty($val['disabled']) ? 0 : 1);
7330 
7331  if (!empty($param_list_array[2])) { // If the entry into $fields is set to add a create button
7332  if (!GETPOSTISSET('backtopage') && empty($val['disabled']) && empty($nonewbutton)) { // To avoid to open several times the 'Create Object' button and to avoid to have button if field is protected by a "disabled".
7333  list($class, $classfile) = explode(':', $param_list[0]);
7334  if (file_exists(dol_buildpath(dirname(dirname($classfile)).'/card.php'))) {
7335  $url_path = dol_buildpath(dirname(dirname($classfile)).'/card.php', 1);
7336  } else {
7337  $url_path = dol_buildpath(dirname(dirname($classfile)).'/'.strtolower($class).'_card.php', 1);
7338  }
7339  $paramforthenewlink = '';
7340  $paramforthenewlink .= (GETPOSTISSET('action') ? '&action='.GETPOST('action', 'aZ09') : '');
7341  $paramforthenewlink .= (GETPOSTISSET('id') ? '&id='.GETPOST('id', 'int') : '');
7342  $paramforthenewlink .= (GETPOSTISSET('origin') ? '&origin='.GETPOST('origin', 'aZ09') : '');
7343  $paramforthenewlink .= (GETPOSTISSET('originid') ? '&originid='.GETPOST('originid', 'int') : '');
7344  $paramforthenewlink .= '&fk_'.strtolower($class).'=--IDFORBACKTOPAGE--';
7345  // TODO Add Javascript code to add input fields already filled into $paramforthenewlink so we won't loose them when going back to main page
7346  $out .= '<a class="butActionNew" title="'.$langs->trans("New").'" href="'.$url_path.'?action=create&backtopage='.urlencode($_SERVER['PHP_SELF'].($paramforthenewlink ? '?'.$paramforthenewlink : '')).'"><span class="fa fa-plus-circle valignmiddle"></span></a>';
7347  }
7348  }
7349  } elseif ($type == 'password') {
7350  // If prefix is 'search_', field is used as a filter, we use a common text field.
7351  $out = '<input type="'.($keyprefix == 'search_' ? 'text' : 'password').'" class="flat '.$morecss.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" value="'.$value.'" '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').'>';
7352  } elseif ($type == 'array') {
7353  $newval = $val;
7354  $newval['type'] = 'varchar(256)';
7355 
7356  $out = '';
7357  if (!empty($value)) {
7358  foreach ($value as $option) {
