7359  $out .= '<span><a class="'.dol_escape_htmltag($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix).'_del" href="javascript:;"><span class="fa fa-minus-circle valignmiddle"></span></a> ';
7360  $out .= $this->showInputField($newval, $keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'[]', $option, $moreparam, '', '', $morecss).'<br></span>';
7361  }
7362  }
7363  $out .= '<a id="'.dol_escape_htmltag($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix).'_add" href="javascript:;"><span class="fa fa-plus-circle valignmiddle"></span></a>';
7364 
7365  $newInput = '<span><a class="'.dol_escape_htmltag($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix).'_del" href="javascript:;"><span class="fa fa-minus-circle valignmiddle"></span></a> ';
7366  $newInput .= $this->showInputField($newval, $keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'[]', '', $moreparam, '', '', $morecss).'<br></span>';
7367 
7368  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
7369  $out .= '
7370  <script>
7371  $(document).ready(function() {
7372  $("a#'.dol_escape_js($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix).'_add").click(function() {
7373  $("'.dol_escape_js($newInput).'").insertBefore(this);
7374  });
7375 
7376  $(document).on("click", "a.'.dol_escape_js($keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix).'_del", function() {
7377  $(this).parent().remove();
7378  });
7379  });
7380  </script>';
7381  }
7382  }
7383  if (!empty($hidden)) {
7384  $out = '<input type="hidden" value="'.$value.'" name="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'" id="'.$keyprefix.$key.$keysuffix.'"/>';
7385  }
7386 
7387  if ($isDependList==1) {
7388  $out .= $this->getJSListDependancies('_common');
7389  }
7390  /* Add comments
7391  if ($type == 'date') $out.=' (YYYY-MM-DD)';
7392  elseif ($type == 'datetime') $out.=' (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)';
7393  */
7394 
7395  // Display error message for field
7396  if (!empty($fieldValidationErrorMsg) && function_exists('getFieldErrorIcon')) {
7397  $out .= ' '.getFieldErrorIcon($fieldValidationErrorMsg);
7398  }
7399 
7400  return $out;
7401  }
7402 
7416  public function showOutputField($val, $key, $value, $moreparam = '', $keysuffix = '', $keyprefix = '', $morecss = '')
7417  {
7418  global $conf, $langs, $form;
7419 
7420  if (!is_object($form)) {
7421  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/html.form.class.php';
7422  $form = new Form($this->db);
7423  }
7424 
7425  $objectid = $this->id; // Not used ???
7426 
7427  $label = empty($val['label']) ? '' : $val['label'];
7428  $type = empty($val['type']) ? '' : $val['type'];
7429  $size = empty($val['css']) ? '' : $val['css'];
7430  $reg = array();
7431 
7432  // Convert var to be able to share same code than showOutputField of extrafields
7433  if (preg_match('/varchar\‍((\d+)\‍)/', $type, $reg)) {
7434  $type = 'varchar'; // convert varchar(xx) int varchar
7435  $size = $reg[1];
7436  } elseif (preg_match('/varchar/', $type)) {
7437  $type = 'varchar'; // convert varchar(xx) int varchar
7438  }
7439  if (!empty($val['arrayofkeyval']) && is_array($val['arrayofkeyval'])) {
7440  $type = 'select';
7441  }
7442  if (preg_match('/^integer:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7443  $type = 'link';
7444  }
7445 
7446  $default = empty($val['default']) ? '' : $val['default'];
7447  $computed = empty($val['computed']) ? '' : $val['computed'];
7448  $unique = empty($val['unique']) ? '' : $val['unique'];
7449  $required = empty($val['required']) ? '' : $val['required'];
7450  $param = array();
7451  $param['options'] = array();
7452 
7453  if (!empty($val['arrayofkeyval']) && is_array($val['arrayofkeyval'])) {
7454  $param['options'] = $val['arrayofkeyval'];
7455  }
7456  if (preg_match('/^integer:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7457  $type = 'link';
7458  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2]=>$reg[1].':'.$reg[2]);
7459  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7460  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4] => 'N');
7461  $type = 'sellist';
7462  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7463  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2].':'.$reg[3] => 'N');
7464  $type = 'sellist';
7465  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7466  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2] => 'N');
7467  $type = 'sellist';
7468  } elseif (preg_match('/^chkbxlst:(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7469  $param['options'] = array($reg[1] => 'N');
7470  $type = 'chkbxlst';
7471  }
7472 
7473  $langfile = empty($val['langfile']) ? '' : $val['langfile'];
7474  $list = (empty($val['list']) ? '' : $val['list']);
7475  $help = (empty($val['help']) ? '' : $val['help']);
7476  $hidden = (($val['visible'] == 0) ? 1 : 0); // If zero, we are sure it is hidden, otherwise we show. If it depends on mode (view/create/edit form or list, this must be filtered by caller)
7477 
7478  if ($hidden) {
7479  return '';
7480  }
7481 
7482  // If field is a computed field, value must become result of compute
7483  if ($computed) {
7484  // Make the eval of compute string
7485  //var_dump($computed);
7486  $value = dol_eval($computed, 1, 0, '');
7487  }
7488 
7489  if (empty($morecss)) {
7490  if ($type == 'date') {
7491  $morecss = 'minwidth100imp';
7492  } elseif ($type == 'datetime' || $type == 'timestamp') {
7493  $morecss = 'minwidth200imp';
7494  } elseif (in_array($type, array('int', 'double', 'price'))) {
7495  $morecss = 'maxwidth75';
7496  } elseif ($type == 'url') {
7497  $morecss = 'minwidth400';
7498  } elseif ($type == 'boolean') {
7499  $morecss = '';
7500  } else {
7501  if (is_numeric($size) && round($size) < 12) {
7502  $morecss = 'minwidth100';
7503  } elseif (is_numeric($size) && round($size) <= 48) {
7504  $morecss = 'minwidth200';
7505  } else {
7506  $morecss = 'minwidth400';
7507  }
7508  }
7509  }
7510 
7511  // Format output value differently according to properties of field
7512  if (in_array($key, array('rowid', 'ref')) && method_exists($this, 'getNomUrl')) {
7513  if ($key != 'rowid' || empty($this->fields['ref'])) { // If we want ref field or if we want ID and there is no ref field, we show the link.
7514  $value = $this->getNomUrl(1, '', 0, '', 1);
7515  }
7516  } elseif ($key == 'status' && method_exists($this, 'getLibStatut')) {
7517  $value = $this->getLibStatut(3);
7518  } elseif ($type == 'date') {
7519  if (!empty($value)) {
7520  $value = dol_print_date($value, 'day'); // We suppose dates without time are always gmt (storage of course + output)
7521  } else {
7522  $value = '';
7523  }
7524  } elseif ($type == 'datetime' || $type == 'timestamp') {
7525  if (!empty($value)) {
7526  $value = dol_print_date($value, 'dayhour', 'tzuserrel');
7527  } else {
7528  $value = '';
7529  }
7530  } elseif ($type == 'duration') {
7531  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/date.lib.php';
7532  if (!is_null($value) && $value !== '') {
7533  $value = convertSecondToTime($value, 'allhourmin');
7534  }
7535  } elseif ($type == 'double' || $type == 'real') {
7536  if (!is_null($value) && $value !== '') {
7537  $value = price($value);
7538  }
7539  } elseif ($type == 'boolean') {
7540  $checked = '';
7541  if (!empty($value)) {
7542  $checked = ' checked ';
7543  }
7544  $value = '<input type="checkbox" '.$checked.' '.($moreparam ? $moreparam : '').' readonly disabled>';
7545  } elseif ($type == 'mail' || $type == 'email') {
7546  $value = dol_print_email($value, 0, 0, 0, 64, 1, 1);
7547  } elseif ($type == 'url') {
7548  $value = dol_print_url($value, '_blank', 32, 1);
7549  } elseif ($type == 'phone') {
7550  $value = dol_print_phone($value, '', 0, 0, '', '&nbsp;', 'phone');
7551  } elseif ($type == 'ip') {
7552  $value = dol_print_ip($value, 0);
7553  } elseif ($type == 'price') {
7554  if (!is_null($value) && $value !== '') {
7555  $value = price($value, 0, $langs, 0, 0, -1, $conf->currency);
7556  }
7557  } elseif ($type == 'select') {
7558  $value = isset($param['options'][$value])?$param['options'][$value]:'';
7559  } elseif ($type == 'sellist') {
7560  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']);
7561  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
7562 
7563  $selectkey = "rowid";
7564  $keyList = 'rowid';
7565 
7566  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 4 && !empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
7567  $selectkey = $InfoFieldList[2];
7568  $keyList = $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
7569  }
7570 
7571  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7572  if (is_array($fields_label)) {
7573  $keyList .= ', ';
7574  $keyList .= implode(', ', $fields_label);
7575  }
7576 
7577  $filter_categorie = false;
7578  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 5) {
7579  if ($InfoFieldList[0] == 'categorie') {
7580  $filter_categorie = true;
7581  }
7582  }
7583 
7584  $sql = "SELECT ".$keyList;
7585  $sql .= ' FROM '.$this->db->prefix().$InfoFieldList[0];
7586  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra') !== false) {
7587  $sql .= ' as main';
7588  }
7589  if ($selectkey == 'rowid' && empty($value)) {
7590  $sql .= " WHERE ".$selectkey." = 0";
7591  } elseif ($selectkey == 'rowid') {
7592  $sql .= " WHERE ".$selectkey." = ".((int) $value);
7593  } else {
7594  $sql .= " WHERE ".$selectkey." = '".$this->db->escape($value)."'";
7595  }
7596 
7597  //$sql.= ' AND entity = '.$conf->entity;
7598 
7599  dol_syslog(get_class($this).':showOutputField:$type=sellist', LOG_DEBUG);
7600  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
7601  if ($resql) {
7602  if ($filter_categorie === false) {
7603  $value = ''; // value was used, so now we reste it to use it to build final output
7604  $numrows = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
7605  if ($numrows) {
7606  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
7607 
7608  // Several field into label (eq table:code|libelle:rowid)
7609  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7610 
7611  if (is_array($fields_label) && count($fields_label) > 1) {
7612  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
7613  $translabel = '';
7614  if (!empty($obj->$field_toshow)) {
7615  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->$field_toshow);
7616  }
7617  if ($translabel != $field_toshow) {
7618  $value .= dol_trunc($translabel, 18) . ' ';
7619  } else {
7620  $value .= $obj->$field_toshow . ' ';
7621  }
7622  }
7623  } else {
7624  $translabel = '';
7625  if (!empty($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]})) {
7626  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]});
7627  }
7628  if ($translabel != $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]}) {
7629  $value = dol_trunc($translabel, 18);
7630  } else {
7631  $value = $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]};
7632  }
7633  }
7634  }
7635  } else {
7636  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT . '/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
7637 
7638  $toprint = array();
7639  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
7640  $c = new Categorie($this->db);
7641  $c->fetch($obj->rowid);
7642  $ways = $c->print_all_ways(); // $ways[0] = "ccc2 >> ccc2a >> ccc2a1" with html formatted text
7643  foreach ($ways as $way) {
7644  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories"' . ($c->color ? ' style="background: #' . $c->color . ';"' : ' style="background: #aaa"') . '>' . img_object('', 'category') . ' ' . $way . '</li>';
7645  }
7646  $value = '<div class="select2-container-multi-dolibarr" style="width: 90%;"><ul class="select2-choices-dolibarr">'.implode(' ', $toprint).'</ul></div>';
7647  }
7648  } else {
7649  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::showOutputField error '.$this->db->lasterror(), LOG_WARNING);
7650  }
7651  } elseif ($type == 'radio') {
7652  $value = $param['options'][$value];
7653  } elseif ($type == 'checkbox') {
7654  $value_arr = explode(',', $value);
7655  $value = '';
7656  if (is_array($value_arr) && count($value_arr) > 0) {
7657  $toprint = array();
7658  foreach ($value_arr as $keyval => $valueval) {
7659  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories" style="background: #bbb">'.$param['options'][$valueval].'</li>';
7660  }
7661  $value = '<div class="select2-container-multi-dolibarr" style="width: 90%;"><ul class="select2-choices-dolibarr">'.implode(' ', $toprint).'</ul></div>';
7662  }
7663  } elseif ($type == 'chkbxlst') {
7664  $value_arr = explode(',', $value);
7665 
7666  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']);
7667  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
7668 
7669  $selectkey = "rowid";
7670  $keyList = 'rowid';
7671 
7672  if (count($InfoFieldList) >= 3) {
7673  $selectkey = $InfoFieldList[2];
7674  $keyList = $InfoFieldList[2].' as rowid';
7675  }
7676 
7677  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7678  if (is_array($fields_label)) {
7679  $keyList .= ', ';
7680  $keyList .= implode(', ', $fields_label);
7681  }
7682 
7683  $filter_categorie = false;
7684  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 5) {
7685  if ($InfoFieldList[0] == 'categorie') {
7686  $filter_categorie = true;
7687  }
7688  }
7689 
7690  $sql = "SELECT ".$keyList;
7691  $sql .= ' FROM '.$this->db->prefix().$InfoFieldList[0];
7692  if (strpos($InfoFieldList[4], 'extra') !== false) {
7693  $sql .= ' as main';
7694  }
7695  // $sql.= " WHERE ".$selectkey."='".$this->db->escape($value)."'";
7696  // $sql.= ' AND entity = '.$conf->entity;
7697 
7698  dol_syslog(get_class($this).':showOutputField:$type=chkbxlst', LOG_DEBUG);
7699  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
7700  if ($resql) {
7701  if ($filter_categorie === false) {
7702  $value = ''; // value was used, so now we reste it to use it to build final output
7703  $toprint = array();
7704  while ($obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql)) {
7705  // Several field into label (eq table:code|libelle:rowid)
7706  $fields_label = explode('|', $InfoFieldList[1]);
7707  if (is_array($value_arr) && in_array($obj->rowid, $value_arr)) {
7708  if (is_array($fields_label) && count($fields_label) > 1) {
7709  foreach ($fields_label as $field_toshow) {
7710  $translabel = '';
7711  if (!empty($obj->$field_toshow)) {
7712  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->$field_toshow);
7713  }
7714  if ($translabel != $field_toshow) {
7715  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories" style="background: #bbb">' . dol_trunc($translabel, 18) . '</li>';
7716  } else {
7717  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories" style="background: #bbb">' . $obj->$field_toshow . '</li>';
7718  }
7719  }
7720  } else {
7721  $translabel = '';
7722  if (!empty($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]})) {
7723  $translabel = $langs->trans($obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]});
7724  }
7725  if ($translabel != $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]}) {
7726  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories" style="background: #bbb">' . dol_trunc($translabel, 18) . '</li>';
7727  } else {
7728  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories" style="background: #bbb">' . $obj->{$InfoFieldList[1]} . '</li>';
7729  }
7730  }
7731  }
7732  }
7733  } else {
7734  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT . '/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
7735 
7736  $toprint = array();
7737  while ($obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql)) {
7738  if (is_array($value_arr) && in_array($obj->rowid, $value_arr)) {
7739  $c = new Categorie($this->db);
7740  $c->fetch($obj->rowid);
7741  $ways = $c->print_all_ways(); // $ways[0] = "ccc2 >> ccc2a >> ccc2a1" with html formatted text
7742  foreach ($ways as $way) {
7743  $toprint[] = '<li class="select2-search-choice-dolibarr noborderoncategories"' . ($c->color ? ' style="background: #' . $c->color . ';"' : ' style="background: #aaa"') . '>' . img_object('', 'category') . ' ' . $way . '</li>';
7744  }
7745  }
7746  }
7747  }
7748  $value = '<div class="select2-container-multi-dolibarr" style="width: 90%;"><ul class="select2-choices-dolibarr">'.implode(' ', $toprint).'</ul></div>';
7749  } else {
7750  dol_syslog(get_class($this).'::showOutputField error '.$this->db->lasterror(), LOG_WARNING);
7751  }
7752  } elseif ($type == 'link') {
7753  $out = '';
7754 
7755  // only if something to display (perf)
7756  if ($value) {
7757  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']); // $param_list='ObjectName:classPath'
7758 
7759  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
7760  $classname = $InfoFieldList[0];
7761  $classpath = $InfoFieldList[1];
7762  $getnomurlparam = (empty($InfoFieldList[2]) ? 3 : $InfoFieldList[2]);
7763  $getnomurlparam2 = (empty($InfoFieldList[4]) ? '' : $InfoFieldList[4]);
7764  if (!empty($classpath)) {
7765  dol_include_once($InfoFieldList[1]);
7766  if ($classname && class_exists($classname)) {
7767  $object = new $classname($this->db);
7768  if ($object->element === 'product') { // Special cas for product because default valut of fetch are wrong
7769  $result = $object->fetch($value, '', '', '', 0, 1, 1);
7770  } else {
7771  $result = $object->fetch($value);
7772  }
7773  if ($result > 0) {
7774  if ($object->element === 'product') {
7775  $get_name_url_param_arr = array($getnomurlparam, $getnomurlparam2, 0, -1, 0, '', 0);
7776  if (isset($val['get_name_url_params'])) {
7777  $get_name_url_params = explode(':', $val['get_name_url_params']);
7778  if (!empty($get_name_url_params)) {
7779  $param_num_max = count($get_name_url_param_arr) - 1;
7780  foreach ($get_name_url_params as $param_num => $param_value) {
7781  if ($param_num > $param_num_max) {
7782  break;
7783  }
7784  $get_name_url_param_arr[$param_num] = $param_value;
7785  }
7786  }
7787  }
7788 
7792  $value = $object->getNomUrl($get_name_url_param_arr[0], $get_name_url_param_arr[1], $get_name_url_param_arr[2], $get_name_url_param_arr[3], $get_name_url_param_arr[4], $get_name_url_param_arr[5], $get_name_url_param_arr[6]);
7793  } else {
7794  $value = $object->getNomUrl($getnomurlparam, $getnomurlparam2);
7795  }
7796  } else {
7797  $value = '';
7798  }
7799  }
7800  } else {
7801  dol_syslog('Error bad setup of extrafield', LOG_WARNING);
7802  return 'Error bad setup of extrafield';
7803  }
7804  } else {
7805  $value = '';
7806  }
7807  } elseif ($type == 'password') {
7808  $value = preg_replace('/./i', '*', $value);
7809  } elseif ($type == 'array') {
7810  $value = implode('<br>', $value);
7811  } else { // text|html|varchar
7812  $value = dol_htmlentitiesbr($value);
7813  }
7814 
7815  //print $type.'-'.$size.'-'.$value;
7816  $out = $value;
7817 
7818  return $out;
7819  }
7820 
7827  public function clearFieldError($fieldKey)
7828  {
7829  $this->error = '';
7830  unset($this->validateFieldsErrors[$fieldKey]);
7831  }
7832 
7840  public function setFieldError($fieldKey, $msg = '')
7841  {
7842  global $langs;
7843  if (empty($msg)) { $msg = $langs->trans("UnknowError"); }
7844 
7845  $this->error = $this->validateFieldsErrors[$fieldKey] = $msg;
7846  }
7847 
7854  public function getFieldError($fieldKey)
7855  {
7856  if (!empty($this->validateFieldsErrors[$fieldKey])) {
7857  return $this->validateFieldsErrors[$fieldKey];
7858  }
7859  return '';
7860  }
7861 
7870  public function validateField($val, $fieldKey, $fieldValue)
7871  {
7872  global $langs;
7873 
7874  if (!class_exists('Validate')) { require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT . '/core/class/validate.class.php'; }
7875 
7876  $this->clearFieldError($fieldKey);
7877 
7878  if (!isset($val[$fieldKey])) {
7879  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $langs->trans('FieldNotFoundInObject'));
7880  return false;
7881  }
7882 
7883  $param = array();
7884  $param['options'] = array();
7885  $type = $val[$fieldKey]['type'];
7886 
7887  $required = false;
7888  if (isset($val[$fieldKey]['notnull']) && $val[$fieldKey]['notnull'] === 1) {
7889  // 'notnull' is set to 1 if not null in database. Set to -1 if we must set data to null if empty ('' or 0).
7890  $required = true;
7891  }
7892 
7893  $maxSize = 0;
7894  $minSize = 0;
7895 
7896  //
7897  // PREPARE Elements
7898  //
7899 
7900  // Convert var to be able to share same code than showOutputField of extrafields
7901  if (preg_match('/varchar\‍((\d+)\‍)/', $type, $reg)) {
7902  $type = 'varchar'; // convert varchar(xx) int varchar
7903  $maxSize = $reg[1];
7904  } elseif (preg_match('/varchar/', $type)) {
7905  $type = 'varchar'; // convert varchar(xx) int varchar
7906  }
7907 
7908  if (!empty($val['arrayofkeyval']) && is_array($val['arrayofkeyval'])) {
7909  $type = 'select';
7910  }
7911 
7912  if (preg_match('/^integer:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7913  $type = 'link';
7914  }
7915 
7916  if (!empty($val['arrayofkeyval']) && is_array($val['arrayofkeyval'])) {
7917  $param['options'] = $val['arrayofkeyval'];
7918  }
7919 
7920  if (preg_match('/^integer:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7921  $type = 'link';
7922  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2]=>$reg[1].':'.$reg[2]);
7923  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7924  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2].':'.$reg[3].':'.$reg[4] => 'N');
7925  $type = 'sellist';
7926  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7927  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2].':'.$reg[3] => 'N');
7928  $type = 'sellist';
7929  } elseif (preg_match('/^sellist:(.*):(.*)/i', $val['type'], $reg)) {
7930  $param['options'] = array($reg[1].':'.$reg[2] => 'N');
7931  $type = 'sellist';
7932  }
7933 
7934  //
7935  // TEST Value
7936  //
7937 
7938  // Use Validate class to allow external Modules to use data validation part instead of concentrate all test here (factoring) or just for reuse
7939  $validate = new Validate($this->db, $langs);
7940 
7941 
7942  // little trick : to perform tests with good performances sort tests by quick to low
7943 
7944  //
7945  // COMMON TESTS
7946  //
7947 
7948  // Required test and empty value
7949  if ($required && !$validate->isNotEmptyString($fieldValue)) {
7950  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7951  return false;
7952  } elseif (!$required && !$validate->isNotEmptyString($fieldValue)) {
7953  // if no value sent and the field is not mandatory, no need to perform tests
7954  return true;
7955  }
7956 
7957  // MAX Size test
7958  if (!empty($maxSize) && !$validate->isMaxLength($fieldValue, $maxSize)) {
7959  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7960  return false;
7961  }
7962 
7963  // MIN Size test
7964  if (!empty($minSize) && !$validate->isMinLength($fieldValue, $minSize)) {
7965  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7966  return false;
7967  }
7968 
7969  //
7970  // TESTS for TYPE
7971  //
7972 
7973  if (in_array($type, array('date', 'datetime', 'timestamp'))) {
7974  if (!$validate->isTimestamp($fieldValue)) {
7975  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7976  return false;
7977  } else { return true; }
7978  } elseif ($type == 'duration') {
7979  if (!$validate->isDuration($fieldValue)) {
7980  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7981  return false;
7982  } else { return true; }
7983  } elseif (in_array($type, array('double', 'real', 'price'))) {
7984  // is numeric
7985  if (!$validate->isNumeric($fieldValue)) {
7986  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7987  return false;
7988  } else { return true; }
7989  } elseif ($type == 'boolean') {
7990  if (!$validate->isBool($fieldValue)) {
7991  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7992  return false;
7993  } else { return true; }
7994  } elseif ($type == 'mail') {
7995  if (!$validate->isEmail($fieldValue)) {
7996  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
7997  return false;
7998  }
7999  } elseif ($type == 'url') {
8000  if (!$validate->isUrl($fieldValue)) {
8001  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
8002  return false;
8003  } else { return true; }
8004  } elseif ($type == 'phone') {
8005  if (!$validate->isPhone($fieldValue)) {
8006  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
8007  return false;
8008  } else { return true; }
8009  } elseif ($type == 'select' || $type == 'radio') {
8010  if (!isset($param['options'][$fieldValue])) {
8011  $this->error = $langs->trans('RequireValidValue');
8012  return false;
8013  } else { return true; }
8014  } elseif ($type == 'sellist' || $type == 'chkbxlst') {
8015  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']);
8016  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
8017  $value_arr = explode(',', $fieldValue);
8018  $value_arr = array_map(array($this->db, 'escape'), $value_arr);
8019 
8020  $selectkey = "rowid";
8021  if (count($InfoFieldList) > 4 && !empty($InfoFieldList[4])) {
8022  $selectkey = $InfoFieldList[2];
8023  }
8024 
8025  if (!$validate->isInDb($value_arr, $InfoFieldList[0], $selectkey)) {
8026  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
8027  return false;
8028  } else { return true; }
8029  } elseif ($type == 'link') {
8030  $param_list = array_keys($param['options']); // $param_list='ObjectName:classPath'
8031  $InfoFieldList = explode(":", $param_list[0]);
8032  $classname = $InfoFieldList[0];
8033  $classpath = $InfoFieldList[1];
8034  if (!$validate->isFetchable($fieldValue, $classname, $classpath)) {
8035  $this->setFieldError($fieldKey, $validate->error);
8036  return false;
8037  } else { return true; }
8038  }
8039 
8040  // if no test failled all is ok
8041  return true;
8042  }
8043 
8057  public function showOptionals($extrafields, $mode = 'view', $params = null, $keysuffix = '', $keyprefix = '', $onetrtd = 0, $display_type = 'card')
8058  {
8059  global $db, $conf, $langs, $action, $form, $hookmanager;
8060 
8061  if (!is_object($form)) {
8062  $form = new Form($db);
8063  }
8064  if (!is_object($extrafields)) {
8065  dol_syslog('Bad parameter extrafields for showOptionals', LOG_ERR);
8066  return 'Bad parameter extrafields for showOptionals';
8067  }
8068  if (!is_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element])) {
8069  dol_syslog("extrafields->attributes was not loaded with extrafields->fetch_name_optionals_label(table_element);", LOG_WARNING);
8070  }
8071 
8072  $out = '';
8073 
8074  $parameters = array('mode'=>$mode, 'params'=>$params, 'keysuffix'=>$keysuffix, 'keyprefix'=>$keyprefix, 'display_type'=>$display_type);
8075  $reshook = $hookmanager->executeHooks('showOptionals', $parameters, $this, $action); // Note that $action and $object may have been modified by hook
8076 
8077  if (empty($reshook)) {
8078  if (is_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]) && key_exists('label', $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]) && is_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label']) && count($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label']) > 0) {
8079  $out .= "\n";
8080  $out .= '<!-- commonobject:showOptionals --> ';
8081  $out .= "\n";
8082 
8083  $nbofextrafieldsshown = 0;
8084  $extrafields_collapse_num = '';
8085  $e = 0; // var to manage the modulo (odd/even)
8086 
8087  foreach ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['label'] as $key => $label) {
8088  // Show only the key field in params
8089  if (is_array($params) && array_key_exists('onlykey', $params) && $key != $params['onlykey']) {
8090  continue;
8091  }
8092 
8093  // Test on 'enabled' ('enabled' is different than 'list' = 'visibility')
8094  $enabled = 1;
8095  if ($enabled && isset($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['enabled'][$key])) {
8096  $enabled = dol_eval($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['enabled'][$key], 1, 1, '1');
8097  }
8098  if (empty($enabled)) {
8099  continue;
8100  }
8101 
8102  $visibility = 1;
8103  if ($visibility && isset($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['list'][$key])) {
8104  $visibility = dol_eval($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['list'][$key], 1, 1, '1');
8105  }
8106 
8107  $perms = 1;
8108  if ($perms && isset($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['perms'][$key])) {
8109  $perms = dol_eval($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['perms'][$key], 1, 1, '1');
8110  }
8111 
8112  if (($mode == 'create') && abs($visibility) != 1 && abs($visibility) != 3) {
8113  continue; // <> -1 and <> 1 and <> 3 = not visible on forms, only on list
8114  } elseif (($mode == 'edit') && abs($visibility) != 1 && abs($visibility) != 3 && abs($visibility) != 4) {
8115  continue; // <> -1 and <> 1 and <> 3 = not visible on forms, only on list and <> 4 = not visible at the creation
8116  } elseif ($mode == 'view' && empty($visibility)) {
8117  continue;
8118  }
8119  if (empty($perms)) {
8120  continue;
8121  }
8122  // Load language if required
8123  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['langfile'][$key])) {
8124  $langs->load($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['langfile'][$key]);
8125  }
8126 
8127  $colspan = 0;
8128  if (is_array($params) && count($params) > 0 && $display_type=='card') {
8129  if (array_key_exists('cols', $params)) {
8130  $colspan = $params['cols'];
8131  } elseif (array_key_exists('colspan', $params)) { // For backward compatibility. Use cols instead now.
8132  $reg = array();
8133  if (preg_match('/colspan="(\d+)"/', $params['colspan'], $reg)) {
8134  $colspan = $reg[1];
8135  } else {
8136  $colspan = $params['colspan'];
8137  }
8138  }
8139  }
8140  $colspan = intval($colspan);
8141 
8142  switch ($mode) {
8143  case "view":
8144  $value = ((!empty($this->array_options) && array_key_exists("options_".$key.$keysuffix, $this->array_options)) ? $this->array_options["options_".$key.$keysuffix] : null); // Value may be cleaned or formated later
8145  break;
8146  case "create":
8147  case "edit":
8148  // We get the value of property found with GETPOST so it takes into account:
8149  // default values overwrite, restore back to list link, ... (but not 'default value in database' of field)
8150  $check = 'alphanohtml';
8151  if (in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('html', 'text'))) {
8152  $check = 'restricthtml';
8153  }
8154  $getposttemp = GETPOST($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix, $check, 3); // GETPOST can get value from GET, POST or setup of default values overwrite.
8155  // GETPOST("options_" . $key) can be 'abc' or array(0=>'abc')
8156  if (is_array($getposttemp) || $getposttemp != '' || GETPOSTISSET($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix)) {
8157  if (is_array($getposttemp)) {
8158  // $getposttemp is an array but following code expects a comma separated string
8159  $value = implode(",", $getposttemp);
8160  } else {
8161  $value = $getposttemp;
8162  }
8163  } else {
8164  $value = (!empty($this->array_options["options_".$key]) ? $this->array_options["options_".$key] : ''); // No GET, no POST, no default value, so we take value of object.
8165  }
8166  //var_dump($keyprefix.' - '.$key.' - '.$keysuffix.' - '.$keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix.' - '.$this->array_options["options_".$key.$keysuffix].' - '.$getposttemp.' - '.$value);
8167  break;
8168  }
8169 
8170  $nbofextrafieldsshown++;
8171 
8172  // Output value of the current field
8173  if ($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key] == 'separate') {
8174  $extrafields_collapse_num = '';
8175  $extrafield_param = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['param'][$key];
8176  if (!empty($extrafield_param) && is_array($extrafield_param)) {
8177  $extrafield_param_list = array_keys($extrafield_param['options']);
8178 
8179  if (count($extrafield_param_list) > 0) {
8180  $extrafield_collapse_display_value = intval($extrafield_param_list[0]);
8181 
8182  if ($extrafield_collapse_display_value == 1 || $extrafield_collapse_display_value == 2) {
8183  $extrafields_collapse_num = $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['pos'][$key];
8184  }
8185  }
8186  }
8187 
8188  // if colspan=0 or 1, the second column is not extended, so the separator must be on 2 columns
8189  $out .= $extrafields->showSeparator($key, $this, ($colspan ? $colspan + 1 : 2), $display_type, $mode);
8190  } else {
8191  $class = (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['hidden'][$key]) ? 'hideobject ' : '');
8192  $csstyle = '';
8193  if (is_array($params) && count($params) > 0) {
8194  if (array_key_exists('class', $params)) {
8195  $class .= $params['class'].' ';
8196  }
8197  if (array_key_exists('style', $params)) {
8198  $csstyle = $params['style'];
8199  }
8200  }
8201 
8202  // add html5 elements
8203  $domData = ' data-element="extrafield"';
8204  $domData .= ' data-targetelement="'.$this->element.'"';
8205  $domData .= ' data-targetid="'.$this->id.'"';
8206 
8207  $html_id = (empty($this->id) ? '' : 'extrarow-'.$this->element.'_'.$key.'_'.$this->id);
8208  if ($display_type=='card') {
8209  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_USE_TWO_COLUMS) && ($e % 2) == 0) {
8210  $colspan = 0;
8211  }
8212 
8213  if ($action == 'selectlines') {
8214  $colspan++;
8215  }
8216  }
8217 
8218  // Convert date into timestamp format (value in memory must be a timestamp)
8219  if (in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('date'))) {
8220  $datenotinstring = null;
8221  if (array_key_exists('options_'.$key, $this->array_options)) {
8222  $datenotinstring = $this->array_options['options_'.$key];
8223  if (!is_numeric($this->array_options['options_'.$key])) { // For backward compatibility
8224  $datenotinstring = $this->db->jdate($datenotinstring);
8225  }
8226  }
8227  $datekey = $keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix;
8228  $value = (GETPOSTISSET($datekey)) ? dol_mktime(12, 0, 0, GETPOST($datekey.'month', 'int', 3), GETPOST($datekey.'day', 'int', 3), GETPOST($datekey.'year', 'int', 3)) : $datenotinstring;
8229  }
8230  if (in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('datetime'))) {
8231  $datenotinstring = null;
8232  if (array_key_exists('options_'.$key, $this->array_options)) {
8233  $datenotinstring = $this->array_options['options_'.$key];
8234  if (!is_numeric($this->array_options['options_'.$key])) { // For backward compatibility
8235  $datenotinstring = $this->db->jdate($datenotinstring);
8236  }
8237  }
8238  $timekey = $keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix;
8239  $value = (GETPOSTISSET($timekey)) ? dol_mktime(GETPOST($timekey.'hour', 'int', 3), GETPOST($timekey.'min', 'int', 3), GETPOST($timekey.'sec', 'int', 3), GETPOST($timekey.'month', 'int', 3), GETPOST($timekey.'day', 'int', 3), GETPOST($timekey.'year', 'int', 3), 'tzuserrel') : $datenotinstring;
8240  }
8241  // Convert float submited string into real php numeric (value in memory must be a php numeric)
8242  if (in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('price', 'double'))) {
8243  if (GETPOSTISSET($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix) || $value) {
8244  $value = price2num($value);
8245  } elseif (isset($this->array_options['options_'.$key])) {
8246  $value = $this->array_options['options_'.$key];
8247  }
8248  }
8249 
8250  // HTML, text, select, integer and varchar: take into account default value in database if in create mode
8251  if (in_array($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key], array('html', 'text', 'varchar', 'select', 'int', 'boolean'))) {
8252  if ($action == 'create') {
8253  $value = (GETPOSTISSET($keyprefix.'options_'.$key.$keysuffix) || $value) ? $value : $extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['default'][$key];
8254  }
8255  }
8256 
8257  $labeltoshow = $langs->trans($label);
8258  $helptoshow = $langs->trans($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['help'][$key]);
8259 
8260  if ($display_type == 'card') {
8261  $out .= '<tr '.($html_id ? 'id="'.$html_id.'" ' : '').$csstyle.' class="field_options_'.$key.' '.$class.$this->element.'_extras_'.$key.' trextrafields_collapse'.$extrafields_collapse_num.(!empty($this->id)?'_'.$this->id:'').'" '.$domData.' >';
8262  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_VIEW_LINE_NUMBER) && ($action == 'view' || $action == 'valid' || $action == 'editline' || $action == 'confirm_valid' || $action == 'confirm_cancel')) {
8263  $out .= '<td></td>';
8264  }
8265  $out .= '<td class="titlefieldcreate wordbreak';
8266  } elseif ($display_type == 'line') {
8267  $out .= '<div '.($html_id ? 'id="'.$html_id.'" ' : '').$csstyle.' class="fieldline_options_'.$key.' '.$class.$this->element.'_extras_'.$key.' trextrafields_collapse'.$extrafields_collapse_num.(!empty($this->id)?'_'.$this->id:'').'" '.$domData.' >';
8268  $out .= '<div style="display: inline-block; padding-right:4px" class="wordbreak';
8269  }
8270  //$out .= "titlefield";
8271  //if (GETPOST('action', 'restricthtml') == 'create') $out.='create';
8272  // BUG #11554 : For public page, use red dot for required fields, instead of bold label
8273  $tpl_context = isset($params["tpl_context"]) ? $params["tpl_context"] : "none";
8274  if ($tpl_context != "public") { // Public page : red dot instead of fieldrequired characters
8275  if ($mode != 'view' && !empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['required'][$key])) {
8276  $out .= ' fieldrequired';
8277  }
8278  }
8279  $out .= '">';
8280  if ($tpl_context == "public") { // Public page : red dot instead of fieldrequired characters
8281  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['help'][$key])) {
8282  $out .= $form->textwithpicto($labeltoshow, $helptoshow);
8283  } else {
8284  $out .= $labeltoshow;
8285  }
8286  if ($mode != 'view' && !empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['required'][$key])) {
8287  $out .= '&nbsp;<span style="color: red">*</span>';
8288  }
8289  } else {
8290  if (!empty($extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['help'][$key])) {
8291  $out .= $form->textwithpicto($labeltoshow, $helptoshow);
8292  } else {
8293  $out .= $labeltoshow;
8294  }
8295  }
8296 
8297  $out .= ($display_type == 'card' ? '</td>' : '</div>');
8298 
8299  $html_id = !empty($this->id) ? $this->element.'_extras_'.$key.'_'.$this->id : '';
8300  if ($display_type == 'card') {
8301  // a first td column was already output (and may be another on before if MAIN_VIEW_LINE_NUMBER set), so this td is the next one
8302  $out .= '<td '.($html_id ? 'id="'.$html_id.'" ' : '').' class="valuefieldcreate '.$this->element.'_extras_'.$key.'" '.($colspan ? ' colspan="'.$colspan.'"' : '').'>';
8303  } elseif ($display_type == 'line') {
8304  $out .= '<div '.($html_id ? 'id="'.$html_id.'" ' : '').' style="display: inline-block" class="valuefieldcreate '.$this->element.'_extras_'.$key.' extra_inline_'.$extrafields->attributes[$this->table_element]['type'][$key].'">';
8305  }
8306 
8307  switch ($mode) {
8308  case "view":
8309  $out .= $extrafields->showOutputField($key, $value, '', $this->table_element);
8310  break;
8311  case "create":
8312  $out .= $extrafields->showInputField($key, $value, '', $keysuffix, '', 0, $this->id, $this->table_element);
8313  break;
8314  case "edit":
8315  $out .= $extrafields->showInputField($key, $value, '', $keysuffix, '', 0, $this->id, $this->table_element);
8316  break;
8317  }
8318 
8319  $out .= ($display_type=='card' ? '</td>' : '</div>');
8320 
8321  if (!empty($conf->global->MAIN_EXTRAFIELDS_USE_TWO_COLUMS) && (($e % 2) == 1)) {
8322  $out .= ($display_type=='card' ? '</tr>' : '</div>');
8323  } else {
8324  $out .= ($display_type=='card' ? '</tr>' : '</div>');
8325  }
8326 
8327  $e++;
8328  }
8329  }
8330  $out .= "\n";
8331  // Add code to manage list depending on others
8332  if (!empty($conf->use_javascript_ajax)) {
8333  $out .= $this->getJSListDependancies();
8334  }
8335 
8336  $out .= '<!-- commonobject:showOptionals end --> '."\n";
8337 
8338  if (empty($nbofextrafieldsshown)) {
8339  $out = '';
8340  }
8341  }
8342  }
8343 
8344  $out .= $hookmanager->resPrint;
8345 
8346  return $out;
8347  }
8348 
8353  public function getJSListDependancies($type = '_extra')
8354  {
8355  $out = '
8356  <script>
8357  jQuery(document).ready(function() {
8358  function showOptions'.$type.'(child_list, parent_list, orig_select)
8359  {
8360  var val = $("select[name=\""+parent_list+"\"]").val();
8361  var parentVal = parent_list + ":" + val;
8362  if(typeof val == "string"){
8363  if(val != "") {
8364  var options = orig_select.find("option[parent=\""+parentVal+"\"]").clone();
8365  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"] option[parent]").remove();
8366  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"]").append(options);
8367  } else {
8368  var options = orig_select.find("option[parent]").clone();
8369  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"] option[parent]").remove();
8370  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"]").append(options);
8371  }
8372  } else if(val > 0) {
8373  var options = orig_select.find("option[parent=\""+parentVal+"\"]").clone();
8374  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"] option[parent]").remove();
8375  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"]").append(options);
8376  } else {
8377  var options = orig_select.find("option[parent]").clone();
8378  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"] option[parent]").remove();
8379  $("select[name=\""+child_list+"\"]").append(options);
8380  }
8381  }
8382  function setListDependencies'.$type.'() {
8383  jQuery("select option[parent]").parent().each(function() {
8384  var orig_select = {};
8385  var child_list = $(this).attr("name");
8386  orig_select[child_list] = $(this).clone();
8387  var parent = $(this).find("option[parent]:first").attr("parent");
8388  var infos = parent.split(":");
8389  var parent_list = infos[0];
8390 
8391  //Hide daughters lists
8392  if ($("#"+child_list).val() == 0 && $("#"+parent_list).val() == 0){
8393  $("#"+child_list).hide();
8394  //Show mother lists
8395  } else if ($("#"+parent_list).val() != 0){
8396  $("#"+parent_list).show();
8397  }
8398  //Show the child list if the parent list value is selected
8399  $("select[name=\""+parent_list+"\"]").click(function() {
8400  if ($(this).val() != 0){
8401  $("#"+child_list).show()
8402  }
8403  });
8404 
8405  //When we change parent list
8406  $("select[name=\""+parent_list+"\"]").change(function() {
8407  showOptions'.$type.'(child_list, parent_list, orig_select[child_list]);
8408  //Select the value 0 on child list after a change on the parent list
8409  $("#"+child_list).val(0).trigger("change");
8410  //Hide child lists if the parent value is set to 0
8411  if ($(this).val() == 0){
8412  $("#"+child_list).hide();
8413  }
8414  });
8415  });
8416  }
8417 
8418  setListDependencies'.$type.'();
8419  });
8420  </script>'."\n";
8421  return $out;
8422  }
8423 
8428  public function getRights()
8429  {
8430  global $user;
8431 
8432  $element = $this->element;
8433  if ($element == 'facturerec') {
8434  $element = 'facture';
8435  } elseif ($element == 'invoice_supplier_rec') {
8436  return $user->rights->fournisseur->facture;
8437  } elseif ($element == 'evaluation') {
8438  return $user->rights->hrm->evaluation;
8439  }
8440 
8441  return $user->rights->{$element};
8442  }
8443 
8456  public static function commonReplaceThirdparty(DoliDB $dbs, $origin_id, $dest_id, array $tables, $ignoreerrors = 0)
8457  {
8458  foreach ($tables as $table) {
8459  $sql = 'UPDATE '.$dbs->prefix().$table.' SET fk_soc = '.((int) $dest_id).' WHERE fk_soc = '.((int) $origin_id);
8460 
8461  if (!$dbs->query($sql)) {
8462  if ($ignoreerrors) {
8463  return true; // TODO Not enough. If there is A-B on kept thirdparty and B-C on old one, we must get A-B-C after merge. Not A-B.
8464  }
8465  //$this->errors = $db->lasterror();
8466  return false;
8467  }
8468  }
8469 
8470  return true;
8471  }
8472 
8485  public static function commonReplaceProduct(DoliDB $dbs, $origin_id, $dest_id, array $tables, $ignoreerrors = 0)
8486  {
8487  foreach ($tables as $table) {
8488  $sql = 'UPDATE '.MAIN_DB_PREFIX.$table.' SET fk_product = '.((int) $dest_id).' WHERE fk_product = '.((int) $origin_id);
8489 
8490  if (!$dbs->query($sql)) {
8491  if ($ignoreerrors) {
8492  return true; // TODO Not enough. If there is A-B on kept product and B-C on old one, we must get A-B-C after merge. Not A-B.
8493  }
8494  //$this->errors = $db->lasterror();
8495  return false;
8496  }
8497  }
8498 
8499  return true;
8500  }
8501 
8514  public function defineBuyPrice($unitPrice = 0.0, $discountPercent = 0.0, $fk_product = 0)
8515  {
8516  global $conf;
8517 
8518  $buyPrice = 0;
8519 
8520  if (($unitPrice > 0) && (isset($conf->global->ForceBuyingPriceIfNull) && $conf->global->ForceBuyingPriceIfNull > 0)) {
8521  // When ForceBuyingPriceIfNull is set
8522  $buyPrice = $unitPrice * (1 - $discountPercent / 100);
8523  } else {
8524  // Get cost price for margin calculation
8525  if (!empty($fk_product) && $fk_product > 0) {
8526  if (isset($conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE) && $conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE == 'costprice') {
8527  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/product.class.php';
8528  $product = new Product($this->db);
8529  $result = $product->fetch($fk_product);
8530  if ($result <= 0) {
8531  $this->errors[] = 'ErrorProductIdDoesNotExists';
8532  return -1;
8533  }
8534  if ($product->cost_price > 0) {
8535  $buyPrice = $product->cost_price;
8536  } elseif ($product->pmp > 0) {
8537  $buyPrice = $product->pmp;
8538  }
8539  } elseif (isset($conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE) && $conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE == 'pmp') {
8540  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/product/class/product.class.php';
8541  $product = new Product($this->db);
8542  $result = $product->fetch($fk_product);
8543  if ($result <= 0) {
8544  $this->errors[] = 'ErrorProductIdDoesNotExists';
8545  return -1;
8546  }
8547  if ($product->pmp > 0) {
8548  $buyPrice = $product->pmp;
8549  }
8550  }
8551 
8552  if (empty($buyPrice) && isset($conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE) && in_array($conf->global->MARGIN_TYPE, array('1', 'pmp', 'costprice'))) {
8553  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/fourn/class/fournisseur.product.class.php';
8554  $productFournisseur = new ProductFournisseur($this->db);
8555  if (($result = $productFournisseur->find_min_price_product_fournisseur($fk_product)) > 0) {
8556  $buyPrice = $productFournisseur->fourn_unitprice;
8557  } elseif ($result < 0) {
8558  $this->errors[] = $productFournisseur->error;
8559  return -2;
8560  }
8561  }
8562  }
8563  }
8564  return $buyPrice;
8565  }
8566 
8567  // phpcs:disable PEAR.NamingConventions.ValidFunctionName.ScopeNotCamelCaps
8585  public function show_photos($modulepart, $sdir, $size = 0, $nbmax = 0, $nbbyrow = 5, $showfilename = 0, $showaction = 0, $maxHeight = 120, $maxWidth = 160, $nolink = 0, $notitle = 0, $usesharelink = 0)
8586  {
8587  // phpcs:enable
8588  global $conf, $user, $langs;
8589 
8590  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/files.lib.php';
8591  include_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/lib/images.lib.php';
8592 
8593  $sortfield = 'position_name';
8594  $sortorder = 'asc';
8595 
8596  $dir = $sdir.'/';
8597  $pdir = '/';
8598 
8599  $dir .= get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $this, $modulepart);
8600  $pdir .= get_exdir(0, 0, 0, 0, $this, $modulepart);
8601 
8602  // For backward compatibility
8603  if ($modulepart == 'product') {
8604  if (getDolGlobalInt('PRODUCT_USE_OLD_PATH_FOR_PHOTO')) {
8605  $dir = $sdir.'/'.get_exdir($this->id, 2, 0, 0, $this, $modulepart).$this->id."/photos/";
8606  $pdir = '/'.get_exdir($this->id, 2, 0, 0, $this, $modulepart).$this->id."/photos/";
8607  }
8608  }
8609 
8610  // Defined relative dir to DOL_DATA_ROOT
8611  $relativedir = '';
8612  if ($dir) {
8613  $relativedir = preg_replace('/^'.preg_quote(DOL_DATA_ROOT, '/').'/', '', $dir);
8614  $relativedir = preg_replace('/^[\\/]/', '', $relativedir);
8615  $relativedir = preg_replace('/[\\/]$/', '', $relativedir);
8616  }
8617 
8618  $dirthumb = $dir.'thumbs/';
8619  $pdirthumb = $pdir.'thumbs/';
8620 
8621  $return = '<!-- Photo -->'."\n";
8622  $nbphoto = 0;
8623 
8624  $filearray = dol_dir_list($dir, "files", 0, '', '(\.meta|_preview.*\.png)$', $sortfield, (strtolower($sortorder) == 'desc' ?SORT_DESC:SORT_ASC), 1);
8625 
8626  /*if (getDolGlobalInt('PRODUCT_USE_OLD_PATH_FOR_PHOTO')) // For backward compatiblity, we scan also old dirs
8627  {
8628  $filearrayold=dol_dir_list($dirold,"files",0,'','(\.meta|_preview.*\.png)$',$sortfield,(strtolower($sortorder)=='desc'?SORT_DESC:SORT_ASC),1);
8629  $filearray=array_merge($filearray, $filearrayold);
8630  }*/
8631 
8632  completeFileArrayWithDatabaseInfo($filearray, $relativedir);
8633 
8634  if (count($filearray)) {
8635  if ($sortfield && $sortorder) {
8636  $filearray = dol_sort_array($filearray, $sortfield, $sortorder);
8637  }
8638 
8639  foreach ($filearray as $key => $val) {
8640  $photo = '';
8641  $file = $val['name'];
8642 
8643  //if (dol_is_file($dir.$file) && image_format_supported($file) >= 0)
8644  if (image_format_supported($file) >= 0) {
8645  $nbphoto++;
8646  $photo = $file;
8647  $viewfilename = $file;
8648 
8649  if ($size == 1 || $size == 'small') { // Format vignette
8650  // Find name of thumb file
8651  $photo_vignette = basename(getImageFileNameForSize($dir.$file, '_small'));
8652  if (!dol_is_file($dirthumb.$photo_vignette)) {
8653  $photo_vignette = '';
8654  }
8655 
8656  // Get filesize of original file
8657  $imgarray = dol_getImageSize($dir.$photo);
8658 
8659  if ($nbbyrow > 0) {
8660  if ($nbphoto == 1) {
8661  $return .= '<table class="valigntop center centpercent" style="border: 0; padding: 2px; border-spacing: 2px; border-collapse: separate;">';
8662  }
8663 
8664  if ($nbphoto % $nbbyrow == 1) {
8665  $return .= '<tr class="center valignmiddle" style="border: 1px">';
8666  }
8667  $return .= '<td style="width: '.ceil(100 / $nbbyrow).'%" class="photo">';
8668  } elseif ($nbbyrow < 0) {
8669  $return .= '<div class="inline-block">';
8670  }
8671 
8672  $return .= "\n";
8673 
8674  $relativefile = preg_replace('/^\//', '', $pdir.$photo);
8675  if (empty($nolink)) {
8676  $urladvanced = getAdvancedPreviewUrl($modulepart, $relativefile, 0, 'entity='.$this->entity);
8677  if ($urladvanced) {
8678  $return .= '<a href="'.$urladvanced.'">';
8679  } else {
8680  $return .= '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$this->entity.'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$photo).'" class="aphoto" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">';
8681  }
8682  }
8683 
8684  // Show image (width height=$maxHeight)
8685  // Si fichier vignette disponible et image source trop grande, on utilise la vignette, sinon on utilise photo origine
8686  $alt = $langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('File').': '.$relativefile;
8687  $alt .= ' - '.$langs->transnoentitiesnoconv('Size').': '.$imgarray['width'].'x'.$imgarray['height'];
8688  if ($notitle) {
8689  $alt = '';
8690  }
8691 
8692  $addphotorefcss = 1;
8693 
8694  if ($usesharelink) {
8695  if ($val['share']) {
8696  if (empty($maxHeight) || $photo_vignette && $imgarray['height'] > $maxHeight) {
8697  $return .= '<!-- Show original file (thumb not yet available with shared links) -->';
8698  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin'.($addphotorefcss ? ' photoref' : '').'" height="'.$maxHeight.'" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?hashp='.urlencode($val['share']).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'">';
8699  } else {
8700  $return .= '<!-- Show original file -->';
8701  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin'.($addphotorefcss ? ' photoref' : '').'" height="'.$maxHeight.'" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?hashp='.urlencode($val['share']).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'">';
8702  }
8703  } else {
8704  $return .= '<!-- Show nophoto file (because file is not shared) -->';
8705  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin'.($addphotorefcss ? ' photoref' : '').'" height="'.$maxHeight.'" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/public/theme/common/nophoto.png" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'">';
8706  }
8707  } else {
8708  if (empty($maxHeight) || $photo_vignette && $imgarray['height'] > $maxHeight) {
8709  $return .= '<!-- Show thumb -->';
8710  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin'.($addphotorefcss ? ' photoref' : '').' maxwidth150onsmartphone maxwidth200" height="'.$maxHeight.'" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$this->entity.'&file='.urlencode($pdirthumb.$photo_vignette).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'">';
8711  } else {
8712  $return .= '<!-- Show original file -->';
8713  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin'.($addphotorefcss ? ' photoref' : '').'" height="'.$maxHeight.'" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$this->entity.'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$photo).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($alt).'">';
8714  }
8715  }
8716 
8717  if (empty($nolink)) {
8718  $return .= '</a>';
8719  }
8720  $return .= "\n";
8721 
8722  if ($showfilename) {
8723  $return .= '<br>'.$viewfilename;
8724  }
8725  if ($showaction) {
8726  $return .= '<br>';
8727  // On propose la generation de la vignette si elle n'existe pas et si la taille est superieure aux limites
8728  if ($photo_vignette && (image_format_supported($photo) > 0) && ($this->imgWidth > $maxWidth || $this->imgHeight > $maxHeight)) {
8729  $return .= '<a href="'.$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"].'?id='.$this->id.'&action=addthumb&token='.newToken().'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$viewfilename).'">'.img_picto($langs->trans('GenerateThumb'), 'refresh').'&nbsp;&nbsp;</a>';
8730  }
8731  // Special cas for product
8732  if ($modulepart == 'product' && ($user->rights->produit->creer || $user->rights->service->creer)) {
8733  // Link to resize
8734  $return .= '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/core/photos_resize.php?modulepart='.urlencode('produit|service').'&id='.$this->id.'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$viewfilename).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("Resize")).'">'.img_picto($langs->trans("Resize"), 'resize', '').'</a> &nbsp; ';
8735 
8736  // Link to delete
8737  $return .= '<a href="'.$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"].'?id='.$this->id.'&action=delete&token='.newToken().'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$viewfilename).'">';
8738  $return .= img_delete().'</a>';
8739  }
8740  }
8741  $return .= "\n";
8742 
8743  if ($nbbyrow > 0) {
8744  $return .= '</td>';
8745  if (($nbphoto % $nbbyrow) == 0) {
8746  $return .= '</tr>';
8747  }
8748  } elseif ($nbbyrow < 0) {
8749  $return .= '</div>';
8750  }
8751  }
8752 
8753  if (empty($size)) { // Format origine
8754  $return .= '<img class="photo photowithmargin" src="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/viewimage.php?modulepart='.$modulepart.'&entity='.$this->entity.'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$photo).'">';
8755 
8756  if ($showfilename) {
8757  $return .= '<br>'.$viewfilename;
8758  }
8759  if ($showaction) {
8760  // Special case for product
8761  if ($modulepart == 'product' && ($user->rights->produit->creer || $user->rights->service->creer)) {
8762  // Link to resize
8763  $return .= '<a href="'.DOL_URL_ROOT.'/core/photos_resize.php?modulepart='.urlencode('produit|service').'&id='.$this->id.'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$viewfilename).'" title="'.dol_escape_htmltag($langs->trans("Resize")).'">'.img_picto($langs->trans("Resize"), 'resize', '').'</a> &nbsp; ';
8764 
8765  // Link to delete
8766  $return .= '<a href="'.$_SERVER["PHP_SELF"].'?id='.$this->id.'&action=delete&token='.newToken().'&file='.urlencode($pdir.$viewfilename).'">';
8767  $return .= img_delete().'</a>';
8768  }
8769  }
8770  }
8771 
8772  // On continue ou on arrete de boucler ?
8773  if ($nbmax && $nbphoto >= $nbmax) {
8774  break;
8775  }
8776  }
8777  }
8778 
8779  if ($size == 1 || $size == 'small') {
8780  if ($nbbyrow > 0) {
8781  // Ferme tableau
8782  while ($nbphoto % $nbbyrow) {
8783  $return .= '<td style="width: '.ceil(100 / $nbbyrow).'%">&nbsp;</td>';
8784  $nbphoto++;
8785  }
8786 
8787  if ($nbphoto) {
8788  $return .= '</table>';
8789  }
8790  }
8791  }
8792  }
8793 
8794  $this->nbphoto = $nbphoto;
8795 
8796  return $return;
8797  }
8798 
8799 
8806  protected function isArray($info)
8807  {
8808  if (is_array($info)) {
8809  if (isset($info['type']) && $info['type'] == 'array') {
8810  return true;
8811  } else {
8812  return false;
8813  }
8814  }
8815  return false;
8816  }
8817 
8824  public function isDate($info)
8825  {
8826  if (isset($info['type']) && ($info['type'] == 'date' || $info['type'] == 'datetime' || $info['type'] == 'timestamp')) {
8827  return true;
8828  }
8829  return false;
8830  }
8831 
8838  public function isDuration($info)
8839  {
8840  if (is_array($info)) {
8841  if (isset($info['type']) && ($info['type'] == 'duration')) {
8842  return true;
8843  } else {
8844  return false;
8845  }
8846  } else {
8847  return false;
8848  }
8849  }
8850 
8857  public function isInt($info)
8858  {
8859  if (is_array($info)) {
8860  if (isset($info['type']) && (preg_match('/(^int|int$)/i', $info['type']))) {
8861  return true;
8862  } else {
8863  return false;
8864  }
8865  } else {
8866  return false;
8867  }
8868  }
8869 
8876  public function isFloat($info)
8877  {
8878  if (is_array($info)) {
8879  if (isset($info['type']) && (preg_match('/^(double|real|price)/i', $info['type']))) {
8880  return true;
8881  } else {
8882  return false;
8883  }
8884  }
8885  return false;
8886  }
8887 
8894  public function isText($info)
8895  {
8896  if (is_array($info)) {
8897  if (isset($info['type']) && $info['type'] == 'text') {
8898  return true;
8899  } else {
8900  return false;
8901  }
8902  }
8903  return false;
8904  }
8905 
8912  protected function canBeNull($info)
8913  {
8914  if (is_array($info)) {
8915  if (isset($info['notnull']) && $info['notnull'] != '1') {
8916  return true;
8917  } else {
8918  return false;
8919  }
8920  }
8921  return true;
8922  }
8923 
8930  protected function isForcedToNullIfZero($info)
8931  {
8932  if (is_array($info)) {
8933  if (isset($info['notnull']) && $info['notnull'] == '-1') {
8934  return true;
8935  } else {
8936  return false;
8937  }
8938  }
8939  return false;
8940  }
8941 
8948  protected function isIndex($info)
8949  {
8950  if (is_array($info)) {
8951  if (isset($info['index']) && $info['index'] == true) {
8952  return true;
8953  } else {
8954  return false;
8955  }
8956  }
8957  return false;
8958  }
8959 
8960 
8969  protected function setSaveQuery()
8970  {
8971  global $conf;
8972 
8973  $queryarray = array();
8974  foreach ($this->fields as $field => $info) { // Loop on definition of fields
8975  // Depending on field type ('datetime', ...)
8976  if ($this->isDate($info)) {
8977  if (empty($this->{$field})) {
8978  $queryarray[$field] = null;
8979  } else {
8980  $queryarray[$field] = $this->db->idate($this->{$field});
8981  }
8982  } elseif ($this->isDuration($info)) {
8983  // $this->{$field} may be null, '', 0, '0', 123, '123'
8984  if ((isset($this->{$field}) && $this->{$field} != '') || !empty($info['notnull'])) {
8985  if (!isset($this->{$field})) {
8986  if (!empty($info['default'])) {
8987  $queryarray[$field] = $info['default'];
8988  } else {
8989  $queryarray[$field] = 0;
8990  }
8991  } else {
8992  $queryarray[$field] = (int) $this->{$field}; // If '0', it may be set to null later if $info['notnull'] == -1
8993  }
8994  } else {
8995  $queryarray[$field] = null;
8996  }
8997  } elseif ($this->isInt($info) || $this->isFloat($info)) {
8998  if ($field == 'entity' && is_null($this->{$field})) {
8999  $queryarray[$field] = ((int) $conf->entity);
9000  } else {
9001  // $this->{$field} may be null, '', 0, '0', 123, '123'
9002  if ((isset($this->{$field}) && $this->{$field} != '') || !empty($info['notnull'])) {
9003  if (!isset($this->{$field})) {
9004  $queryarray[$field] = 0;
9005  } elseif ($this->isInt($info)) {
9006  $queryarray[$field] = (int) $this->{$field}; // If '0', it may be set to null later if $info['notnull'] == -1
9007  } elseif ($this->isFloat($info)) {
9008  $queryarray[$field] = (double) $this->{$field}; // If '0', it may be set to null later if $info['notnull'] == -1
9009  }
9010  } else {
9011  $queryarray[$field] = null;
9012  }
9013  }
9014  } else {
9015  // Note: If $this->{$field} is not defined, it means there is a bug into definition of ->fields or a missing declaration of property
9016  // We should keep the warning generated by this because it is a bug somewhere else in code, not here.
9017  $queryarray[$field] = $this->{$field};
9018  }
9019 
9020  if ($info['type'] == 'timestamp' && empty($queryarray[$field])) {
9021  unset($queryarray[$field]);
9022  }
9023  if (!empty($info['notnull']) && $info['notnull'] == -1 && empty($queryarray[$field])) {
9024  $queryarray[$field] = null; // May force 0 to null
9025  }
9026  }
9027 
9028  return $queryarray;
9029  }
9030 
9037  public function setVarsFromFetchObj(&$obj)
9038  {
9039  global $db;
9040 
9041  foreach ($this->fields as $field => $info) {
9042  if ($this->isDate($info)) {
9043  if (is_null($obj->{$field}) || $obj->{$field} === '' || $obj->{$field} === '0000-00-00 00:00:00' || $obj->{$field} === '1000-01-01 00:00:00') {
9044  $this->{$field} = '';
9045  } else {
9046  $this->{$field} = $db->jdate($obj->{$field});
9047  }
9048  } elseif ($this->isInt($info)) {
9049  if ($field == 'rowid') {
9050  $this->id = (int) $obj->{$field};
9051  } else {
9052  if ($this->isForcedToNullIfZero($info)) {
9053  if (empty($obj->{$field})) {
9054  $this->{$field} = null;
9055  } else {
9056  $this->{$field} = (double) $obj->{$field};
9057  }
9058  } else {
9059  if (!is_null($obj->{$field}) || (isset($info['notnull']) && $info['notnull'] == 1)) {
9060  $this->{$field} = (int) $obj->{$field};
9061  } else {
9062  $this->{$field} = null;
9063  }
9064  }
9065  }
9066  } elseif ($this->isFloat($info)) {
9067  if ($this->isForcedToNullIfZero($info)) {
9068  if (empty($obj->{$field})) {
9069  $this->{$field} = null;
9070  } else {
9071  $this->{$field} = (double) $obj->{$field};
9072  }
9073  } else {
9074  if (!is_null($obj->{$field}) || (isset($info['notnull']) && $info['notnull'] == 1)) {
9075  $this->{$field} = (double) $obj->{$field};
9076  } else {
9077  $this->{$field} = null;
9078  }
9079  }
9080  } else {
9081  $this->{$field} = isset($obj->{$field}) ? $obj->{$field} : null;
9082  }
9083  }
9084 
9085  // If there is no 'ref' field, we force property ->ref to ->id for a better compatibility with common functions.
9086  if (!isset($this->fields['ref']) && isset($this->id)) {
9087  $this->ref = $this->id;
9088  }
9089  }
9090 
9097  public function getFieldList($alias = '')
9098  {
9099  $keys = array_keys($this->fields);
9100  if (!empty($alias)) {
9101  $keys_with_alias = array();
9102  foreach ($keys as $fieldname) {
9103  $keys_with_alias[] = $alias . '.' . $fieldname;
9104  }
9105  return implode(',', $keys_with_alias);
9106  } else {
9107  return implode(',', $keys);
9108  }
9109  }
9110 
9118  protected function quote($value, $fieldsentry)
9119  {
9120  if (is_null($value)) {
9121  return 'NULL';
9122  } elseif (preg_match('/^(int|double|real|price)/i', $fieldsentry['type'])) {
9123  return price2num("$value");
9124  } elseif (preg_match('/int$/i', $fieldsentry['type'])) {
9125  return (int) $value;
9126  } elseif ($fieldsentry['type'] == 'boolean') {
9127  if ($value) {
9128  return 'true';
9129  } else {
9130  return 'false';
9131  }
9132  } else {
9133  return "'".$this->db->escape($value)."'";
9134  }
9135  }
9136 
9137 
9145  public function createCommon(User $user, $notrigger = false)
9146  {
9147  global $langs;
9148  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::createCommon create", LOG_DEBUG);
9149 
9150  $error = 0;
9151 
9152  $now = dol_now();
9153 
9154  $fieldvalues = $this->setSaveQuery();
9155 
9156  if (array_key_exists('date_creation', $fieldvalues) && empty($fieldvalues['date_creation'])) {
9157  $fieldvalues['date_creation'] = $this->db->idate($now);
9158  }
9159  if (array_key_exists('fk_user_creat', $fieldvalues) && !($fieldvalues['fk_user_creat'] > 0)) {
9160  $fieldvalues['fk_user_creat'] = $user->id;
9161  }
9162  unset($fieldvalues['rowid']); // The field 'rowid' is reserved field name for autoincrement field so we don't need it into insert.
9163  if (array_key_exists('ref', $fieldvalues)) {
9164  $fieldvalues['ref'] = dol_string_nospecial($fieldvalues['ref']); // If field is a ref, we sanitize data
9165  }
9166 
9167  $keys = array();
9168  $values = array(); // Array to store string forged for SQL syntax
9169  foreach ($fieldvalues as $k => $v) {
9170  $keys[$k] = $k;
9171  $value = $this->fields[$k];
9172  $values[$k] = $this->quote($v, $value); // May return string 'NULL' if $value is null
9173  }
9174 
9175  // Clean and check mandatory
9176  foreach ($keys as $key) {
9177  // If field is an implicit foreign key field (so type = 'integer:...')
9178  if (preg_match('/^integer:/i', $this->fields[$key]['type']) && $values[$key] == '-1') {
9179  $values[$key] = '';
9180  }
9181  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['foreignkey']) && $values[$key] == '-1') {
9182  $values[$key] = '';
9183  }
9184 
9185  if (isset($this->fields[$key]['notnull']) && $this->fields[$key]['notnull'] == 1 && (!isset($values[$key]) || $values[$key] === 'NULL') && is_null($this->fields[$key]['default'])) {
9186  $error++;
9187  $langs->load("errors");
9188  dol_syslog("Mandatory field '".$key."' is empty and required into ->fields definition of class");
9189  $this->errors[] = $langs->trans("ErrorFieldRequired", $this->fields[$key]['label']);
9190  }
9191 
9192  // If value is null and there is a default value for field
9193  if (isset($this->fields[$key]['notnull']) && $this->fields[$key]['notnull'] == 1 && (!isset($values[$key]) || $values[$key] === 'NULL') && !is_null($this->fields[$key]['default'])) {
9194  $values[$key] = $this->quote($this->fields[$key]['default'], $this->fields[$key]);
9195  }
9196 
9197  // If field is an implicit foreign key field (so type = 'integer:...')
9198  if (preg_match('/^integer:/i', $this->fields[$key]['type']) && empty($values[$key])) {
9199  if (isset($this->fields[$key]['default'])) {
9200  $values[$key] = ((int) $this->fields[$key]['default']);
9201  } else {
9202  $values[$key] = 'null';
9203  }
9204  }
9205  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['foreignkey']) && empty($values[$key])) {
9206  $values[$key] = 'null';
9207  }
9208  }
9209 
9210  if ($error) {
9211  return -1;
9212  }
9213 
9214  $this->db->begin();
9215 
9216  if (!$error) {
9217  $sql = "INSERT INTO ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element;
9218  $sql .= " (".implode(", ", $keys).')';
9219  $sql .= " VALUES (".implode(", ", $values).")"; // $values can contains 'abc' or 123
9220 
9221  $res = $this->db->query($sql);
9222  if (!$res) {
9223  $error++;
9224  if ($this->db->lasterrno() == 'DB_ERROR_RECORD_ALREADY_EXISTS') {
9225  $this->errors[] = "ErrorRefAlreadyExists";
9226  } else {
9227  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
9228  }
9229  }
9230  }
9231 
9232  if (!$error) {
9233  $this->id = $this->db->last_insert_id($this->db->prefix().$this->table_element);
9234  }
9235 
9236  // If we have a field ref with a default value of (PROV)
9237  if (!$error) {
9238  if (key_exists('ref', $this->fields) && $this->fields['ref']['notnull'] > 0 && key_exists('default', $this->fields['ref']) && $this->fields['ref']['default'] == '(PROV)') {
9239  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element." SET ref = '(PROV".((int) $this->id).")' WHERE (ref = '(PROV)' OR ref = '') AND rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
9240  $resqlupdate = $this->db->query($sql);
9241 
9242  if ($resqlupdate === false) {
9243  $error++;
9244  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
9245  } else {
9246  $this->ref = '(PROV'.$this->id.')';
9247  }
9248  }
9249  }
9250 
9251  // Create extrafields
9252  if (!$error) {
9253  $result = $this->insertExtraFields();
9254  if ($result < 0) {
9255  $error++;
9256  }
9257  }
9258 
9259  // Create lines
9260  if (!empty($this->table_element_line) && !empty($this->fk_element)) {
9261  $num = (is_array($this->lines) ? count($this->lines) : 0);
9262  for ($i = 0; $i < $num; $i++) {
9263  $line = $this->lines[$i];
9264 
9265  $keyforparent = $this->fk_element;
9266  $line->$keyforparent = $this->id;
9267 
9268  // Test and convert into object this->lines[$i]. When coming from REST API, we may still have an array
9269  //if (! is_object($line)) $line=json_decode(json_encode($line), false); // convert recursively array into object.
9270  if (!is_object($line)) {
9271  $line = (object) $line;
9272  }
9273 
9274  $result = $line->create($user, 1);
9275  if ($result < 0) {
9276  $this->error = $line->error;
9277  $this->db->rollback();
9278  return -1;
9279  }
9280  }
9281  }
9282 
9283  // Triggers
9284  if (!$error && !$notrigger) {
9285  // Call triggers
9286  $result = $this->call_trigger(strtoupper(get_class($this)).'_CREATE', $user);
9287  if ($result < 0) {
9288  $error++;
9289  }
9290  // End call triggers
9291  }
9292 
9293  // Commit or rollback
9294  if ($error) {
9295  $this->db->rollback();
9296  return -1;
9297  } else {
9298  $this->db->commit();
9299  return $this->id;
9300  }
9301  }
9302 
9303 
9312  public function fetchCommon($id, $ref = null, $morewhere = '')
9313  {
9314  if (empty($id) && empty($ref) && empty($morewhere)) {
9315  return -1;
9316  }
9317 
9318  $fieldlist = $this->getFieldList('t');
9319  if (empty($fieldlist)) {
9320  return 0;
9321  }
9322 
9323  $sql = "SELECT ".$fieldlist;
9324  $sql .= " FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element.' as t';
9325 
9326  if (!empty($id)) {
9327  $sql .= ' WHERE t.rowid = '.((int) $id);
9328  } elseif (!empty($ref)) {
9329  $sql .= " WHERE t.ref = '".$this->db->escape($ref)."'";
9330  } else {
9331  $sql .= ' WHERE 1 = 1'; // usage with empty id and empty ref is very rare
9332  }
9333  if (empty($id) && isset($this->ismultientitymanaged) && $this->ismultientitymanaged == 1) {
9334  $sql .= ' AND t.entity IN ('.getEntity($this->table_element).')';
9335  }
9336  if ($morewhere) {
9337  $sql .= $morewhere;
9338  }
9339  $sql .= ' LIMIT 1'; // This is a fetch, to be sure to get only one record
9340 
9341  $res = $this->db->query($sql);
9342  if ($res) {
9343  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($res);
9344  if ($obj) {
9345  $this->setVarsFromFetchObj($obj);
9346 
9347  // Retrieve all extrafield
9348  // fetch optionals attributes and labels
9349  $this->fetch_optionals();
9350 
9351  return $this->id;
9352  } else {
9353  return 0;
9354  }
9355  } else {
9356  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
9357  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9358  return -1;
9359  }
9360  }
9361 
9368  public function fetchLinesCommon($morewhere = '')
9369  {
9370  $objectlineclassname = get_class($this).'Line';
9371  if (!class_exists($objectlineclassname)) {
9372  $this->error = 'Error, class '.$objectlineclassname.' not found during call of fetchLinesCommon';
9373  return -1;
9374  }
9375 
9376  $objectline = new $objectlineclassname($this->db);
9377 
9378  $sql = "SELECT ".$objectline->getFieldList('l');
9379  $sql .= " FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$objectline->table_element." as l";
9380  $sql .= " WHERE l.fk_".$this->db->escape($this->element)." = ".((int) $this->id);
9381  if ($morewhere) {
9382  $sql .= $morewhere;
9383  }
9384  if (isset($objectline->fields['position'])) {
9385  $sql .= $this->db->order('position', 'ASC');
9386  }
9387 
9388  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9389  if ($resql) {
9390  $num_rows = $this->db->num_rows($resql);
9391  $i = 0;
9392  while ($i < $num_rows) {
9393  $obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql);
9394  if ($obj) {
9395  $newline = new $objectlineclassname($this->db);
9396  $newline->setVarsFromFetchObj($obj);
9397 
9398  $this->lines[] = $newline;
9399  }
9400  $i++;
9401  }
9402 
9403  return 1;
9404  } else {
9405  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
9406  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9407  return -1;
9408  }
9409  }
9410 
9418  public function updateCommon(User $user, $notrigger = false)
9419  {
9420  global $conf, $langs;
9421  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::updateCommon update", LOG_DEBUG);
9422 
9423  $error = 0;
9424 
9425  $now = dol_now();
9426 
9427  // $this->oldcopy should have been set by the caller of update
9428  //if (empty($this->oldcopy)) {
9429  // $this->oldcopy = dol_clone($this);
9430  //}
9431 
9432  $fieldvalues = $this->setSaveQuery();
9433 
9434  if (array_key_exists('date_modification', $fieldvalues) && empty($fieldvalues['date_modification'])) {
9435  $fieldvalues['date_modification'] = $this->db->idate($now);
9436  }
9437  if (array_key_exists('fk_user_modif', $fieldvalues) && !($fieldvalues['fk_user_modif'] > 0)) {
9438  $fieldvalues['fk_user_modif'] = $user->id;
9439  }
9440  unset($fieldvalues['rowid']); // The field 'rowid' is reserved field name for autoincrement field so we don't need it into update.
9441  if (array_key_exists('ref', $fieldvalues)) {
9442  $fieldvalues['ref'] = dol_string_nospecial($fieldvalues['ref']); // If field is a ref, we sanitize data
9443  }
9444 
9445  // Add quotes and escape on fields with type string
9446  $keys = array();
9447  $values = array();
9448  $tmp = array();
9449  foreach ($fieldvalues as $k => $v) {
9450  $keys[$k] = $k;
9451  $value = $this->fields[$k];
9452  $values[$k] = $this->quote($v, $value);
9453  $tmp[] = $k.'='.$this->quote($v, $this->fields[$k]);
9454  }
9455 
9456  // Clean and check mandatory fields
9457  foreach ($keys as $key) {
9458  if (preg_match('/^integer:/i', $this->fields[$key]['type']) && $values[$key] == '-1') {
9459  $values[$key] = ''; // This is an implicit foreign key field
9460  }
9461  if (!empty($this->fields[$key]['foreignkey']) && $values[$key] == '-1') {
9462  $values[$key] = ''; // This is an explicit foreign key field
9463  }
9464 
9465  //var_dump($key.'-'.$values[$key].'-'.($this->fields[$key]['notnull'] == 1));
9466  /*
9467  if ($this->fields[$key]['notnull'] == 1 && empty($values[$key]))
9468  {
9469  $error++;
9470  $this->errors[]=$langs->trans("ErrorFieldRequired", $this->fields[$key]['label']);
9471  }*/
9472  }
9473 
9474  $sql = 'UPDATE '.$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element.' SET '.implode(', ', $tmp).' WHERE rowid='.((int) $this->id);
9475 
9476  $this->db->begin();
9477 
9478  if (!$error) {
9479  $res = $this->db->query($sql);
9480  if (!$res) {
9481  $error++;
9482  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
9483  }
9484  }
9485 
9486  // Update extrafield
9487  if (!$error) {
9488  $result = $this->insertExtraFields();
9489  if ($result < 0) {
9490  $error++;
9491  }
9492  }
9493 
9494  // Triggers
9495  if (!$error && !$notrigger) {
9496  // Call triggers
9497  $result = $this->call_trigger(strtoupper(get_class($this)).'_MODIFY', $user);
9498  if ($result < 0) {
9499  $error++;
9500  } //Do also here what you must do to rollback action if trigger fail
9501  // End call triggers
9502  }
9503 
9504  // Commit or rollback
9505  if ($error) {
9506  $this->db->rollback();
9507  return -1;
9508  } else {
9509  $this->db->commit();
9510  return $this->id;
9511  }
9512  }
9513 
9522  public function deleteCommon(User $user, $notrigger = false, $forcechilddeletion = 0)
9523  {
9524  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::deleteCommon delete", LOG_DEBUG);
9525 
9526  $error = 0;
9527 
9528  $this->db->begin();
9529 
9530  if ($forcechilddeletion) { // Force also delete of childtables that should lock deletion in standard case when option force is off
9531  foreach ($this->childtables as $table) {
9532  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$table." WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
9533  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9534  if (!$resql) {
9535  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
9536  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9537  $this->db->rollback();
9538  return -1;
9539  }
9540  }
9541  } elseif (!empty($this->fk_element) && !empty($this->childtables)) { // If object has childs linked with a foreign key field, we check all child tables.
9542  $objectisused = $this->isObjectUsed($this->id);
9543  if (!empty($objectisused)) {
9544  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::deleteCommon Can't delete record as it has some child", LOG_WARNING);
9545  $this->error = 'ErrorRecordHasChildren';
9546  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9547  $this->db->rollback();
9548  return 0;
9549  }
9550  }
9551 
9552  // Delete cascade first
9553  if (is_array($this->childtablesoncascade) && !empty($this->childtablesoncascade)) {
9554  foreach ($this->childtablesoncascade as $table) {
9555  $deleteFromObject = explode(':', $table);
9556  if (count($deleteFromObject) >= 2) {
9557  $className = str_replace('@', '', $deleteFromObject[0]);
9558  $filePath = $deleteFromObject[1];
9559  $columnName = $deleteFromObject[2];
9560  $TMoreSQL = array();
9561  $more_sql = $deleteFromObject[3];
9562  if (!empty($more_sql)) {
9563  $TMoreSQL['customsql'] = $more_sql;
9564  }
9565  if (dol_include_once($filePath)) {
9566  $childObject = new $className($this->db);
9567  if (method_exists($childObject, 'deleteByParentField')) {
9568  $result = $childObject->deleteByParentField($this->id, $columnName, $TMoreSQL);
9569  if ($result < 0) {
9570  $error++;
9571  $this->errors[] = $childObject->error;
9572  break;
9573  }
9574  } else {
9575  $error++;
9576  $this->errors[] = "You defined a cascade delete on an object $childObject but there is no method deleteByParentField for it";
9577  break;
9578  }
9579  } else {
9580  $error++;
9581  $this->errors[] = 'Cannot include child class file '.$filePath;
9582  break;
9583  }
9584  } else {
9585  // Delete record in child table
9586  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$table." WHERE ".$this->fk_element." = ".((int) $this->id);
9587 
9588  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9589  if (!$resql) {
9590  $error++;
9591  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
9592  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9593  break;
9594  }
9595  }
9596  }
9597  }
9598 
9599  if (!$error) {
9600  if (!$notrigger) {
9601  // Call triggers
9602  $result = $this->call_trigger(strtoupper(get_class($this)).'_DELETE', $user);
9603  if ($result < 0) {
9604  $error++;
9605  } // Do also here what you must do to rollback action if trigger fail
9606  // End call triggers
9607  }
9608  }
9609 
9610  // Delete llx_ecm_files
9611  if (!$error) {
9612  $res = $this->deleteEcmFiles(1); // Deleting files physically is done later with the dol_delete_dir_recursive
9613  if (!$res) {
9614  $error++;
9615  }
9616  }
9617 
9618  // Delete linked object
9619  $res = $this->deleteObjectLinked();
9620  if ($res < 0) {
9621  $error++;
9622  }
9623 
9624  if (!$error && !empty($this->isextrafieldmanaged)) {
9625  $result = $this->deleteExtraFields();
9626  if ($result < 0) {
9627  $error++;
9628  }
9629  }
9630 
9631  if (!$error) {
9632  $sql = 'DELETE FROM '.$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element.' WHERE rowid='.((int) $this->id);
9633 
9634  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9635  if (!$resql) {
9636  $error++;
9637  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
9638  }
9639  }
9640 
9641  // Commit or rollback
9642  if ($error) {
9643  $this->db->rollback();
9644  return -1;
9645  } else {
9646  $this->db->commit();
9647  return 1;
9648  }
9649  }
9650 
9661  public function deleteByParentField($parentId = 0, $parentField = '', $filter = array(), $filtermode = "AND")
9662  {
9663  global $user;
9664 
9665  $error = 0;
9666  $deleted = 0;
9667 
9668  if (!empty($parentId) && !empty($parentField)) {
9669  $this->db->begin();
9670 
9671  $sql = "SELECT rowid FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element;
9672  $sql .= " WHERE ".$parentField." = ".(int) $parentId;
9673 
9674  // Manage filters
9675  $sqlwhere = array();
9676  if (count($filter) > 0) {
9677  foreach ($filter as $key => $value) {
9678  if ($key == 'customsql') {
9679  $sqlwhere[] = $value;
9680  } elseif (strpos($value, '%') === false) {
9681  $sqlwhere[] = $key." IN (".$this->db->sanitize($this->db->escape($value)).")";
9682  } else {
9683  $sqlwhere[] = $key." LIKE '%".$this->db->escape($value)."%'";
9684  }
9685  }
9686  }
9687  if (count($sqlwhere) > 0) {
9688  $sql .= " AND (".implode(" ".$filtermode." ", $sqlwhere).")";
9689  }
9690 
9691  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9692  if (!$resql) {
9693  $this->errors[] = $this->db->lasterror();
9694  $error++;
9695  } else {
9696  while ($obj = $this->db->fetch_object($resql)) {
9697  $result = $this->fetch($obj->rowid);
9698  if ($result < 0) {
9699  $error++;
9700  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9701  } else {
9702  if (get_class($this) == 'Contact') { // TODO special code because delete() for contact has not been standardized like other delete.
9703  $result = $this->delete();
9704  } else {
9705  $result = $this->delete($user);
9706  }
9707  if ($result < 0) {
9708  $error++;
9709  $this->errors[] = $this->error;
9710  } else {
9711  $deleted++;
9712  }
9713  }
9714  }
9715  }
9716 
9717  if (empty($error)) {
