9718  $this->db->commit();
9719  return $deleted;
9720  } else {
9721  $this->error = implode(', ', $this->errors);
9722  $this->db->rollback();
9723  return $error * -1;
9724  }
9725  }
9726 
9727  return $deleted;
9728  }
9729 
9738  public function deleteLineCommon(User $user, $idline, $notrigger = false)
9739  {
9740  global $conf;
9741 
9742  $error = 0;
9743 
9744  $tmpforobjectclass = get_class($this);
9745  $tmpforobjectlineclass = ucfirst($tmpforobjectclass).'Line';
9746 
9747  $this->db->begin();
9748 
9749  // Call trigger
9750  $result = $this->call_trigger('LINE'.strtoupper($tmpforobjectclass).'_DELETE', $user);
9751  if ($result < 0) {
9752  $error++;
9753  }
9754  // End call triggers
9755 
9756  if (empty($error)) {
9757  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element_line;
9758  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $idline);
9759 
9760  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
9761  if (!$resql) {
9762  $this->error = "Error ".$this->db->lasterror();
9763  $error++;
9764  }
9765  }
9766 
9767  if (empty($error)) {
9768  // Remove extrafields
9769  $tmpobjectline = new $tmpforobjectlineclass($this->db);
9770  if (!isset($tmpobjectline->isextrafieldmanaged) || !empty($tmpobjectline->isextrafieldmanaged)) {
9771  $tmpobjectline->id = $idline;
9772  $result = $tmpobjectline->deleteExtraFields();
9773  if ($result < 0) {
9774  $error++;
9775  $this->error = "Error ".get_class($this)."::deleteLineCommon deleteExtraFields error -4 ".$tmpobjectline->error;
9776  }
9777  }
9778  }
9779 
9780  if (empty($error)) {
9781  $this->db->commit();
9782  return 1;
9783  } else {
9784  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::deleteLineCommon ERROR:".$this->error, LOG_ERR);
9785  $this->db->rollback();
9786  return -1;
9787  }
9788  }
9789 
9790 
9800  public function setStatusCommon($user, $status, $notrigger = 0, $triggercode = '')
9801  {
9802  $error = 0;
9803 
9804  $this->db->begin();
9805 
9806  $statusfield = 'status';
9807  if ($this->element == 'don' || $this->element == 'donation') {
9808  $statusfield = 'fk_statut';
9809  }
9810 
9811  $sql = "UPDATE ".$this->db->prefix().$this->table_element;
9812  $sql .= " SET ".$statusfield." = ".((int) $status);
9813  $sql .= " WHERE rowid = ".((int) $this->id);
9814 
9815  if ($this->db->query($sql)) {
9816  if (!$error) {
9817  $this->oldcopy = clone $this;
9818  }
9819 
9820  if (!$error && !$notrigger) {
9821  // Call trigger
9822  $result = $this->call_trigger($triggercode, $user);
9823  if ($result < 0) {
9824  $error++;
9825  }
9826  }
9827 
9828  if (!$error) {
9829  $this->status = $status;
9830  $this->db->commit();
9831  return 1;
9832  } else {
9833  $this->db->rollback();
9834  return -1;
9835  }
9836  } else {
9837  $this->error = $this->db->error();
9838  $this->db->rollback();
9839  return -1;
9840  }
9841  }
9842 
9843 
9850  public function initAsSpecimenCommon()
9851  {
9852  global $user;
9853 
9854  $this->id = 0;
9855  $this->specimen = 1;
9856  $fields = array(
9857  'label' => 'This is label',
9858  'ref' => 'ABCD1234',
9859  'description' => 'This is a description',
9860  'qty' => 123.12,
9861  'note_public' => 'Public note',
9862  'note_private' => 'Private note',
9863  'date_creation' => (dol_now() - 3600 * 48),
9864  'date_modification' => (dol_now() - 3600 * 24),
9865  'fk_user_creat' => $user->id,
9866  'fk_user_modif' => $user->id,
9867  'date' => dol_now(),
9868  );
9869  foreach ($fields as $key => $value) {
9870  if (array_key_exists($key, $this->fields)) {
9871  $this->{$key} = $value;
9872  }
9873  }
9874  return 1;
9875  }
9876 
9877 
9878  /* Part for comments */
9879 
9884  public function fetchComments()
9885  {
9886  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/core/class/comment.class.php';
9887 
9888  $comment = new Comment($this->db);
9889  $result = $comment->fetchAllFor($this->element, $this->id);
9890  if ($result < 0) {
9891  $this->errors = array_merge($this->errors, $comment->errors);
9892  return -1;
9893  } else {
9894  $this->comments = $comment->comments;
9895  }
9896  return count($this->comments);
9897  }
9898 
9904  public function getNbComments()
9905  {
9906  return count($this->comments);
9907  }
9908 
9915  public function trimParameters($parameters)
9916  {
9917  if (!is_array($parameters)) {
9918  return;
9919  }
9920  foreach ($parameters as $parameter) {
9921  if (isset($this->$parameter)) {
9922  $this->$parameter = trim($this->$parameter);
9923  }
9924  }
9925  }
9926 
9927  /* Part for categories/tags */
9928 
9939  public function getCategoriesCommon($type_categ)
9940  {
9941  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
9942 
9943  // Get current categories
9944  $c = new Categorie($this->db);
9945  $existing = $c->containing($this->id, $type_categ, 'id');
9946 
9947  return $existing;
9948  }
9949 
9962  public function setCategoriesCommon($categories, $type_categ = '', $remove_existing = true)
9963  {
9964  // Handle single category
9965  if (!is_array($categories)) {
9966  $categories = array($categories);
9967  }
9968 
9969  dol_syslog(get_class($this)."::setCategoriesCommon Oject Id:".$this->id.' type_categ:'.$type_categ.' nb tag add:'.count($categories), LOG_DEBUG);
9970 
9971  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
9972 
9973  if (empty($type_categ)) {
9974  dol_syslog(__METHOD__.': Type '.$type_categ.'is an unknown category type. Done nothing.', LOG_ERR);
9975  return -1;
9976  }
9977 
9978  // Get current categories
9979  $c = new Categorie($this->db);
9980  $existing = $c->containing($this->id, $type_categ, 'id');
9981  if ($remove_existing) {
9982  // Diff
9983  if (is_array($existing)) {
9984  $to_del = array_diff($existing, $categories);
9985  $to_add = array_diff($categories, $existing);
9986  } else {
9987  $to_del = array(); // Nothing to delete
9988  $to_add = $categories;
9989  }
9990  } else {
9991  $to_del = array(); // Nothing to delete
9992  $to_add = array_diff($categories, $existing);
9993  }
9994 
9995  $error = 0;
9996  $ok = 0;
9997 
9998  // Process
9999  foreach ($to_del as $del) {
10000  if ($c->fetch($del) > 0) {
10001  $result=$c->del_type($this, $type_categ);
10002  if ($result < 0) {
10003  $error++;
10004  $this->error = $c->error;
10005  $this->errors = $c->errors;
10006  break;
10007  } else {
10008  $ok += $result;
10009  }
10010  }
10011  }
10012  foreach ($to_add as $add) {
10013  if ($c->fetch($add) > 0) {
10014  $result = $c->add_type($this, $type_categ);
10015  if ($result < 0) {
10016  $error++;
10017  $this->error = $c->error;
10018  $this->errors = $c->errors;
10019  break;
10020  } else {
10021  $ok += $result;
10022  }
10023  }
10024  }
10025 
10026  return $error ? (-1 * $error) : $ok;
10027  }
10028 
10037  public function cloneCategories($fromId, $toId, $type = '')
10038  {
10039  $this->db->begin();
10040 
10041  if (empty($type)) {
10042  $type = $this->table_element;
10043  }
10044 
10045  require_once DOL_DOCUMENT_ROOT.'/categories/class/categorie.class.php';
10046  $categorystatic = new Categorie($this->db);
10047 
10048  $sql = "INSERT INTO ".$this->db->prefix()."categorie_".(empty($categorystatic->MAP_CAT_TABLE[$type]) ? $type : $categorystatic->MAP_CAT_TABLE[$type])." (fk_categorie, fk_product)";
10049  $sql .= " SELECT fk_categorie, $toId FROM ".$this->db->prefix()."categorie_".(empty($categorystatic->MAP_CAT_TABLE[$type]) ? $type : $categorystatic->MAP_CAT_TABLE[$type]);
10050  $sql .= " WHERE fk_product = ".((int) $fromId);
10051 
10052  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
10053  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
10054  $this->db->rollback();
10055  return -1;
10056  }
10057 
10058  $this->db->commit();
10059  return 1;
10060  }
10061 
10068  public function deleteEcmFiles($mode = 0)
10069  {
10070  global $conf;
10071 
10072  $this->db->begin();
10073 
10074  // Delete in database with mode 0
10075  if ($mode == 0) {
10076  switch ($this->element) {
10077  case 'propal':
10078  $element = 'propale';
10079  break;
10080  case 'product':
10081  $element = 'produit';
10082  break;
10083  case 'order_supplier':
10084  $element = 'fournisseur/commande';
10085  break;
10086  case 'invoice_supplier':
10087  $element = 'fournisseur/facture/'.get_exdir($this->id, 2, 0, 1, $this, 'invoice_supplier');
10088  break;
10089  case 'shipping':
10090  $element = 'expedition/sending';
10091  break;
10092  default:
10093  $element = $this->element;
10094  }
10095 
10096  // Delete ecm_files extrafields
10097  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".$this->db->prefix()."ecm_files_extrafields WHERE fk_object IN (";
10098  $sql .= " SELECT rowid FROM ".$this->db->prefix()."ecm_files WHERE filename LIKE '".$this->db->escape($this->ref)."%'";
10099  $sql .= " AND filepath = '".$this->db->escape($element)."/".$this->db->escape($this->ref)."' AND entity = ".((int) $conf->entity); // No need of getEntity here
10100  $sql .= ")";
10101 
10102  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
10103  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
10104  $this->db->rollback();
10105  return false;
10106  }
10107 
10108  // Delete ecm_files
10109  $sql = "DELETE FROM ".$this->db->prefix()."ecm_files";
10110  $sql .= " WHERE filename LIKE '".$this->db->escape($this->ref)."%'";
10111  $sql .= " AND filepath = '".$this->db->escape($element)."/".$this->db->escape($this->ref)."' AND entity = ".((int) $conf->entity); // No need of getEntity here
10112 
10113  if (!$this->db->query($sql)) {
10114  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
10115  $this->db->rollback();
10116  return false;
10117  }
10118  }
10119 
10120  // Delete in database with mode 1
10121  if ($mode == 1) {
10122  $sql = 'DELETE FROM '.$this->db->prefix()."ecm_files_extrafields";
10123  $sql .= " WHERE fk_object IN (SELECT rowid FROM ".$this->db->prefix()."ecm_files WHERE src_object_type = '".$this->db->escape($this->table_element.(empty($this->module) ? "" : "@".$this->module))."' AND src_object_id = ".((int) $this->id).")";
10124  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
10125  if (!$resql) {
10126  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
10127  $this->db->rollback();
10128  return false;
10129  }
10130 
10131  $sql = 'DELETE FROM '.$this->db->prefix()."ecm_files";
10132  $sql .= " WHERE src_object_type = '".$this->db->escape($this->table_element.(empty($this->module) ? "" : "@".$this->module))."' AND src_object_id = ".((int) $this->id);
10133  $resql = $this->db->query($sql);
10134  if (!$resql) {
10135  $this->error = $this->db->lasterror();
10136  $this->db->rollback();
10137  return false;
10138  }
10139  }
10140 
10141  $this->db->commit();
10142  return true;
10143  }
10144 }
